cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
cards.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Fireguard Destroyer
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain 1-4 Attack. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Hungry Dragon
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for_your opponent.
cards.flavor: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Blackwing Corruptor
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
cards.flavor: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Dark Iron Skulker
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
cards.flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Dragon Consort
cards.text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
cards.flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Dragon's Breath
cards.text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
cards.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Grim Patron
cards.text: After this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
cards.flavor: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Solemn Vigil
cards.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
cards.flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Drakonid Crusher
cards.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
cards.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humanoid. But, like, why?
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Emperor Thaurissan
cards.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
cards.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Volcanic Drake
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
cards.flavor: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.

cards.name: Rend Blackhand
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
cards.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Chromaggus
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
cards.flavor: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Majordomo Executus
cards.text: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros the Firelord.
cards.flavor: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Nefarian
cards.text: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
cards.flavor: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Volcanic Lumberer
cards.text: Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
cards.flavor: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

cards.name: Arcane Blast
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.
cards.flavor: Now with 100% more blast!

cards.name: Brave Archer
cards.text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: This is a "bearly" concealed reference.

cards.name: Buccaneer
cards.text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

cards.name: Competitive Spirit
cards.text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

cards.name: Flash Heal
cards.text: Restore #5 Health.
cards.flavor: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~

cards.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

cards.name: Injured Kvaldir
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
cards.flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

cards.name: Living Roots
cards.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
cards.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

cards.name: Lock and Load
cards.text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.
cards.flavor: Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."\n\nThis card pays homage to that special moment.

cards.name: Lowly Squire
cards.text: Inspire: Gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: But not the lowliest!

cards.name: Power Word: Glory
cards.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to\nyour hero.
cards.flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

cards.name: Tournament Attendee
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

cards.name: Alexstrasza's Champion
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
cards.flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

cards.name: Ancestral Knowledge
cards.text: Draw 2 cards. Overload: (2)
cards.flavor: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

cards.name: Argent Lance
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
cards.flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

cards.name: Argent Watchman
cards.text: Can't attack.\nInspire: Can attack as normal this turn.
cards.flavor: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

cards.name: Bear Trap
cards.text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
cards.flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

cards.name: Bolster
cards.text: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
cards.flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

cards.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
cards.text: Inspire: Gain +1 Health.
cards.flavor: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.

cards.name: Confuse
cards.text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
cards.flavor: This minion is really powerful!

cards.name: Convert
cards.text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.
cards.flavor: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

cards.name: Cutpurse
cards.text: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
cards.flavor: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

cards.name: Darnassus Aspirant
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.\nDeathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
cards.flavor: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

cards.name: Demonfuse
cards.text: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
cards.flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

cards.name: Fallen Hero
cards.text: Your Hero Power deals 1_extra damage.
cards.flavor: And he can't get up.

cards.name: Flame Juggler
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavor: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"

cards.name: Garrison Commander
cards.text: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.
cards.flavor: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

cards.name: King's Elekk
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
cards.flavor: Elekk jousting is AWESOME.

cards.name: Lance Carrier
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

cards.name: Sparring Partner
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Give a\nminion Taunt.
cards.flavor: Come at me, bro.

cards.name: Tiny Knight of Evil
cards.text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

cards.name: Totem Golem
cards.text: Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

cards.name: Undercity Valiant
cards.text: Combo: Deal 1 damage.
cards.flavor: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

cards.name: Wrathguard
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
cards.flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

cards.name: Wyrmrest Agent
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
cards.flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

cards.name: Argent Horserider
cards.text: Charge\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: His horse's name is Betsy.

cards.name: Bash
cards.text: Deal $3 damage.\nGain 3 Armor.
cards.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

cards.name: Beneath the Grounds
cards.text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
cards.flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

cards.name: Burgle
cards.text: Add 2 random cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
cards.flavor: Yoink!

cards.name: Coliseum Manager
cards.text: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.
cards.flavor: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

cards.name: Dragonhawk Rider
cards.text: Inspire: Gain Windfury\nthis turn.
cards.flavor: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

cards.name: Dreadscale
cards.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

cards.name: Effigy
cards.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
cards.flavor: Burning man, brah.

cards.name: Elemental Destruction
cards.text: Deal $4-$5 damage to all minions. Overload: (5)
cards.flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

cards.name: Eydis Darkbane
cards.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavor: HATES being called "the wonder twins".

cards.name: Fencing Coach
cards.text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.
cards.flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

cards.name: Fjola Lightbane
cards.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: LOVES being called "the wonder twins".

cards.name: Healing Wave
cards.text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
cards.flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

cards.name: Ice Rager
cards.flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

cards.name: King's Defender
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
cards.flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

cards.name: Light's Champion
cards.text: Battlecry: Silence a Demon.
cards.flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

cards.name: Master of Ceremonies
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Goes by "MC ElfyElf".

cards.name: Mulch
cards.text: Destroy a minion.\nAdd a random minion to your opponent's hand.
cards.flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

cards.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
cards.text: Inspire: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

cards.name: Polymorph: Boar
cards.text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
cards.flavor: It's always Huffer.

cards.name: Powershot
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
cards.flavor: pow POW pow

cards.name: Saboteur
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.
cards.flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!

cards.name: Seal of Champions
cards.text: Give a minion\n+3 Attack and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

cards.name: Shadowfiend
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
cards.flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

cards.name: Shady Dealer
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

cards.name: Silent Knight
cards.text: Stealth\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

cards.name: Silver Hand Regent
cards.text: Inspire: Summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.
cards.flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

cards.name: Spellslinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
cards.flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

cards.name: Stablemaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
cards.flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

cards.name: Tuskarr Totemic
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a random basic Totem.
cards.flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

cards.name: Warhorse Trainer
cards.text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

cards.name: Armored Warhorse
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
cards.flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

cards.name: Astral Communion
cards.text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
cards.flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

cards.name: Charged Hammer
cards.text: Deathrattle: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
cards.flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

cards.name: Crowd Favorite
cards.text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: The crowd ALWAYS yells lethal.

cards.name: Dalaran Aspirant
cards.text: Inspire: Gain Spell Damage +1.
cards.flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

cards.name: Draenei Totemcarver
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each friendly Totem.
cards.flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

cards.name: Dreadsteed
cards.text: Deathrattle: At the end\n of the turn, summon a Dreadsteed.
cards.flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

cards.name: Evil Heckler
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

cards.name: Fist of Jaraxxus
cards.text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavor: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

cards.name: Frigid Snobold
cards.text: Spell Damage +1
cards.flavor: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

cards.name: Gormok the Impaler
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
cards.flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

cards.name: Holy Champion
cards.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

cards.name: Magnataur Alpha
cards.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nhe attacks.
cards.flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

cards.name: Maiden of the Lake
cards.text: Your Hero Power costs (1).
cards.flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.

cards.name: Murloc Knight
cards.text: Inspire: Summon a random Murloc.
cards.flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

cards.name: Poisoned Blade
cards.text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
cards.flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

cards.name: Refreshment Vendor
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health to each hero.
cards.flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

cards.name: Savage Combatant
cards.text: Inspire: Give your hero\n+2 Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

cards.name: Spawn of Shadows
cards.text: Inspire: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
cards.flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

cards.name: Tournament Medic
cards.text: Inspire: Restore #2 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

cards.name: Twilight Guardian
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
cards.flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

cards.name: Wildwalker
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +3 Health.
cards.flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

cards.name: Clockwork Knight
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.
cards.flavor: It takes a lot to wind him up.

cards.name: Flame Lance
cards.text: Deal $8 damage to a minion.
cards.flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

cards.name: Kvaldir Raider
cards.text: Inspire: Gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

cards.name: Mukla's Champion
cards.text: Inspire: Give your other minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

cards.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
cards.text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

cards.name: Pit Fighter
cards.flavor: What did the pits ever do to you?

cards.name: Ram Wrangler
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a\nrandom Beast.
cards.flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

cards.name: Recruiter
cards.text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
cards.flavor: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

cards.name: Shado-Pan Rider
cards.text: Combo: Gain +3 Attack.
cards.flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

cards.name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
cards.text: Inspire: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

cards.name: Tuskarr Jouster
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore #7 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

cards.name: Ball of Spiders
cards.text: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners.
cards.flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

cards.name: Bolf Ramshield
cards.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
cards.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

cards.name: Coldarra Drake
cards.text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
cards.flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

cards.name: Dark Bargain
cards.text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
cards.flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

cards.name: Enter the Coliseum
cards.text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
cards.flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

cards.name: Grand Crusader
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
cards.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

cards.name: Justicar Trueheart
cards.text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
cards.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

cards.name: Kodorider
cards.text: Inspire: Summon a 3/5 War Kodo.
cards.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

cards.name: Master Jouster
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

cards.name: Mogor's Champion
cards.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
cards.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

cards.name: Mysterious Challenger
cards.text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
cards.flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

cards.name: Sea Reaver
cards.text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
cards.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

cards.name: Sideshow Spelleater
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Hero Power.
cards.flavor: Hey!  Let me try that...

cards.name: The Mistcaller
cards.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

cards.name: The Skeleton Knight
cards.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
cards.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

cards.name: Void Crusher
cards.text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
cards.flavor: We like to call him "Wesley".

cards.name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
cards.text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
cards.flavor: He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.\n\n*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

cards.name: Acidmaw
cards.text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
cards.flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

cards.name: Captured Jormungar
cards.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

cards.name: Chillmaw
cards.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
cards.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

cards.name: Confessor Paletress
cards.text: Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
cards.flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

cards.name: Eadric the Pure
cards.text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions'\nAttack to 1.
cards.flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

cards.name: Fearsome Doomguard
cards.flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

cards.name: Knight of the Wild
cards.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
cards.flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

cards.name: Skycap'n Kragg
cards.text: Charrrrrge\nCosts (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
cards.flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

cards.name: Rhonin
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
cards.flavor: A masterless shamurai.

cards.name: Anub'arak
cards.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
cards.flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

cards.name: Icehowl
cards.text: Charge\nCan't attack heroes.
cards.flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

cards.name: North Sea Kraken
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
cards.flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

cards.name: Aviana
cards.text: Your minions cost (1).
cards.flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

cards.name: Frost Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
cards.flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

cards.name: Varian Wrynn
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards.\nPut any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

cards.name: Murloc Tinyfin
cards.flavor: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Cursed Blade
cards.text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
cards.flavor: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Eye of Hakkar
cards.text: Take a secret from your opponent's deck and put it into the battlefield.

cards.name: Pit Snake
cards.text: Poisonous
cards.flavor: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Raven Idol

cards.flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Reliquary Seeker

cards.flavor: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Sacred Trial
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
cards.flavor: You have chosen poorly.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
cards.flavor: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Tunnel Trogg
cards.text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
cards.flavor: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels.  You try your beauty routine without natural light.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Curse of Rafaam
cards.text: Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.\nWhile they hold it, they take 2 damage on their turn.
cards.flavor: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a\n1-Cost card.
cards.flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Dart Trap
cards.text: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal $5 damage to a random enemy.

cards.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.

cards.howToGetGold: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Huge Toad
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.text: After you cast a spell on another friendly minion, cast a copy of it on this one.
cards.flavor: If you want your wish granted, don't rub him the wrong way.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.flavor: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Entomb
cards.text: Choose an enemy minion.\nShuffle it into your deck.
cards.flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
cards.flavor: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.flavor: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.flavor: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.flavor: He's very good at retrieving artifacts.  From other people's museums.

cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Anyfin Can Happen

cards.flavor: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

cards.name: Forbidden Flame
cards.text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
cards.flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

cards.name: Forbidden Healing
cards.text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
cards.flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

cards.name: Forbidden Ritual
cards.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
cards.flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

cards.name: Forbidden Shaping
cards.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
cards.flavor: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

cards.name: Bladed Cultist
cards.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

cards.name: Blood To Ichor
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
cards.flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

cards.name: Divine Strength
cards.text: Give a minion +1/+2.
cards.flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

cards.name: Evolve
cards.text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
cards.flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

cards.name: Fiery Bat
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavor: He'll always be our first.

cards.name: Forbidden Ancient
cards.text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each Mana spent.
cards.flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

cards.name: Journey Below
cards.text: Discover a Deathrattle card.
cards.flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

cards.name: N'Zoth's First Mate
cards.text: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.
cards.flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

cards.name: On the Hunt
cards.text: Deal $1 damage.\nSummon a 1/1 Mastiff.
cards.flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

cards.name: Possessed Villager
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Shadowbeast.
cards.flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

cards.name: Primal Fusion
cards.text: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
cards.flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

cards.name: Selfless Hero
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

cards.name: Shifter Zerus
cards.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.
cards.flavor: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

cards.name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
cards.flavor: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

cards.name: Vilefin Inquisitor
cards.text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'
cards.flavor: Nobody expects the Vilefin Inquisition!

cards.name: Zealous Initiate
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

cards.name: A Light in the Darkness
cards.text: Discover a minion.\nGive it +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

cards.name: Beckoner of Evil
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: Here, Evil!  C'mon boy!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

cards.name: Bilefin Tidehunter
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

cards.name: Cult Sorcerer
cards.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 After you cast a spell, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

cards.name: Darkshire Librarian
cards.text: Battlecry:\nDiscard a random card. Deathrattle:\nDraw a card.
cards.flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

cards.name: Duskboar
cards.flavor: Often excluded from dinner parties.  To be fair, he is very boaring.

cards.name: Embrace the Shadow
cards.text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
cards.flavor: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

cards.name: Eternal Sentinel
cards.text: Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: Just try to avoid eye contact.

cards.name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nIf it's a Beast, draw\na card.
cards.flavor: Y'Shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

cards.name: Nat, the Darkfisher
cards.text: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
cards.flavor: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

cards.name: Renounce Darkness
cards.text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
cards.flavor: SEE YA DARKNESS!

cards.name: Shatter
cards.text: Destroy a Frozen minion.
cards.flavor: What's cooler than being cool?

cards.name: Stormcrack
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

cards.name: Twilight Geomancer
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Give your C'Thun\nTaunt (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

cards.name: Twisted Worgen
cards.text: Stealth
cards.flavor: Sometimes the Old Gods' corruptions gives you power untold, sometimes you get +1 Attack. We can’t all be winners in the Eldritch lottery.

cards.name: Undercity Huckster
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
cards.flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

cards.name: Addled Grizzly
cards.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

cards.name: Am'gam Rager
cards.flavor: peerc rewop

cards.name: Blood Warriors
cards.text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
cards.flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

cards.name: Bloodsail Cultist
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
cards.flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

cards.name: Carrion Grub
cards.flavor: Carrion, my wayward grub.

cards.name: Darkshire Councilman
cards.text: [x]After you summon a minion,\n gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: Democracy in action!

cards.name: Disciple of C'Thun
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

cards.name: Feral Rage
cards.text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
cards.flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

cards.name: Forlorn Stalker
cards.text: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

cards.name: Infest
cards.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
cards.flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

cards.name: Rallying Blade
cards.text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

cards.name: Ravaging Ghoul
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

cards.name: Shadow Strike
cards.text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.
cards.flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

cards.name: Silithid Swarmer
cards.text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
cards.flavor: If your hero doesn't attack, it's just "Silithid Loner".

cards.name: Spawn of N'Zoth
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

cards.name: Spreading Madness
cards.text: Deal $9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
cards.flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

cards.name: Squirming Tentacle
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

cards.name: Steward of Darkshire
cards.text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

cards.name: Twilight Elder
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

cards.name: Twilight Flamecaller
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

cards.name: Aberrant Berserker
cards.text: Has +2 Attack while damaged.
cards.flavor: I berserk, therefore I am.

cards.name: Blackwater Pirate
cards.text: Your weapons cost (2) less.
cards.flavor: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

cards.name: Bloodhoof Brave
cards.text: Taunt\nHas +3 Attack while damaged.
cards.flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

cards.name: C'Thun's Chosen
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield\nBattlecry: Give your C'Thun\n+2/+2 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

cards.name: Cyclopian Horror
cards.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each enemy minion.
cards.flavor: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?

cards.name: Demented Frostcaller
cards.text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
cards.flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

cards.name: Eater of Secrets
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
cards.flavor: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap.  You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

cards.name: Evolved Kobold
cards.text: Spell Damage +2
cards.flavor: You no take tentacle!

cards.name: Faceless Shambler
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.
cards.flavor: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Ysera shaped."

cards.name: Fandral Staghelm
cards.text: Your Choose One cards and powers have both effects combined.
cards.flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

cards.name: Flamewreathed Faceless
cards.text: Overload: (2)
cards.flavor: He's on fire! Boomshakalaka!

cards.name: Hooded Acolyte
cards.text: Whenever a character is healed, give your\nC'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

cards.name: Infested Tauren
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Slime.
cards.flavor: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

cards.name: Infested Wolf
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
cards.flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

cards.name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
cards.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
cards.flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

cards.name: Master of Evolution
cards.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
cards.flavor: Will be really useful in the new "Hearthémon" game.

cards.name: Midnight Drake
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other card\nin your hand.
cards.flavor: Still fearsome in the daytime.

cards.name: Mire Keeper
cards.text: [x]Choose One - Summon a\n2/2 Slime; or Gain an\nempty Mana Crystal.
cards.flavor: "Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" \n"No.  I'm keeping it."

cards.name: Polluted Hoarder
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Roll ‘greed’ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

cards.name: Shadow Word: Horror
cards.text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
cards.flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

cards.name: Shifting Shade
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

cards.name: Southsea Squidface
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

cards.name: Twilight Summoner
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Faceless Destroyer.
cards.flavor: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

cards.name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
cards.flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

cards.name: Cabalist's Tome
cards.text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
cards.flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

cards.name: Corrupted Healbot
cards.text: Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

cards.name: Crazed Worshipper
cards.text: Taunt. Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

cards.name: Cult Apothecary
cards.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore #2 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: Cults need pharmacists too.

cards.name: Darkshire Alchemist
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #5 Health.
cards.flavor: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

cards.name: Darkspeaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.
cards.flavor: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

cards.name: Hallazeal the Ascended
cards.text: Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: Hallazeals all your dallazamage.

cards.name: Hammer of Twilight
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Elemental.
cards.flavor: Stop! It's Twilight Hammer time.

cards.name: Power Word: Tentacles
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+6.
cards.flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

cards.name: Princess Huhuran
cards.text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

cards.name: Psych-o-Tron
cards.text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

cards.name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
cards.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
cards.flavor: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

cards.name: Shadowcaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy to_your hand that costs_(1).
cards.flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.

cards.name: Stand Against Darkness
cards.text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
cards.flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

cards.name: Tentacles for Arms
cards.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
cards.flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

cards.name: Twilight Darkmender
cards.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore #10 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

cards.name: Usher of Souls
cards.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1\n(wherever it is).
cards.flavor: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

cards.name: Validated Doomsayer
cards.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
cards.flavor: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

cards.name: Ancient Harbinger
cards.text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
cards.flavor: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

cards.name: Corrupted Seer
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
cards.flavor: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

cards.name: Dark Arakkoa
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Give your C'Thun\n+3/+3 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

cards.name: Faceless Summoner
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

cards.name: Herald Volazj
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
cards.flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

cards.name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
cards.text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
cards.flavor: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

cards.name: Nerubian Prophet
cards.text: At the start of your turn, reduce this card's\nCost by (1).
cards.flavor: It’s a self-reducing prophecy.

cards.name: Scaled Nightmare
cards.text: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
cards.flavor: I like it because it scales.

cards.name: Skeram Cultist
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

cards.name: Thing from Below
cards.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
cards.flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

cards.name: Thistle Tea
cards.text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

cards.name: Ancient Shieldbearer
cards.text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
cards.flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

cards.name: Bog Creeper
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

cards.name: Cho'gall
cards.text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
cards.flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

cards.name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
cards.text: Windfury
cards.flavor: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

cards.name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
cards.flavor: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

cards.name: Malkorok
cards.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon.
cards.flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

cards.name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
cards.flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

cards.name: Wisps of the Old Gods
cards.text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
cards.flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

cards.name: Anomalus
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to all minions.
cards.flavor: That's short for "Anomnomnomnomalus".

cards.name: Call of the Wild
cards.text: Summon all three Animal Companions.
cards.flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

cards.name: Doomcaller
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is). If it's dead, shuffle it into your deck.
cards.flavor: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"

cards.name: Eldritch Horror
cards.flavor: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

cards.name: Giant Sand Worm
cards.text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
cards.flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

cards.name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
cards.text: At the end of your turn, restore #8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
cards.flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

cards.name: The Boogeymonster
cards.text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Has 20 years of training in classical ballet, but ALLLLLL he ever gets asked to do is boogie.

cards.name: Blade of C'Thun
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to_your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
cards.flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

cards.name: Blood of The Ancient One
cards.text: If you control two of these\nat the end of your turn, merge them into 'The Ancient One'.
cards.flavor: Add two cups of Blood of the Ancient One to one cup of lemon juice. Add just a dash of sugar and stir. Delicious!

cards.name: Soggoth the Slitherer
cards.text: Taunt\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

cards.name: C'Thun
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

cards.name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
cards.text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
cards.flavor: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

cards.name: DOOM!
cards.text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
cards.flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

cards.name: Faceless Behemoth
cards.flavor: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

cards.name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
cards.flavor: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

cards.name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
cards.text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
cards.flavor: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

cards.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
cards.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
cards.flavor: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

cards.name: Arcane Anomaly
cards.text: After you cast a spell, give this minion +1 Health.
cards.flavor: He used to get work as a Spatial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Babbling Book
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Enchanted Raven
cards.flavor: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Malchezaar's Imp
cards.text: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Runic Egg
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Oh man! Runic omelettes are the best!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Spirit Claws
cards.text: [x]Has +2 Attack while you\nhave Spell Damage.
cards.flavor: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Swashburglar
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Cat Trick
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.
cards.flavor: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Kindly Grandmother
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Big Bad Wolf.
cards.flavor: "Goodness! What… abundant drool you have."
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Maelstrom Portal
cards.text: Deal_$1_damage to_all_enemy_minions. Summon_a_random\n1-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: They bill this as a popular resort attraction, but they try and get your money up front.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Medivh's Valet
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 3 damage.
cards.flavor: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Netherspite Historian
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover\na Dragon.
cards.flavor: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Pompous Thespian
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Alas poor Annoy-o-Tron! A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Purify
cards.text: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Cloaked Huntress
cards.text: Your Secrets cost (0).
cards.flavor: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Deadly Fork
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
cards.flavor: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Moroes
cards.text: Stealth\nAt the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Steward.
cards.flavor: Moroes runs an army of stewards, but still ends up inflating the balloons himself.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Nightbane Templar
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
cards.flavor: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Pantry Spider
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a\n1/3 Spider.
cards.flavor: You have to admit, they make a cute couple.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Protect the King!
cards.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Silverware Golem
cards.text: If you discard this minion, summon it.
cards.flavor: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Violet Illusionist
cards.text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
cards.flavor: She’s much more cheerful after losing the ‘n’ in her name.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Zoobot
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +1/+1.
cards.flavor: The Murloc is taking the picture.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Arcanosmith
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/5 minion with Taunt.
cards.flavor: He’s really just a Blacksmith, but he thought the fancy title would bring in more business.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Priest of the Feast
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, restore #3 Health to\nyour hero.
cards.flavor: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!
cards.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
cards.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

cards.name: Silvermoon Portal

cards.name: Counterfeit Coin
cards.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
cards.flavor: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

cards.name: Freezing Potion
cards.text: Freeze an enemy.
cards.flavor: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

cards.name: Alleycat
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1_Cat.
cards.flavor: To be a cool cat in Gadgetzan, you gotta have bling.

cards.name: Finders Keepers
cards.text: Discover a card with_Overload. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: INFINITE LOOP!

cards.name: Getaway Kodo
cards.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Get to da Kodo! Now!

cards.name: Grimscale Chum
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random\nMurloc in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Listen, see?  We'll take 'em to the docks, see?  And throw 'em in the sea, see?

cards.name: I Know a Guy
cards.text: Discover a Taunt minion.
cards.flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

cards.name: Jade Idol
cards.text: Choose One - Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.@Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
cards.flavor: Shuffle or no guts.

cards.name: Kabal Lackey
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret\nyou play this turn costs (0).
cards.flavor: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

cards.name: Mark of the Lotus
cards.text: Give your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: The mark of the Lotus is a little flower drawn in permanent marker on the ankle.

cards.name: Meanstreet Marshal
cards.text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 2 or more Attack, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Remember, submit your bribes directly to the Marshal - it's the law!

cards.name: Mistress of Mixtures
cards.text: Deathrattle: Restore #4 Health to each hero.
cards.flavor: Her favorite mixture is cola and lime.

cards.name: Patches the Pirate
cards.text: [x]After you play a Pirate,\nsummon this minion\nfrom your deck.
cards.flavor: What do sailors yell when Patches steals their treasure chest full of laws and other things being transported to parliament for a vote?  "The Eyes have it!"

cards.name: Pint-Size Potion
cards.text: [x]Give all enemy minions\n-3 Attack this turn only.
cards.flavor: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

cards.name: Potion of Madness
cards.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
cards.flavor: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

cards.name: Small-Time Buccaneer
cards.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a weapon equipped.
cards.flavor: "Oh, I'm not serious about it.  I only pirate on the weekends."

cards.name: Smuggler's Crate
cards.text: Give a random Beast in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

cards.name: Smuggler's Run
cards.text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

cards.name: Weasel Tunneler
cards.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: He's the reason the First Bank of Gadgetzan has steel floors.

cards.name: Blowgill Sniper
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
cards.flavor: Imagine how much further his darts would go if he had lungs instead of gills!

cards.name: Devolve
cards.text: Transform all enemy minions into random ones that cost (1) less.
cards.flavor: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

cards.name: Dirty Rat
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
cards.flavor: It's not his fault…  Someone keeps stealing his soap!

cards.name: Friendly Bartender
cards.text: At the end of your turn, restore #1 Health to your_hero.
cards.flavor: "What'll it be?  A Jade Brew?  A Grimy Goose?  A Kabal Manatini?"

cards.name: Gadgetzan Ferryman
cards.text: Combo: Return a friendly minion to your hand.
cards.flavor: Is it just me, or is there something fishy about that ferryman?

cards.name: Gadgetzan Socialite
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #2_Health.
cards.flavor: Comment on her height, and she'll go from flapper to kneecapper in seconds flat.

cards.name: Grimestreet Informant
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\nHunter, Paladin, or Warrior\ncard.
cards.flavor: "Naw, naw.  You're talkin' about Grime BOULEVARD.  I ain't know nuthin' 'bout that."

cards.name: Grimestreet Outfitter
cards.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

cards.name: Hidden Cache
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: There is an urban legend that the first Toxic Sewer Ooze was born because a rookie Goon stashed an open container of milk in a Hidden Cache.

cards.name: Hobart Grapplehammer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand and deck +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

cards.name: Jade Claws
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.\nOverload: (1)@Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.\nOverload: (1)
cards.flavor: "Best manicure ever!" - Aya Blackpaw

cards.name: Jade Shuriken
cards.text: Deal $2 damage.\nCombo: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal $2 damage.\nCombo: Summon a Jade Golem.
cards.flavor: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

cards.name: Jade Swarmer
cards.text: Stealth\nDeathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Stealth\nDeathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
cards.flavor: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

cards.name: Mana Geode
cards.text: Whenever this minion is_healed, summon a 2/2_Crystal.
cards.flavor: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

cards.name: Public Defender
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Happy to defend any public offender!

cards.name: Sleep with the Fishes
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to all damaged minions.
cards.flavor: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

cards.name: Stolen Goods
cards.text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
cards.flavor: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

cards.name: Trogg Beastrager
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Still angry that the Gadgetzan Rager Club wouldn't accept him as a member.

cards.name: Auctionmaster Beardo
cards.text: After you cast a spell, refresh your Hero Power.
cards.flavor: Gadgetzan has always run an under-the-table auction house, and business has been PRETTY good for Beardo since the population explosion.  And since the explosion that destroyed the competing auction houses in the city.

cards.name: Backstreet Leper
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage\nto the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: Quit playing games with his heart. And his fingers. And foot. It's rude.

cards.name: Bloodfury Potion
cards.text: [x]Give a minion +3 Attack.\nIf it's a Demon, also\ngive it +3 Health.
cards.flavor: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

cards.name: Blubber Baron
cards.text: Whenever you summon a Battlecry minion while this_is in your hand, gain_+1/+1.
cards.flavor: When oil, railroad, steel, robber, and red are all already taken, your options are limited.

cards.name: Celestial Dreamer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a\nminion with 5 or more\nAttack, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: If you think her job is easy, YOU try falling asleep on cue.

cards.name: Fel Orc Soulfiend
cards.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to this_minion.
cards.flavor: "Doc says the persistent burning sensation in my soul is probably just an ulcer."

cards.name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a random weapon in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."

cards.name: Grimestreet Smuggler
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: She's got anything you want.  Need the latest derpinger?  No problem!

cards.name: Hired Gun
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: He loves his job and would do it for free!  (But don't tell his boss!)

cards.name: Jade Blossom
cards.text: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.@Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
cards.flavor: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

cards.name: Kabal Courier
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage, Priest, or Warlock card.
cards.flavor: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

cards.name: Kabal Talonpriest
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
cards.flavor: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

cards.name: Manic Soulcaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
cards.flavor: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

cards.name: Pilfered Power
cards.text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal for each friendly minion.
cards.flavor: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

cards.name: Potion of Polymorph
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a\n1/1 Sheep.
cards.flavor: Tastes like Baaaaananas.

cards.name: Rat Pack
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nnumber of 1/1 Rats equal\n_to this minion's Attack.
cards.flavor: He's gonna do it his way.

cards.name: Sergeant Sally
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: "Who is she?  Where did she come from?  We don't even have a police force here in Gadgetzan!!" - Mayor Noggenfogger

cards.name: Shadow Rager
cards.text: Stealth
cards.flavor: WE WENT THERE!

cards.name: Shaku, the Collector
cards.text: [x]Stealth. Whenever this attacks, add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
cards.flavor: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

cards.name: Shaky Zipgunner
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random\nminion in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: The Grimy Goons can get you any weapon you want but if you want it to not explode you gotta pay extra.

cards.name: Small-Time Recruits
cards.text: [x]Draw three 1-Cost\nminions from your deck.
cards.flavor: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

cards.name: Street Trickster
cards.text: Spell Damage +1
cards.flavor: His first trick: making your wallet disappear!

cards.name: Toxic Sewer Ooze
cards.text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
cards.flavor: When Sergeant Sally shows up unexpectedly, DO NOT FLUSH YOUR MANA CRYSTALS DOWN THE TOILET.

cards.name: Unlicensed Apothecary
cards.text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to_your hero.
cards.flavor: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

cards.name: Volcanic Potion
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to all_minions.
cards.flavor: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

cards.name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
cards.text: Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal
cards.flavor: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly.  "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster."  BOOM, promoted.

cards.name: Backroom Bouncer
cards.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: "WHY ARE YOU IN THE BACK ROOM?  WHO IS WATCHING THE FRONT?!"

cards.name: Blastcrystal Potion
cards.text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

cards.name: Brass Knuckles
cards.text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ngive a random minion in\nyour hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

cards.name: Call in the Finishers
cards.text: Summon four 1/1 Murlocs.
cards.flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

cards.name: Crystalweaver
