cards.text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +1/+1.
cards.flavor: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

cards.name: Daring Reporter
cards.text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: She's working on a story!  While skydiving!

cards.name: Dispatch Kodo
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.
cards.flavor: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan.  Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen.  Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

cards.name: Genzo, the Shark
cards.text: Whenever this attacks, both players draw until they have 3 cards.
cards.flavor: Infamous in the seedy underground card rooms of Gadgetzan, he got his nickname winning the coveted Shark Plushie in the city's first Hearthstone tournament.

cards.name: Greater Healing Potion
cards.text: Restore #12 Health to a friendly character.
cards.flavor: Filled with electrolytes!

cards.name: Grimy Gadgeteer
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

cards.name: Hozen Healer
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore a minion to full Health.
cards.flavor: He didn't go to school for healing, but we keep losing all the good healers to Ratchet, so I guess we'll take him.

cards.name: Jade Lightning
cards.text: Deal $4 damage. Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal $4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
cards.flavor: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

cards.name: Jade Spirit
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade_Golem.@Battlecry: Summon a Jade_Golem.
cards.flavor: "He's so cute!  I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

cards.name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Restore #6 Health.\nOverload: (1)
cards.flavor: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

cards.name: Kabal Chemist
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random Potion to your hand.
cards.flavor: Sure you could have that Polymorph potion, but wouldn't you rather have this mystery potion?  It could be anything.  Even a Polymorph potion!

cards.name: Kazakus
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck\nhas no duplicates,\n_create a custom spell.
cards.flavor: The mysterious leader of the Kabal is NOT a dragon, and does NOT deal in illegal potions.  Any public statements to the contrary will be met with litigation and Dragonfire Potions.

cards.name: Kooky Chemist
cards.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
cards.flavor: #abs

cards.name: Lotus Illusionist
cards.text: [x]After this minion attacks\na hero, transform it into a\n_random 6-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: If you think her Xavius and Sylvanas cosplay is great, wait till you see her Reno Jackson!

cards.name: Naga Corsair
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: Hook-tails are nice and all but she keeps getting stuck on things.

cards.name: Seadevil Stinger
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Murloc\nyou play this turn costs\n_Health instead of Mana.
cards.flavor: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

cards.name: Shadow Sensei
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +2/+2.
cards.flavor: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

cards.name: Tanaris Hogchopper
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent's\nhand is empty, gain Charge.
cards.flavor: The Hogchoppers are well-known throughout Kalimdor for being a real, actual group.

cards.name: Worgen Greaser
cards.flavor: Hair products are 79% of his monthly budget.

cards.name: Alley Armorsmith
cards.text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
cards.flavor: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

cards.name: Bomb Squad
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
cards.flavor: Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!

cards.name: Burgly Bully
cards.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a Coin to your hand.
cards.flavor: He only burgles to pay the bills.  He is really just a bully at heart.

cards.name: Cryomancer
cards.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

cards.name: Doppelgangster
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this minion.
cards.flavor: "Every me, get in here!"

cards.name: Drakonid Operative
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

cards.name: Finja, the Flying Star
cards.text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, summon 2 _Murlocs from your deck.
cards.flavor: The last true master of Finjitsu.

cards.name: Grimestreet Enforcer
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

cards.name: Grook Fu Master
cards.text: Windfury
cards.flavor: Grook Fu, the ancient Hozen art of bashing heads with a stick.

cards.name: Kabal Songstealer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Silence a minion.
cards.flavor: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

cards.name: Knuckles
cards.text: After this attacks a\nminion, it also hits the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

cards.name: Lotus Agents
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
cards.flavor: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

cards.name: Lotus Assassin
cards.text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
cards.flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

cards.name: Lunar Visions
cards.text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
cards.flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

cards.name: Piranha Launcher
cards.text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon a 1/1 Piranha.
cards.flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

cards.name: Raza the Chained
cards.text: [x] Battlecry: If your deck has \nno duplicates, your Hero\n Power costs (0) this game.
cards.flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

cards.name: Red Mana Wyrm
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: It has double the Attack.  "Go on."  And double the Health.  "Yes??"  And its trigger has twice the effect.  "WHAT???"  And it costs…  Five times more.

cards.name: Second-Rate Bruiser
cards.text: [x]Taunt Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
cards.flavor: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

cards.name: Spiked Hogrider
cards.text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain_Charge.
cards.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

cards.name: Streetwise Investigator
cards.text: Battlecry: Enemy minions lose Stealth.
cards.flavor: "Hmmmm…  Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

cards.name: Virmen Sensei
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2.
cards.flavor: There is no carrot.

cards.name: White Eyes
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle\n'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
cards.flavor: My life for Aya!

cards.name: Ancient of Blossoms
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

cards.name: Aya Blackpaw
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. @ Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
cards.flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

cards.name: Big-Time Racketeer
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6_Ogre.
cards.flavor: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

cards.name: Defias Cleaner
cards.text: Battlecry: Silence a minion with Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: His house cleaning service is quite thorough.  Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

cards.name: Dragonfire Potion
cards.text: [x]Deal $5 damage to all\nminions except Dragons.
cards.flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

cards.name: Felfire Potion
cards.text: Deal $5 damage to all characters.
cards.flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

cards.name: Fight Promoter
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na minion with 6 or more\n_Health, draw two cards.
cards.flavor: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles.  No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

cards.name: Jade Behemoth
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@[x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
cards.flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

cards.name: Kabal Crystal Runner
cards.text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this_game.
cards.flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

cards.name: Kabal Trafficker
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nadd a random Demon\nto your hand.
cards.flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

cards.name: Leatherclad Hogleader
cards.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
cards.flavor: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

cards.name: Luckydo Buccaneer
cards.text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
cards.flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

cards.name: Madam Goya
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
cards.flavor: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

cards.name: Wind-up Burglebot
cards.text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw_a card.
cards.flavor: Don't blame the bot for his crimes...  Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

cards.name: Wrathion
cards.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
cards.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

cards.name: Abyssal Enforcer
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
cards.flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

cards.name: Don Han'Cho
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
cards.flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

cards.name: Greater Arcane Missiles
cards.text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
cards.flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

cards.name: Grimestreet Protector
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Give adjacent\n_minions Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

cards.name: Inkmaster Solia
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
cards.flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

cards.name: Jade Chieftain
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Give it Taunt. @Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
cards.flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

cards.name: Krul the Unshackled
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, summon all\n_Demons from your hand._
cards.flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

cards.name: Mayor Noggenfogger
cards.text: All targets are chosen randomly.
cards.flavor: This flavor text was randomly generated.  If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

cards.name: Kun the Forgotten King
cards.text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

cards.name: Adaptation
cards.text: Adapt a friendly minion.
cards.flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

cards.name: Air Elemental
cards.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

cards.name: Awaken the Makers
cards.text: Quest: Summon\n7 Deathrattle minions.\nReward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
cards.flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

cards.name: Binding Heal
cards.text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
cards.flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

cards.name: Crystalline Oracle
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

cards.name: Earthen Scales
cards.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
cards.flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

cards.name: Emerald Hive Queen
cards.text: Your minions cost (2) more.
cards.flavor: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

cards.name: Emerald Reaver
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
cards.flavor: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

cards.name: Fire Fly
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
cards.flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

cards.name: Fire Plume's Heart
cards.text: [x]Quest: Play\n7 Taunt minions.\nReward: Sulfuras.
cards.flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

cards.name: Glacial Shard
cards.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
cards.flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

cards.name: Hallucination
cards.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
cards.flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

cards.name: Iron Hide
cards.text: Gain 5 Armor.
cards.flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

cards.name: Jeweled Macaw
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
cards.flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

cards.name: Jungle Giants
cards.text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
cards.flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

cards.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
cards.text: [x]Quest: Discard 6 cards.\nReward: Nether Portal.
cards.flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

cards.name: Lost in the Jungle
cards.text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
cards.flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

cards.name: Molten Blade
cards.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
cards.flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

cards.name: Open the Waygate
cards.text: [x]Quest: Cast 8 spells that\ndidn't start in your deck.\nReward: Time Warp.
cards.flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

cards.name: Raptor Hatchling
cards.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
cards.flavor: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

cards.name: Stampede
cards.text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add_a_random Beast to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

cards.name: The Caverns Below
cards.text: [x]Quest: Play four minions\nwith the same name.\nReward: Crystal Core.
cards.flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

cards.name: The Last Kaleidosaur
cards.text: Quest: Cast 6 spells\non your minions.\nReward: Galvadon.
cards.flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

cards.name: The Marsh Queen
cards.text: [x]Quest: Play seven\n1-Cost minions.\nReward: Queen Carnassa.
cards.flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

cards.name: Unite the Murlocs
cards.text: [x]Quest: Summon\n10 Murlocs.\nReward: Megafin.
cards.flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

cards.name: Arcanologist
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
cards.flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

cards.name: Biteweed
cards.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
cards.flavor: AKA Edwin VanLeaf.

cards.name: Clutchmother Zavas
cards.text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
cards.flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

cards.name: Cornered Sentry
cards.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your_opponent.
cards.flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

cards.name: Corrupting Mist
cards.text: Curse all minions. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
cards.flavor: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

cards.name: Crackling Razormaw
cards.text: Battlecry: Adapt a friendly_Beast.
cards.flavor: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

cards.name: Dinomancy
cards.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
cards.flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

cards.name: Explore Un'Goro
cards.text: Replace your deck with_copies of "Discover a card."
cards.flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

cards.name: Fire Plume Harbinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand_by (1).
cards.flavor: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

cards.name: Flame Geyser
cards.text: Deal $2 damage.\nAdd a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

cards.name: Golakka Crawler
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Pirate and gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

cards.name: Grievous Bite
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.
cards.flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

cards.name: Hydrologist
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
cards.flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

cards.name: Primalfin Champion
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any\nspells you cast on this\nminion to your hand.
cards.flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

cards.name: Primalfin Totem
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
cards.flavor: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

cards.name: Primordial Glyph
cards.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
cards.flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

cards.name: Pyros
cards.text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
cards.flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

cards.name: Radiant Elemental
cards.text: Your spells cost (1) less.
cards.flavor: It's a literal lava lamp!

cards.name: Ravasaur Runt
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, Adapt.
cards.flavor: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

cards.name: Razorpetal Lasher
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a\nRazorpetal to your hand\nthat deals 1 damage.
cards.flavor: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

cards.name: Razorpetal Volley
cards.text: Add two Razorpetals to_your hand that deal_1 damage.
cards.flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

cards.name: Rockpool Hunter
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Loves crab meat. Fears crabs.

cards.name: Shadow Visions
cards.text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
cards.flavor: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

cards.name: Shimmering Tempest
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

cards.name: Tortollan Forager
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
cards.flavor: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

cards.name: Volatile Elemental
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

cards.name: Chittering Tunneler
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
cards.flavor: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

cards.name: Curious Glimmerroot
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
cards.flavor: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

cards.name: Devilsaur Egg
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
cards.flavor: A key ingredient in all discerning Funnel Cake recipes.

cards.name: Eggnapper
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Raptors.
cards.flavor: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

cards.name: Elder Longneck
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
cards.flavor: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

cards.name: Envenom Weapon
cards.text: Give your weapon Poisonous.
cards.flavor: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

cards.name: Gluttonous Ooze
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
cards.flavor: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

cards.name: Hot Spring Guardian
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Restore #3_Health.
cards.flavor: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

cards.name: Humongous Razorleaf
cards.text: Can't attack.
cards.flavor: Loves goblins.  In a light cream sauce.

cards.name: Igneous Elemental
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Elementals to your hand.
cards.flavor: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

cards.name: Mana Bind
cards.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
cards.flavor: Nice spell.  YOINK!

cards.name: Mimic Pod
cards.text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Jinx!

cards.name: Mirage Caller
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
cards.flavor: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

cards.name: Primalfin Lookout
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a_Murloc.
cards.flavor: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

cards.name: Pterrordax Hatchling
cards.text: Battlecry: Adapt.
cards.flavor: Aww.  So cute.  Want to feed him another finger?

cards.name: Spirit Echo
cards.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return _this to your hand."
cards.flavor: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

cards.name: Stonehill Defender
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
cards.flavor: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

cards.name: Tar Creeper
cards.text: Taunt\nHas +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
cards.flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

cards.name: Terrorscale Stalker
cards.text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

cards.name: Thunder Lizard
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, Adapt.
cards.flavor: What? THUNDER LIZARD is adapting!

cards.name: Tidal Surge
cards.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $4 damage to a_minion.
cards.flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.

cards.name: Vicious Fledgling
cards.text: After this minion attacks a_hero, Adapt.
cards.flavor: A youngster who is truly hungry for self-improvement.

cards.name: Bloodbloom
cards.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
cards.flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

cards.name: Bright-Eyed Scout
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Change its Cost to (5).
cards.flavor: Also inordinately excited for cupcakes.

cards.name: Evolving Spores
cards.text: Adapt your minions.
cards.flavor: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

cards.name: Fire Plume Phoenix
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
cards.flavor: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

cards.name: Gentle Megasaur
cards.text: Battlecry: Adapt your_Murlocs.
cards.flavor: "Low, low rents! Must enjoy a nomadic lifestyle. Quasi-sentient, bipedal, amphibious humanoids ONLY!"

cards.name: Lakkari Felhound
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discard your two lowest-Cost cards.
cards.flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

cards.name: Lightfused Stegodon
cards.text: Battlecry: Adapt your Silver_Hand Recruits.
cards.flavor: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

cards.name: Molten Reflection
cards.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

cards.name: Obsidian Shard
cards.text: [x]Costs (1) less for each\ncard you've played from\nanother class.
cards.flavor: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh!  Dagger!”

cards.name: Ravenous Pterrordax
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt_twice.
cards.flavor: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

cards.name: Sherazin, Corpse Flower
cards.text: Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Play 4 cards in a turn to revive this minion.
cards.flavor: A Tortollan gardener's worst nightmare.

cards.name: Spiritsinger Umbra
cards.text: After you summon a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.
cards.flavor: She sees the fate of anyone she meets, but it's always the same: dinosaur attack.

cards.name: Steam Surger
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
cards.flavor: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

cards.name: Stegodon
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Level 40 Tortollan Paladins quest to tame a Stegodon.  There are no level 41 Tortollan Paladins.

cards.name: The Voraxx
cards.text:
[x]After you cast a spell on
this minion, summon a
1/1 Plant and cast
another copy on it.
cards.flavor: I am the Voraxx.  I speak for the weeds.

cards.name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an\nElemental last turn, gain\n_Taunt and Divine_Shield.
cards.flavor: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

cards.name: Tortollan Shellraiser
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Give a random\n_friendly minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: A hero... In a half-shell.

cards.name: Bittertide Hydra
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to_your hero.
cards.flavor: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

cards.name: Direhorn Hatchling
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
cards.flavor: His mom could beat up your mom.

cards.name: Elise the Trailblazer
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed_Un'Goro pack into_your deck.
cards.flavor: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

cards.name: Feeding Time
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
cards.flavor: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

cards.name: Living Mana
cards.text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 Treants. Recover the mana when they die.
cards.flavor: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

cards.name: Lyra the Sunshard
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

cards.name: Nesting Roc
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
cards.flavor: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

cards.name: Servant of Kalimos
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played\nan Elemental last turn,\n_Discover an Elemental.
cards.flavor: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

cards.name: Sudden Genesis
cards.text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
cards.flavor: Being hurt can make you another person.

cards.name: Tar Lurker
cards.text: Taunt\nHas +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
cards.flavor: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

cards.name: Tol'vir Warden
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
cards.flavor: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

cards.name: Verdant Longneck
cards.text: Battlecry: Adapt.
cards.flavor: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

cards.name: Vilespine Slayer
cards.text: Combo: Destroy a minion.
cards.flavor: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

cards.name: Volcano
cards.text: Deal $15 damage randomly split among all_minions.\nOverload: (2)
cards.flavor: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

cards.name: Cruel Dinomancer
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nrandom minion you\ndiscarded this game.
cards.flavor: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

cards.name: Frozen Crusher
cards.text: After this minion attacks, Freeze it.
cards.flavor: Goes by the online handle "KoolKrusher99."

cards.name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3)_or less.
cards.flavor: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

cards.name: Meteor
cards.text: Deal $15 damage to a minion and $3 damage to adjacent ones.
cards.flavor: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

cards.name: Ornery Direhorn
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Adapt.
cards.flavor: "It's an herbivore.  How dangerous can it be?"  - Famous last words

cards.name: Sabretooth Stalker
cards.text: Stealth
cards.flavor: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

cards.name: Spikeridged Steed
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
cards.flavor: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

cards.name: Sunkeeper Tarim
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.
cards.flavor: Ironically, his favorite number is 4.

cards.name: Blazecaller
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
cards.flavor: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

cards.name: Giant Anaconda
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.
cards.flavor: Must be something it ate.

cards.name: Sated Threshadon
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Murlocs.
cards.flavor: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

cards.name: Stone Sentinel
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.
cards.flavor: He and his friends just want to rock out.

cards.name: Stormwatcher
cards.text: Windfury
cards.flavor: Aspiring meteorologist!

cards.name: Swamp King Dred
cards.text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack_it.
cards.flavor: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

cards.name: Tar Lord
cards.text: Taunt\nHas +4 Attack during your opponent’s turn.
cards.flavor: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

cards.name: Vinecleaver
cards.text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon two 1/1 Silver\nHand Recruits.
cards.flavor: George and Karl!  Thank the Light we found you!

cards.name: Volcanosaur
cards.text: Battlecry: Adapt, then_Adapt.
cards.flavor: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"

cards.name: Charged Devilsaur
cards.text: Charge\nBattlecry: Can't attack heroes this turn.
cards.flavor: What happens when a dinosaur mixes soda and pop rocks.

cards.name: Dinosize
cards.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
cards.flavor: Comes with fries and a drink.

cards.name: Free From Amber
cards.text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.
cards.flavor: Bingo! Minion DNA!

cards.name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an\nElemental last turn, cast an\nElemental Invocation.
cards.flavor: All that's missing is a little heart.

cards.name: Primordial Drake
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto all other minions.
cards.flavor: Before he became a rap artist.

cards.name: Tortollan Primalist
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell_and cast it with random targets.
cards.flavor: I see pizza in my future.

cards.name: Giant Mastodon
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

cards.name: King Mosh
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy all damaged minions.
cards.flavor: He's a terror at concerts.

cards.name: Ozruk
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
cards.flavor: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

cards.name: Tyrantus
cards.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

cards.name: Ultrasaur
cards.flavor: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

cards.name: Snowflipper Penguin
cards.flavor: On land, a group of penguins is called a "waddle."

cards.name: Acherus Veteran
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: This is my Runeblade. There are many like it but this one is mine.

cards.name: Animated Berserker
cards.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
cards.flavor: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

cards.name: Breath of Sindragosa
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
cards.flavor: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

cards.name: Deadscale Knight
cards.text: Lifesteal
cards.flavor: His favorite spell is Chum Explosion.

cards.name: Doomerang
cards.text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

cards.name: Leeching Poison
cards.text: Give your weapon Lifesteal this turn.
cards.flavor: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

cards.name: Play Dead
cards.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: He's a very literal dog.

cards.name: Righteous Protector
cards.text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

cards.name: Sanguine Reveler
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain_+2/+2.
cards.flavor: Have some! This drink is to die for!

cards.name: Wretched Tiller
cards.text: Whenever this minion attacks, deal 2 damage to_the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: If you ever tried to plow permafrost, you’d be wretched, too.

cards.name: Bring It On!
cards.text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
cards.flavor: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

cards.name: Brrrloc
cards.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
cards.flavor: He may be frozen fish, but he fights fresh!

cards.name: Cryostasis
cards.text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Freeze it.
cards.flavor: We'll thaw you out when we find a cure!

cards.name: Dark Conviction
cards.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
cards.flavor: In his court, Uther is judge, jury, AND executioner…

cards.name: Dead Man's Hand
cards.text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
cards.flavor: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

cards.name: Defile
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
cards.flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

cards.name: Desperate Stand
cards.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
cards.flavor: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

cards.name: Drain Soul
cards.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage\nto a minion.
cards.flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

cards.name: Druid of the Swarm
cards.text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.
cards.flavor: The druid awoke from troubling dreams to find herself transformed into a giant spider.

cards.name: Fallen Sun Cleric
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: It's hard to keep a Shattered Sun Cleric down.

cards.name: Forge of Souls
cards.text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
cards.flavor: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

cards.name: Gnomeferatu
cards.text: Battlecry: Remove\nthe top card of your opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: She prefers the term "Glampire."

cards.name: Ice Fishing
cards.text: Draw 2 Murlocs from your deck.
cards.flavor: Glow fish, war fish... blow fish, more fish...

cards.name: Ice Walker
cards.text: Your Hero Power also Freezes the target.
cards.flavor: Ice Walker you say? He doesn't have feet!

cards.name: Prince Keleseth
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 2-Cost cards, give_all minions in your deck +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to buff his brothers.

cards.name: Roll the Bones
cards.text: Draw a card.\nIf it has Deathrattle, cast this again.
cards.flavor: Call it: Heads or Tailbone…

cards.name: Shadow Ascendant
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ngive another random\nfriendly minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

cards.name: Spirit Lash
cards.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $1 damage to_all_minions.
cards.flavor: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

cards.name: Tainted Zealot
cards.text: Divine Shield\nSpell Damage +1
cards.flavor: The love she shares seems to go nowhere. Now she's lost her Light, tosses and turns, she can't sleep at night...

cards.name: Toxic Arrow
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
cards.flavor: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

cards.name: Tuskarr Fisherman
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Spell Damage +1.
cards.flavor: If you bring him 500 fish, he'll give you this sweet Kalu'ak Fishing Pole.

cards.name: Venomstrike Trap
cards.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3_Poisonous Cobra.
cards.flavor: Snakes on a frozen plain.

cards.name: Acolyte of Agony
cards.text: Lifesteal
cards.flavor: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

cards.name: Bearshark
cards.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: "Candygram."

cards.name: Coldwraith
cards.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
cards.flavor: He's freezing his bones off!

cards.name: Crypt Lord
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nAfter you summon a minion,\n gain +1 Health.
cards.flavor: The original fifth beetle!

cards.name: Deathspeaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.
cards.flavor: It helps to speak really, really loud.

cards.name: Doomed Apprentice
cards.text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
cards.flavor: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

cards.name: Drakkari Defender
cards.text: Taunt\nOverload: (3)
cards.flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

cards.name: Drakkari Enchanter
cards.text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
cards.flavor: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

cards.name: Frozen Clone
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to_your hand.
cards.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

cards.name: Gnash
cards.text: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
cards.flavor: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

cards.name: Happy Ghoul
cards.text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.
cards.flavor: When life gives you snow…

cards.name: Howlfiend
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
cards.flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

cards.name: Howling Commander
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

cards.name: Hyldnir Frostrider
cards.text: Battlecry: Freeze your other minions.
cards.flavor: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

cards.name: Ice Breaker
cards.text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.
cards.flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

cards.name: Mindbreaker
cards.text: Hero Powers are disabled.
cards.flavor: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.

cards.name: Mountainfire Armor
cards.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn,\ngain 6 Armor.
cards.flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

cards.name: Plague Scientist
cards.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
cards.flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

cards.name: Prince Taldaram
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
cards.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

cards.name: Shadowblade
cards.text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
cards.flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

cards.name: Shallow Gravedigger
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your_hand.
cards.flavor: It's hard to put them six feet under when you're three feet tall.

cards.name: Simulacrum
cards.text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
cards.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

cards.name: Stitched Tracker
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
cards.flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

cards.name: Treachery
cards.text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
cards.flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

cards.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
cards.text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

cards.name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
cards.text: [x]After this minion\nsurvives damage,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
cards.flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

cards.name: Vryghoul
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: If it's your\nopponent's turn,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
cards.flavor: It's pronounced VERY GHOUL. Don't let anyone tell you different.

cards.name: Arfus
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Death Knight card to your_hand.
cards.flavor: There must always be a Lick King.

cards.name: Arrogant Crusader
cards.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
cards.flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

cards.name: Avalanche
cards.text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
cards.flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

cards.name: Blood Razor
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDeal 1 damage to all_minions.
cards.flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

cards.name: Chillblade Champion
cards.text: Charge\nLifesteal
cards.flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

cards.name: Corpsetaker
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
cards.flavor: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type.  She'd love for you to join it.

cards.name: Deathaxe Punisher
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Don't fear the Arcanite Reaper.

cards.name: Eternal Servitude
cards.text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
cards.flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

cards.name: Exploding Bloatbat
cards.text: Deathrattle:\nDeal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

cards.name: Ghastly Conjurer
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

cards.name: Grave Shambler
cards.text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

cards.name: Grim Necromancer
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
cards.flavor: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

cards.name: Keening Banshee
cards.text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of_your deck.
cards.flavor: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

cards.name: Light's Sorrow
cards.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

cards.name: Lilian Voss
cards.text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
cards.flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

cards.name: Meat Wagon
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
cards.flavor: Necromancers call it "Meals on Wheels."

cards.name: Night Howler
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes\ndamage, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

cards.name: Phantom Freebooter
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
cards.flavor: There's no such thing as a free boot.

cards.name: Prince Valanar
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
cards.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

cards.name: Professor Putricide
cards.text: After you play a Secret,\nput a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

cards.name: Rattling Rascal
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.
cards.flavor: Don't give up, skeleton!

cards.name: Runeforge Haunter
cards.text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
cards.flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

cards.name: Saronite Chain Gang
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a\ncopy of this minion.
cards.flavor: Desperately needs some alone time.

cards.name: Strongshell Scavenger
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
cards.flavor: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

cards.name: Ticking Abomination
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your minions.
cards.flavor: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

cards.name: Wicked Skeleton
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for_each minion that died_this turn.
cards.flavor: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

cards.name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
cards.text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
cards.flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

cards.name: Bloodworm
cards.text: Lifesteal
cards.flavor: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

cards.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
cards.text: Divine Shield\nAfter a friendly minion loses_Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: He's so hot right now.

cards.name: Bone Baron
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

cards.name: Cobalt Scalebane
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
cards.flavor: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

cards.name: Corpse Raiser
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly\nminion "Deathrattle:\n Resummon this minion."
cards.flavor: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

cards.name: Corpse Widow
cards.text: Your Deathrattle cards cost_(2) less.
cards.flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

cards.name: Death Revenant
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
cards.flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

cards.name: Despicable Dreadlord
cards.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: He's deathspicable.

cards.name: Devour Mind
cards.text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
cards.flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

cards.name: Fatespinner
cards.text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

cards.name: Skelemancer
cards.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
cards.flavor: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

cards.name: Sunborne Val'kyr
cards.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2 Health.
cards.flavor: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

cards.name: Tomb Lurker
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nDeathrattle minion that died\nthis game to your hand.
cards.flavor: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

cards.name: Venomancer
cards.text: Poisonous
cards.flavor: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

cards.name: Voodoo Hexxer
cards.text: Taunt\nFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
cards.flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

cards.name: Webweave
cards.text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
cards.flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

cards.name: Blackguard
cards.text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

cards.name: Bone Drake
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
cards.flavor: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

cards.name: Embrace Darkness
cards.text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nAt the start of your turn,\ngain control of it.
cards.flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

cards.name: Furnacefire Colossus
cards.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
cards.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

cards.name: Moorabi
cards.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

cards.name: Necrotic Geist
cards.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
cards.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

cards.name: Nerubian Unraveler
cards.text: Spells cost (2) more.
cards.flavor: He loves a good yarn.

cards.name: Shadow Essence
cards.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
cards.flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

cards.name: Skulking Geist
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy all\n1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
cards.flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

cards.name: Spectral Pillager
cards.text: [x]Combo: Deal damage equal\nto the number of other cards\nyou've played this turn.
cards.flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

cards.name: Spellweaver
cards.text: Spell Damage +2
cards.flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

cards.name: Spreading Plague
cards.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
cards.flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

cards.name: Tentacles
cards.flavor: Where'd those come from?

cards.name: Abominable Bowman
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon\na random friendly Beast\nthat died this game.
cards.flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

cards.name: Archbishop Benedictus
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
cards.flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

cards.name: Bonemare
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
cards.flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

cards.name: Glacial Mysteries
cards.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into\nthe battlefield.
cards.flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

cards.name: Rotface
cards.text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
cards.flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

cards.name: Sindragosa
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
cards.flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

cards.name: The Lich King
cards.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Death Knight card to your hand.
cards.flavor: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

cards.name: Hadronox
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions that\ndied this game.
cards.flavor: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

cards.name: Obsidian Statue
cards.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

cards.name: Ultimate Infestation
cards.text: [x]Deal $5 damage. Draw\n5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.\nSummon a 5/5 Ghoul.
cards.flavor: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

cards.name: Snowfury Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
cards.flavor: This minion goes all the way to 11!

cards.name: Shifting Scroll
cards.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
cards.flavor: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

cards.name: Arcane Artificer
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its_Cost.
cards.flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

cards.name: Barkskin
cards.text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
cards.flavor: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

cards.name: Candleshot
cards.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
cards.flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

cards.name: Dark Pact
cards.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

cards.name: Dire Mole
cards.flavor: You especially don't want to make a dire mountain out of a dire mole hill.

cards.name: Feral Gibberer
cards.text: After this minion attacks a hero, add a copy of it to_your hand.
cards.flavor: It's certainly not civilized gibbering.

cards.name: Gravelsnout Knight
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for_your opponent.
cards.flavor: The mole of La Mancha rides again!

cards.name: Kingsbane
cards.text: [x]Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
cards.flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

cards.name: Kobold Librarian
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your_hero.
cards.flavor: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

cards.name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

cards.name: Psionic Probe
cards.text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
cards.flavor: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

cards.name: Wax Elemental
cards.text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: Takes double damage from wick-based weapons.

cards.name: Bladed Gauntlet
cards.text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
cards.flavor: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

cards.name: Cavern Shinyfinder
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
cards.flavor: They call her the candled vandal.

cards.name: Cheat Death
cards.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.\nIt costs (2) less.
cards.flavor: Reported.

cards.name: Crushing Hand
cards.text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Overload: (3)
cards.flavor: Shamans always have the firmest handshakes.

cards.name: Drygulch Jailor
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver_Hand Recruits to_your_hand.
cards.flavor: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

cards.name: Drywhisker Armorer
cards.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
cards.flavor: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

cards.name: Evasion
cards.text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
cards.flavor: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

cards.name: Kobold Hermit
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
cards.flavor: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

cards.name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
cards.text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. @(Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

cards.name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
cards.text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. @(Play 2 Elementals to_upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

cards.name: Murmuring Elemental
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers_twice.
cards.flavor: Déjà Dude.

cards.name: Plated Beetle
cards.text: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
cards.flavor: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

cards.name: Potion of Heroism
cards.text: Give a minion Divine_Shield.\nDraw a card.
cards.flavor: Also known as "Liquid Courage."

cards.name: Raven Familiar
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
cards.flavor: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

cards.name: Scorp-o-matic
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 1 or less Attack.
cards.flavor: Back in my day, we had to manually scorp.

cards.name: Sudden Betrayal
cards.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of_its neighbors.
cards.flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

cards.name: Vulgar Homunculus
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
cards.flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

cards.name: Wandering Monster
cards.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
cards.flavor: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

cards.name: Benevolent Djinn
cards.text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to your_hero.
cards.flavor: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

cards.name: Boisterous Bard
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions +1 Health.
cards.flavor: As a kid, she fought with rocks.  Now she fights with ROCK!

cards.name: Cave Hydra
cards.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nthis attacks.
cards.flavor: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

cards.name: Dragon Soul
cards.text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
cards.flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

cards.name: Dragonslayer
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to a Dragon.
cards.flavor: A pair of stout dwarves nearly averted the Cataclysm.

cards.name: Explosive Runes
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
cards.flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

cards.name: Fungal Enchanter
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
cards.flavor: Qualifications: Born with pointy hat.

cards.name: Gilded Gargoyle
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
cards.flavor: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

cards.name: Greedy Sprite
cards.text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
cards.flavor: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

cards.name: Healing Rain
cards.text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
cards.flavor: It's filled with electrolytes!

cards.name: Kobold Apprentice
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all_enemies.
cards.flavor: Horrible secret: The Darkness is immune to Arcane Missiles.

cards.name: Kobold Barbarian
cards.text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
cards.flavor: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

cards.name: Lone Champion
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

cards.name: Primal Talismans
cards.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
cards.flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

cards.name: Reckless Flurry
cards.text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
cards.flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

cards.name: Rummaging Kobold
cards.text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

cards.name: Sewer Crawler
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/3_Giant Rat.
cards.flavor: His clothing is "ratty" in more ways than one.

cards.name: Shrieking Shroom
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random\n1-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: Auditioning for the next Fungal Idol.

cards.name: Sonya Shadowdancer
cards.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
cards.flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

cards.name: Stoneskin Basilisk
cards.text: Divine Shield\n Poisonous
cards.flavor: He got that way from looking into a mirror.

cards.name: Toothy Chest
cards.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
cards.flavor: Do you want to eat an adventurer?  I want to eat an adventurer!

cards.name: Twilight Acolyte
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
cards.flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

cards.name: Twilight's Call
cards.text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions\nthat died this game.
cards.flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

cards.name: Unidentified Elixir
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
cards.flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

cards.name: Unidentified Maul
cards.text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
cards.flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

cards.name: Void Ripper
cards.text: Battlecry: Swap the\nAttack and Health of all_other_minions.
cards.flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

cards.name: Zola the Gorgon
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

cards.name: Astral Tiger
cards.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a\n copy of this minion into_your_deck.
cards.flavor: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

cards.name: Branching Paths
cards.text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a\ncard; Give your minions \n+1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
cards.flavor: Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –\nI took the one less traveled by,\nAnd got eaten by a slime.

cards.name: Call to Arms
cards.text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that\n cost (2) or less.
cards.flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

cards.name: Cataclysm
cards.text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
cards.flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

cards.name: Cursed Disciple
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
cards.flavor: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

cards.name: Duskbreaker
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

cards.name: Ebon Dragonsmith
cards.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
cards.flavor: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

cards.name: Elven Minstrel
cards.text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
cards.flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

cards.name: Fal'dorei Strider
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
cards.flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

cards.name: Flanking Strike
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
cards.flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

cards.name: Hoarding Dragon
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
cards.flavor: Keeps his two cents to himself.

cards.name: Hooked Reaver
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
cards.flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

cards.name: Ironwood Golem
cards.text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
cards.flavor: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

cards.name: Kobold Illusionist
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
cards.flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

cards.name: Kobold Monk
cards.text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero_Powers.
cards.flavor: There is no candle.

cards.name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
cards.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

cards.name: Leyline Manipulator
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
cards.flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

cards.name: Oaken Summons
cards.text: Gain 6 Armor.\nRecruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
cards.flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

cards.name: Shimmering Courser
cards.text: Only you can target\nthis with spells and\nHero Powers.
cards.flavor: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

cards.name: Shroom Brewer
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #4_Health.
cards.flavor: Side effects guaranteed!

cards.name: Sneaky Devil
cards.text: Stealth\nYour other minions have +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

cards.name: The Darkness
cards.text: [x]Starts Dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
cards.flavor: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

cards.name: Twig of the World Tree
cards.text: Deathrattle: Gain 10 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

cards.name: Arcane Tyrant
cards.text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
cards.flavor: Tyrant is such a strong word.

cards.name: Carnivorous Cube
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy\na friendly minion.\nDeathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
cards.flavor: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

cards.name: Corrosive Sludge
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
cards.flavor: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

cards.name: Deck of Wonders
cards.text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
cards.flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

cards.name: Dragon's Fury
cards.text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
cards.flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

cards.name: Fungalmancer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

cards.name: Furbolg Mossbinder
cards.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6_Elemental.
cards.flavor: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

cards.name: Green Jelly
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with_Taunt.
cards.flavor: This card really breaks out of the mold.

cards.name: Guild Recruiter
cards.text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
cards.flavor: The original telemarketer.

cards.name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
cards.text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

cards.name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
cards.text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

cards.name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
cards.text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion.\n@(Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

cards.name: Skull of the Man'ari
cards.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
cards.flavor: Don't trust the skull.

cards.name: Trogg Gloomeater
cards.text: Taunt\nPoisonous
cards.flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

cards.name: Windshear Stormcaller
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir_the_Windlord.
cards.flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

cards.name: Aluneth
cards.text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
cards.flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

cards.name: Crystal Lion
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield\nCosts (1) less for each Silver\nHand Recruit you control.
cards.flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

cards.name: Gather Your Party
cards.text: Recruit a minion.
cards.flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

cards.name: Gemstudded Golem
cards.text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
cards.flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

cards.name: Grumble, Worldshaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
cards.flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

cards.name: Hungry Ettin
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
cards.flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

cards.name: Level Up!
cards.text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
cards.flavor: Ding!\n\nGrats.

cards.name: Possessed Lackey
cards.text: Deathrattle: Recruit a_Demon.
cards.flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

cards.name: Rin, the First Disciple
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
cards.flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

cards.name: Seeping Oozeling
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
cards.flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

cards.name: Spiteful Summoner
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
cards.flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

cards.name: To My Side!
cards.text: [x]Summon an Animal\nCompanion, or 2 if your\ndeck has no minions.
cards.flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

cards.name: Unidentified Shield
cards.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGains a bonus effect in_your hand.
cards.flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

cards.name: Val'anyr
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
cards.flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

cards.name: Corridor Creeper
cards.text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is_in_your hand.
cards.flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

cards.name: Crushing Walls
cards.text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
cards.flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

cards.name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
cards.text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. @(Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

cards.name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
cards.text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

cards.name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
cards.text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. @(Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
cards.flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

cards.name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell\nyou cast on your minions\n this game on this one.
cards.flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

cards.name: Psychic Scream
cards.text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

cards.name: Rhok'delar
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
cards.flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

cards.name: Silver Vanguard
cards.text: Deathrattle: Recruit an\n8-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

cards.name: Temporus
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
cards.flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

cards.name: Geosculptor Yip
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with_Cost_equal_to_your Armor (up to 10).
cards.flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

cards.name: Grand Archivist
cards.text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
cards.flavor: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

cards.name: Grizzled Guardian
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Recruit 2_minions that cost (4)_or_less.
cards.flavor: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

cards.name: Kathrena Winterwisp
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
cards.flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

cards.name: King Togwaggle
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
cards.flavor: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

cards.name: Marin the Fox
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
cards.flavor: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked by opening a Kobolds & Catacombs pack.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked with the BlizzCon 2017 virtual ticket.

cards.name: The Runespear
cards.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell\nand cast it with random targets.
cards.flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

cards.name: Violet Wurm
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
cards.flavor: It's wurms all the way down.

cards.name: Woecleaver
cards.text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
cards.flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

cards.name: Dragoncaller Alanna
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
cards.flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

cards.name: Dragonhatcher
cards.text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
cards.flavor: Which came first?  The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

cards.name: Master Oakheart
cards.text: Battlecry: Recruit a 1, 2, and 3-Attack minion.
cards.flavor: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

cards.name: Sleepy Dragon
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

cards.name: Voidlord
cards.text: [x]Taunt\n Deathrattle: Summon three\n1/3 Demons with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

cards.name: Zap!
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

cards.name: Blazing Invocation
cards.text: Discover a Battlecry minion.
cards.flavor: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

cards.name: Chameleos
cards.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
cards.flavor: He's everyone you want to be.

cards.name: Dark Possession
