cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
cards.flavor: Wanted on three counts of gnomish possession.

cards.name: Hidden Wisdom
cards.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

cards.name: Snap Freeze
cards.text: Freeze a minion.\nIf it's already Frozen, destroy it.
cards.flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

cards.name: Swamp Dragon Egg
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
cards.flavor: Would you eat them in a ditch? Would you eat them with a witch?

cards.name: Swamp Leech
cards.text: Lifesteal
cards.flavor: A face only a druid could love.

cards.name: Town Crier
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

cards.name: Witch's Apprentice
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: Is she a frog that became a witch, or a witch that became a frog?

cards.name: Witchwood Imp
cards.text: [x]Stealth\nDeathrattle: Give a random\n friendly minion +2 Health.
cards.flavor: This wood imp. Stop asking!

cards.name: Archmage Arugal
cards.text: Whenever you draw a minion, add a copy of it to_your hand.
cards.flavor: His worgen children call him Archmage AROO-OO-OO-OO-gal.

cards.name: Baleful Banker
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
cards.flavor: He's gotten big into crypt-o-currency.

cards.name: Book of Specters
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
cards.flavor: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

cards.name: Cathedral Gargoyle
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: Fly like an eagle, drop like a rock.

cards.name: Cheap Shot
cards.text: Echo\n Deal $2 damage to a_minion.
cards.flavor: 50% off. Every shot must go!

cards.name: Curse of Weakness
cards.text: Echo\nGive all enemy minions -2_Attack until your next_turn.
cards.flavor: Warlocks refer to this as a "balance change."

cards.name: Divine Hymn
cards.text: Restore #6 Health to all friendly characters.
cards.flavor: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

cards.name: Earthen Might
cards.text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's an Elemental, add
a random Elemental
to your hand.
cards.flavor: Or it might not.

cards.name: Ghost Light Angler
cards.text: Echo
cards.flavor: BoOooOogrglgrlgrlooOoOoo!

cards.name: Hunting Mastiff
cards.text: Echo\nRush
cards.flavor: "Shh! You're going to start a howl!"

cards.name: Lost Spirit
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: She simply refuses to ask for directions.

cards.name: Pick Pocket
cards.text: Echo\nAdd a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
cards.flavor: He'll pick anyone's pocket, except a gnome's. He'd never stoop so low.

cards.name: Rat Trap
cards.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
cards.flavor: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

cards.name: Rebuke
cards.text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
cards.flavor: When one buke just isn’t enough.

cards.name: Redband Wasp
cards.text: Rush\nHas +3 Attack while damaged.
cards.flavor: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

cards.name: Sound the Bells!
cards.text: Echo\nGive a minion +1/+2.
cards.flavor: Weirdly, the bells stop ringing after 5.

cards.name: Squashling
cards.text: [x]Echo\nBattlecry: Restore #2 Health.
cards.flavor: Everyone hail to the squashling song!

cards.name: Vicious Scalehide
cards.text: Lifesteal\nRush
cards.flavor: They make wonderful pets if you're not allergic to blood loss.

cards.name: Warpath
cards.text: Echo\nDeal $1 damage to all_minions.
cards.flavor: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

cards.name: Witchwood Apple
cards.text: Add three 2/2 Treants to your hand.
cards.flavor: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

cards.name: Woodcutter's Axe
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly Rush minion.
cards.flavor: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

cards.name: Blackwald Pixie
cards.text: Battlecry: Refresh your Hero Power.
cards.flavor: "Oh hi bark."

cards.name: Blink Fox
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
cards.flavor: It's like, SUPER bad at staring contests.

cards.name: Cinderstorm
cards.text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

cards.name: Cutthroat Buccaneer
cards.text: Combo: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: In life he worked as a sword swallower.

cards.name: Druid of the Scythe
cards.text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 4/2 with Rush;\nor a 2/4 with Taunt.
cards.flavor: She's a scythe for sore eyes.

cards.name: Duskbat
cards.text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
cards.flavor: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

cards.name: Face Collector
cards.text: Echo\nBattlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
cards.flavor: “I’ll trade you a Malfurion for an Anduin.”

cards.name: Ferocious Howl
cards.text: Draw a card.\nGain 1 Armor for each card in your hand.
cards.flavor: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?

cards.name: Fiendish Circle
cards.text: [x]Summon four 1/1 Imps.
cards.flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

cards.name: Hench-Clan Thug
cards.text: After your hero attacks, give this minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Hard time making ends meet? Hate the League of Explorers? Get a job henching!

cards.name: Marsh Drake
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Poisonous Drakeslayer for your opponent.
cards.flavor: She would have gotten away with it, if it weren't for that meddling Drakeslayer.

cards.name: Nightmare Amalgam
cards.text: This has all minion types.
cards.flavor: Be all that you can be.

cards.name: Paragon of Light
cards.text: While this minion has 3 or more Attack, it has Taunt and Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: She’s all fun and games until someone rings that stupid bell.

cards.name: Phantom Militia
cards.text: Echo\nTaunt
cards.flavor: Recruited from the Gilnean opera house.

cards.name: Rabid Worgen
cards.text: Rush
cards.flavor: "I'm sorry, son.  We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

cards.name: Ratcatcher
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
cards.flavor: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

cards.name: Ravencaller
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add two\nrandom 1-Cost minions\nto your hand.
cards.flavor: That Friends and Familiars Plan is really paying off!

cards.name: Tanglefur Mystic
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random\n2-Cost minion to each player's hand.
cards.flavor: Doom!  Only doom for you!  But pay good tip, maybe less doom.

cards.name: Vivid Nightmare
cards.text: [x]Choose a friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it with\n1 Health remaining.
cards.flavor: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

cards.name: Voodoo Doll
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Deathrattle: Destroy the chosen minion.
cards.flavor: "Aww, I love it! It even kinda looks like me."

cards.name: Walnut Sprite
cards.text: Echo
cards.flavor: How do you make a walnut laugh? Crack it up!

cards.name: Witch's Cauldron
cards.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: Eye of murloc, ear of bat, foot of Fordring, fur of cat…

cards.name: Witching Hour
cards.text: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
cards.flavor: The gates to the Gilnean pet cemetary MUST remain locked at all times.

cards.name: Arcane Keysmith
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
cards.flavor: She sells all manner of keys: from A flat to G sharp.

cards.name: Bellringer Sentry
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Who are you? Eh, none of my business."

cards.name: Blood Witch
cards.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your_hero.
cards.flavor: Like a sloppy joe for vampires.

cards.name: Dire Frenzy
cards.text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
cards.flavor: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

cards.name: Felsoul Inquisitor
cards.text: Lifesteal\nTaunt
cards.flavor: Everyone expects an inquisition reference.

cards.name: Forest Guide
cards.text: At the end of your turn, both players draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Just sign this waiver, and we'll be on our way."

cards.name: Houndmaster Shaw
cards.text: Your other minions have\nRush.
cards.flavor: They’re good dogs, Tess.

cards.name: Lifedrinker
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to\nthe enemy hero. Restore\n#3 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

cards.name: Mad Hatter
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Randomly toss\n3 hats to other minions.\nEach hat gives +1/+1.
cards.flavor: He's entirely bonkers. All the best goblins are.

cards.name: Militia Commander
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Gain +3_Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: She only needs two commands: "Heel" and "Sic 'em!"

cards.name: Mistwraith
cards.text: Whenever you play an Echo_card, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: One little Mistwraith sitting in a tree. M-I-S-T-I-N-G.

cards.name: Night Prowler
cards.text: Battlecry: If this is the only minion on the battlefield, gain +3/+3.
cards.flavor: Listen to the mew-sic of the night.

cards.name: Sandbinder
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental from your deck.
cards.flavor: The secret is glue.

cards.name: Scaleworm
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
cards.flavor: A popular local alternative to bananas.

cards.name: Spectral Cutlass
cards.text: [x]Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
cards.flavor: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

cards.name: The Glass Knight
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield\nWhenever you restore Health,\ngain Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: She seems scary, but she's got a glass jaw.

cards.name: Totem Cruncher
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Destroy your Totems. Gain +2/+2 for each destroyed.
cards.flavor: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

cards.name: Toxmonger
cards.text: [x]Whenever you play a 1-Cost\nminion, give it Poisonous.
cards.flavor: Not all spiders are born poisonous. That's where he comes in.

cards.name: Unpowered Steambot
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Overpowered Steambot got nerfed.

cards.name: Vex Crow
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n2-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

cards.name: WANTED!
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a Coin to your hand.
cards.flavor: Wanted: Dead or Undead.

cards.name: Wing Blast
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).
cards.flavor: Emeriss uses Wing Blast.  It's super effective!

cards.name: Wispering Woods
cards.text: [x]Summon a 1/1 Wisp for\neach card in your hand.
cards.flavor: We didn't actually fire the guy who named Dark Wispers.

cards.name: Witchwood Piper
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw the lowest\nCost minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: She rids villages of annoying pests, like rats and children.

cards.name: Bewitched Guardian
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Gain +1 Health\n_for each card in your hand._
cards.flavor: Amwitched. Beingwitched. Beenwitched.

cards.name: Bonfire Elemental
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Next step: Marshmallow elementals.

cards.name: Carrion Drake
cards.text: Battlecry: If a minion died this turn, gain Poisonous.
cards.flavor: Fits easily into overhead luggage bins.

cards.name: Chief Inspector
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets.
cards.flavor: Empty your pockets, I know you’ve got a Wandering Monster in there!

cards.name: Clockwork Automaton
cards.text: Double the damage and_healing of your Hero_Power.
cards.flavor: Most mechs are pretty chill, but this one is all wound up.

cards.name: Curio Collector
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Experts worry that curios are a gateway to face-collecting.

cards.name: Deathweb Spider
cards.text: Battlecry: If your hero\ntook damage this turn, gain Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: The itsy bitsy spiders climbed up the village wall. Then came the witch and the spiders ate them all.

cards.name: Dollmaster Dorian
cards.text: Whenever you draw a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
cards.flavor: The children were puzzled by the scratches covering the insides of their toy-boxes.

cards.name: Duskfallen Aviana
cards.text: On each player's turn, the first card played costs (0).
cards.flavor: Someone called her "Tweety". She didn't take it well.

cards.name: Festeroot Hulk
cards.text: After a friendly minion attacks, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: Tree puns arboring.

cards.name: Ghostly Charger
cards.text: Divine Shield\nRush
cards.flavor: Maybe we should have called him Ghostly Rusher.

cards.name: Holy Water
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your_hand.
cards.flavor: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

cards.name: Muck Hunter
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Summon two 2/1_Mucklings for your opponent.
cards.flavor: You think your job mucks.

cards.name: Prince Liam
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all\n1-Cost cards in your deck\n_into Legendary minions.
cards.flavor: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

cards.name: Quartz Elemental
cards.text: Can't attack while damaged.
cards.flavor: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

cards.name: Rotten Applebaum
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Restore #4 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: Key ingredient in Gilnean applesauce.

cards.name: Witchwood Grizzly
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Lose 1 Health for each card in your opponent's hand.
cards.flavor: You know what they say about people with big hands? Small bears.

cards.name: Coffin Crasher
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion from your hand.
cards.flavor: Also does weddings.

cards.name: Cursed Castaway
cards.text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Draw a Combo card from your deck.
cards.flavor: She was an ordinary castaway... until she found that cursed volleyball.

cards.name: Deadly Arsenal
cards.text: Reveal a weapon from your deck. Deal its Attack to all minions.
cards.flavor: Oh look. A Gorehowl.

cards.name: Glinda Crowskin
cards.text: Minions in your hand have_Echo.
cards.flavor:
Summon an unlimited* number of minions!**


*Six
**Wisps

cards.name: Lady in White
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast 'Inner Fire'\n_on every minion in your deck_\n(set Attack equal to Health).
cards.flavor: She was a lady in polka dots until the gnomish laundromat incident.

cards.name: Mossy Horror
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other_minions with 2_or_less_Attack.
cards.flavor: The hills have eyes. And teeth. Pretty bad breath, too.

cards.name: Toki, Time-Tinker
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nLegendary minion from\nthe past to your hand.
cards.flavor: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

cards.name: Azalina Soulthief
cards.text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your_opponent's.
cards.flavor: The cards are always golden on the other side.

cards.name: Blackhowl Gunspire
cards.text:
[x]Can't attack. Whenever
this minion takes damage,
deal 3 damage to a
random enemy.
cards.flavor: The upper windows used to be for aiming. Then we thought: "Hey! MORE cannons!"

cards.name: Bogshaper
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a minion from your_deck.
cards.flavor: The tricky part is getting them to HOLD their shape.

cards.name: Countess Ashmore
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Rush,\nLifesteal, and Deathrattle\ncard from your deck.
cards.flavor: "1 minion… ah, ah, ah! 2 minions… ah, ah, ah! 3 minions… ah, ah, ah!"

cards.name: Darkmire Moonkin
cards.text: Spell Damage +2
cards.flavor: Birds of a feather Moonfire together.

cards.name: Furious Ettin
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: One head is a morning person. The other head hates morning people.

cards.name: Lord Godfrey
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to\nall other minions. If any die,\nrepeat this Battlecry.
cards.flavor: Betrayed the Alliance. Betrayed the Horde. All for 200 achievement points and a sweet, sweet hat.

cards.name: Nightscale Matriarch
cards.text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3_Whelp.
cards.flavor: Everywhelp, get in here!

cards.name: Worgen Abomination
cards.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all other damaged minions.
cards.flavor: Does anyone want to play dead!?

cards.name: Wyrmguard
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
cards.flavor: They think they're trusted guardians. Dragons think they're convenient snacks.

cards.name: Cauldron Elemental
cards.text: Your other Elementals have +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: Decorating tip: Unused cauldrons can make a lovely elemental display.

cards.name: Deranged Doctor
cards.text: Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: Unfortunately, his doctorate is in Murloc Literature.

cards.name: Silver Sword
cards.text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

cards.name: Splintergraft
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly\nminion. Add a 10/10 copy to\nyour hand that costs (10).
cards.flavor: We're going to need some bigger tweezers.

cards.name: Splitting Festeroot
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Splitting Saplings.
cards.flavor: No use crying over split Festeroot,

cards.name: Shudderwock
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat all other Battlecries from cards you played this game (targets chosen randomly).
cards.flavor: Beware the Shudderwock, my son. We're fresh out of vorpal daggers.

cards.name: Emeriss
cards.text: Battlecry: Double the Attack and Health of all minions in_your hand.
cards.flavor: Taste your world's corruption! It tastes like chicken.

cards.name: Beakered Lightning
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Overload: (2)
cards.flavor: Working in a shaman's lab, it's important to be well-grounded.

cards.name: Topsy Turvy
cards.text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
cards.flavor: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

cards.name: Autodefense Matrix
cards.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, give it Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: We call it the bubble machine.

cards.name: Biology Project
cards.text: Each player gains 2_Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: Step 1: Grow giant evil strawberry.\nStep 2: ????\nStep 3: Rule Azeroth!

cards.name: Cloning Device
cards.text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

cards.name: Crystallizer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage\nto your hero. Gain 5 Armor.
cards.flavor: This elf's winning the arms race.

cards.name: Crystology
cards.text: [x]Draw two 1-Attack\nminions from your deck.
cards.flavor: "The Light is neither a particle nor a wave. It's more of a juice, really."

cards.name: Eternium Rover
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain 2_Armor.
cards.flavor: He's all beeps and smiles but you're just a walking pile of armor to him.

cards.name: Faithful Lumi
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.
cards.flavor: They're a little light-headed.

cards.name: Floop's Glorious Gloop
cards.text: Whenever a minion dies this turn, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
cards.flavor: How much gloop could Floop's Gloop gloop if Floop's Gloop\ncould gloop gloop?

cards.name: Glow-Tron
cards.text: Magnetic
cards.flavor: They tried for weeks to make a stealth version, but eventually decided to just let it glow.

cards.name: Goblin Bomb
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage\nto the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: They're Dr. Boom's babies. His baby boomers.

cards.name: Mecharoo
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Jo-E Bot.
cards.flavor: Its project name was KAN-GA. The little one was R-00.

cards.name: Omega Assembly
cards.text: [x]Discover a Mech. If you\nhave 10 Mana Crystals,\nkeep all 3 cards.
cards.flavor: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

cards.name: Pogo-Hopper
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for\neach other Pogo-Hopper\nyou played this game.
cards.flavor: Once you hop, you just can't stop!

cards.name: Secret Plan
cards.text: Discover a Secret.
cards.flavor: The secret is... There is no plan!

cards.name: Shooting Star
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
cards.flavor: Literally starstruck.

cards.name: Skaterbot
cards.text: Magnetic\nRush
cards.flavor: "See you later bot"\n- Jaina

cards.name: Soul Infusion
cards.text: Give the\nleft-most minion in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: People called him a soulless monster. We're not sure this is better.

cards.name: Spirit Bomb
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion and your hero.
cards.flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

cards.name: Test Subject
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any\nspells you cast on this\nminion to your hand.
cards.flavor: “Now I feel... REALLY icky.”

cards.name: The Soularium
cards.text: Draw 3 cards.\nAt the end of your turn, discard them.
cards.flavor: Worst field trip ever.

cards.name: Voltaic Burst
cards.text: Summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: Batteries have three components: Cathode, Anode, and Overload.

cards.name: Astral Rift
cards.text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
cards.flavor: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

cards.name: Bomb Toss
cards.text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Goblin_Bomb.
cards.flavor: Me throw face.

cards.name: Celestial Emissary
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next spell_this turn has Spell_Damage +2.
cards.flavor: Casting with the stars.

cards.name: Cloakscale Chemist
cards.text: Stealth\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: Her suit was fitted using a scale model.

cards.name: Crystalsmith Kangor
cards.text: Divine Shield, Lifesteal\nYour healing is doubled.
cards.flavor: He wants to tank, but Boom always makes him play support.

cards.name: Cybertech Chip
cards.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Mech to your_hand."
cards.flavor: Goes great with Cyber-Salsa.

cards.name: Dead Ringer
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: Shortstop on N'zoth's softball team.

cards.name: Demonic Project
cards.text: Each player transforms a random minion in their hand into a Demon.
cards.flavor: Another group project where Jaraxxus doesn't do any work.

cards.name: Dendrologist
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Treant, Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: He's teaching his little buddy to talk, but all it says is, "I am Gloop."

cards.name: Elementary Reaction
cards.text: Draw a card. Copy it if_you played an Elemental last turn.
cards.flavor: It's just a Tempest Tantrum.

cards.name: Fireworks Tech
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly\nMech +1/+1. If it has\nDeathrattle, trigger it.
cards.flavor: She learns by trial and error.  Mostly error.

cards.name: Galvanizer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the\nCost of Mechs in your\nhand by (1).
cards.flavor: Also known as a power zinc.

cards.name: Goblin Prank
cards.text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3 and Rush. It_dies at end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Ha ha! Glork looks ridiculous! ...Glork? Glork?"

cards.name: Lab Recruiter
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 copies of a friendly minion into your deck.
cards.flavor: Join the chemistry lab! We've got all the solutions.

cards.name: Menacing Nimbus
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random Elemental to your hand.
cards.flavor: Electra stores her elementals in the cloud.

cards.name: Omega Mind
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, your spells\n have Lifesteal this turn.
cards.flavor: Has a side-business selling her lipstick shade, "Omega Red."

cards.name: Research Project
cards.text: Each player draws 2_cards.
cards.flavor: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

cards.name: Rocket Boots
cards.text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

cards.name: Spark Engine
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a \n1/1 Spark with Rush to_your hand.
cards.flavor: He goes by Bzzzzt Aldrin.

cards.name: Toxicologist
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: Double-majoring in culinary sciences was definitely a mistake.

cards.name: Unpowered Mauler
cards.text: Can only attack if you cast a spell this turn.
cards.flavor: After a stressful work day it really needs an outlet.

cards.name: Upgradeable Framebot
cards.flavor: *Awesome arm not included.

cards.name: Venomizer
cards.text: Magnetic\nPoisonous
cards.flavor: Keeps getting banned for toxic behavior.

cards.name: Violet Haze
cards.text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

cards.name: Void Analyst
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Conclusion: Nothing there.

cards.name: Weapons Project
cards.text: Each player equips a 2/3 weapon and\ngains 6 Armor.
cards.flavor: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

cards.name: Whirliglider
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/2_Goblin Bomb.
cards.flavor: She's on a bomb voyage.

cards.name: Augmented Elekk
cards.text: Whenever you shuffle a card into a deck, shuffle in_an extra copy.
cards.flavor: Her friends call her "Shuffleupugus".

cards.name: Brainstormer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Health\nfor each spell in your hand.
cards.flavor: Her hair was always like that.

cards.name: Bronze Gatekeeper
cards.text: Magnetic\nTaunt
cards.flavor: "You have my shield! And the rest of me too."

cards.name: Doubling Imp
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
cards.flavor: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

cards.name: Electra Stormsurge
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn casts twice.
cards.flavor: "The coin? You used me for THE COIN!?"

cards.name: Electrowright
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Carefully assembled from two Electrowrongs.

cards.name: Extra Arms
cards.text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2.\nAdd 'More Arms!' to your\nhand that gives +2/+2.
cards.flavor: All the better to hug you with!

cards.name: Kaboom Bot
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 4_damage to a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: More Boom for your buck.

cards.name: Landscaping
cards.text: Summon two 2/2 Treants.
cards.flavor: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

cards.name: Microtech Controller
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microbots.
cards.flavor: Best-selling author of "How to Make Friends You Completely Control."

cards.name: Necrium Blade
cards.text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.
cards.flavor: Grab death by the handle.

cards.name: Nethersoul Buster
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
cards.flavor: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

cards.name: Omega Medic
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore #10 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

cards.name: SN1P-SN4P
cards.text: Magnetic, Echo\nDeathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Microbots.
cards.flavor: "It's gonna be snip this, snap that. Bada-snip, bada-snap!"

cards.name: Spider Bomb
cards.text: Magnetic\nDeathrattle: Destroy a random_enemy_minion.
cards.flavor: Wrecks a dude, any size. Catches thieves, eats those guys. Look out! Here comes a Spider Bomb!

cards.name: Spring Rocket
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
cards.flavor: Proper grammar would be "sprung rocket."

cards.name: Stargazer Luna
cards.text: After you play the\nright-most card in your hand, draw a card.
cards.flavor: She's Dr. Boom's right-hand mage.

cards.name: Unexpected Results
cards.text: [x]Summon two random\n$2-Cost minions (improved\nby Spell Damage).
cards.flavor: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

cards.name: Academic Espionage
cards.text: Shuffle 10 cards from your opponent's class into your deck. They_cost (1).
cards.flavor: The tenth Pyroblast really felt like overkill.

cards.name: Annoy-o-Module
cards.text: Magnetic\nDivine Shield\nTaunt
cards.flavor: Every ten seconds it asks if you want to update.

cards.name: Blightnozzle Crawler
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Poisonous and Rush.
cards.flavor: "Well we HAD it contained. Then you went and gave it legs!"

cards.name: Coppertail Imposter
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
cards.flavor: It was fitting in fine until it gathered nuts and bolts.

cards.name: Cosmic Anomaly
cards.text: Spell Damage +2
cards.flavor: INGREDIENTS: STAR-STUFF, \nBLUE #1, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS.

cards.name: Explodinator
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
cards.flavor: When it absolutely, positively, has to blow up overnight.

cards.name: Flobbidinous Floop
cards.text: While in your hand, this is a 3/4 copy of the last minion you played.
cards.flavor: Of all the scientists, he has the most knowledge (when measured in volume).

cards.name: Harbinger Celestia
cards.text: [x]Stealth After your opponent plays a minion, become a copy of it.
cards.flavor: She wanders realities, taking on many forms. One was a unicorn princess.

cards.name: Juicy Psychmelon
cards.text: Draw a 7, 8, 9, and\n10-Cost minion\n from your deck.
cards.flavor: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

cards.name: Necromechanic
cards.text: Your Deathrattles trigger twice.
cards.flavor: If at first you don't succeed, die, die again.

cards.name: Omega Defender
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +10 Attack.
cards.flavor: "Surrender. You have 10 mana to comply."

cards.name: Piloted Reaper
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from\nyour hand that costs (2) or less.
cards.flavor: New facial recognition systems keep out the Lorewalkers and Doomsayers.

cards.name: Prismatic Lens
cards.text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
cards.flavor: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

cards.name: Replicating Menace
cards.text: Magnetic\nDeathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
cards.flavor:
It's a car!
*Whomp whomp whomp*
It's a robot!
*Whomp whom-CRUNCH*
It's… three.. smaller robots!

cards.name: Steel Rager
cards.text: Rush
cards.flavor: Rage alongside the machine.

cards.name: Storm Chaser
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell from your deck that costs_(5) or more.
cards.flavor: Best drank after a stiff gale.

cards.name: Thunderhead
cards.text: [x]After you play a card with\nOverload, summon two\n1/1 Sparks with Rush.
cards.flavor: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

cards.name: Weaponized Piñata
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Legendary minion to your_hand.
cards.flavor: It'll be fine.  It's not like they have any reason to hate us.

cards.name: Whizbang the Wonderful
cards.text: You start the game with one of Whizbang's Wonderful Decks!
cards.flavor: From the prestigious Westfall Wonderfuls.

cards.name: Crazed Chemist
cards.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion +4 Attack.
cards.flavor: You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.

cards.name: Dyn-o-matic
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions_except_Mechs.
cards.flavor: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

cards.name: E.M.P. Operative
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mech.
cards.flavor:
"I said this looks like a job for me
So everybody just follow me
'Cause we need a little E.M.P.
'Cause it feels so mechy without me…"

cards.name: Glowstone Technician
cards.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: "Windell! More light!"\n\n"I'm givin' it all she's got, Kangor!"

cards.name: Holomancer
cards.text: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 1/1_copy of it.
cards.flavor: Help me, worthy opponent. You're my only hope.

cards.name: Loose Specimen
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among other friendly minions.
cards.flavor: You leave Deathstalker Rexxar alone in the lab for TWO minutes…

cards.name: Mechano-Egg
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Robosaur.
cards.flavor: When you need more iron in your diet.

cards.name: Myra Rotspring
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\nDeathrattle minion. Also\ngain its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: On her first day on the job, Myra removed the smoke detectors.

cards.name: Myra's Unstable Element
cards.text: Draw the rest of\nyour deck.
cards.flavor: What could go wrong?

cards.name: Necrium Vial
cards.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
cards.flavor: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

cards.name: Omega Agent
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, summon\n_2 copies of this minion.
cards.flavor: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

cards.name: Power Word: Replicate
cards.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
cards.flavor: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

cards.name: Reckless Experimenter
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle minions you\nplay cost (3) less, but die\nat the end of the turn.
cards.flavor: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

cards.name: Rusty Recycler
cards.text: Taunt\nLifesteal
cards.flavor: Ironic. It could recycle others, but not itself.

cards.name: Seaforium Bomber
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
cards.flavor: Dress for the bomb you want, not the bomb you have.

cards.name: Shrink Ray
cards.text: Set the Attack and Health of all minions\nto 1.
cards.flavor: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

cards.name: Subject 9
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw 5 different Secrets from your deck.
cards.flavor: The original clever girl.

cards.name: Supercollider
cards.text: [x]After you attack a minion,\nforce it to attack one\nof its neighbors.
cards.flavor: Boom's Second Law of Motion:\nHIT IT VERY HARD!

cards.name: Wargear
cards.text: Magnetic
cards.flavor: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

cards.name: Zilliax
cards.text: Magnetic\nDivine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Rush
cards.flavor: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.

cards.name: Arcane Dynamo
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (5) or more.
cards.flavor: We ran out of jars, so we started putting brains in other stuff.

cards.name: Damaged Stegotron
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
cards.flavor: Sadly the warranty does not cover fireballs or acts of Boom.

cards.name: Dr. Morrigan
cards.text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

cards.name: Ectomancy
cards.text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.
cards.flavor: "Zerek! Stay out of my lab!"

cards.name: Eureka!
cards.text: Summon a copy of_a_random minion from your hand.
cards.flavor: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

cards.name: Giggling Inventor
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

cards.name: Mechanical Whelp
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Mechanical Dragon.
cards.flavor: "Well if I didn't build the whelp and YOU didn't build the whelp…"

cards.name: Meteorologist
cards.text: Battlecry: For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavor: Some say the world will end in fire. Some say in ice. Why not BOTH?

cards.name: Missile Launcher
cards.text: [x]Magnetic At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other characters.
cards.flavor: We asked, "Where do the missiles go?" and he answered, "Yes."

cards.name: Security Rover
cards.text: [x]Whenever this minion\ntakes damage, summon a\n2/3 Mech with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Insecurity detected. Alerting hugbots.

cards.name: Spark Drill
cards.text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Add two\n1/1 Sparks with Rush to your hand.
cards.flavor: Preferred weapon of Dr. Boom's orthodontist.

cards.name: Tending Tauren
cards.text: [x]Choose One - Give your other minions +1/+1; or Summon two 2/2 Treants.
cards.flavor: That racial bonus to Herbalism finally paid off.

cards.name: The Storm Bringer
cards.text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
cards.flavor: Finally, Electra can work from home.

cards.name: Zerek, Master Cloner
cards.text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
cards.flavor: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

cards.name: Astromancer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\nrandom minion with Cost\nequal to your hand size.
cards.flavor: All signs point to Antonidas.

cards.name: Beryllium Nullifier
cards.text: Magnetic\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
cards.flavor: Why Beryllium? Because it's hard to spell.

cards.name: Boommaster Flark
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon four 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
cards.flavor: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

cards.name: Dreampetal Florist
cards.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (7).
cards.flavor: Unlike gnomes, dreampetals grow more than 3 feet tall.

cards.name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
cards.text: [x]Summon 3 minions from\nyour deck. They attack\nenemy minions, then die.
cards.flavor: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

cards.name: Gloop Sprayer
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of each adjacent minion.
cards.flavor: "Are you sure that's enough gloop?"\n\n"Hold on."

cards.name: Kangor's Endless Army
cards.text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
cards.flavor: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless."\n- Countess Ashmore

cards.name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
cards.text: Change the Cost of minions in your\ndeck to (1).
cards.flavor: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

cards.name: Star Aligner
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control 3\nminions with 7 Health, deal\n7 damage to all enemies.
cards.flavor: "You're a Sagittarius? Me too! Just gimme a sec."

cards.name: Bull Dozer
cards.text: Divine Shield
cards.flavor: Leave them alone for two minutes and they go right into sleep mode.

cards.name: Mulchmuncher
cards.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly Treant that died this game.
cards.flavor: The latest advancement in\nhippo-botany.

cards.name: The Boomship
cards.text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
cards.flavor: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

cards.name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
cards.text: Summon a 1/1 copy of_each minion in your_deck.
cards.flavor: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

cards.name: Mecha'thun
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: If you have no cards in your deck, hand, and battlefield, destroy the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: "Your software will fail. Your users will abandon you. You are already obsolete."

cards.name: Pounce
cards.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

cards.name: Regenerate
cards.text: Restore #3 Health.
cards.flavor: Finally a cure for degenerates.

cards.name: Bloodclaw
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
cards.flavor: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

cards.name: Daring Fire-Eater
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn deals 2_more damage.
cards.flavor: A few hours later he DESTROYED the arena bathrooms.

cards.name: Devastate
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a damaged minion.
cards.flavor: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

cards.name: Grim Rally
cards.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Give your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: There’s no “Aiiiieeee” in “Team.”

cards.name: Gurubashi Chicken
cards.text: Overkill: Gain +5 Attack.
cards.flavor: “Ya hold it by da feet, mon. Den ya THROW.”

cards.name: Gurubashi Offering
cards.text: At the start of your turn, destroy this and gain 8_Armor.
cards.flavor: For a limited time, loa blessings are on a pray-one-get-two deal (on selected sacrifices only).

cards.name: Helpless Hatchling
cards.text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (1).
cards.flavor: It can’t be all that helpful. Not wif dose widdle wings!

cards.name: Saronite Taskmaster
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Free Agent with Taunt for_your opponent.
cards.flavor: Don't even think of asking for time off.

cards.name: Serrated Tooth
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give your minions Rush.
cards.flavor: The tooth hurts, don’t it?

cards.name: Shriek
cards.text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Deal $2 damage to all minions.
cards.flavor: The first warning sign of an oncoming warlock temper tantrum.

cards.name: Spirit of the Dead
cards.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, shuffle a 1-Cost copy of it into your deck.
cards.flavor: Just because you’re dead doesn’t mean you’re off the team.

cards.name: Spirit of the Raptor
cards.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nAfter your hero attacks and\n__kills a minion, draw a card.__
cards.flavor: “Loti! LOTI! Drop it. Drop it Loti! Down! Down Loti!”

cards.name: Spirit of the Rhino
cards.text: Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour Rush minions are Immune the turn they're summoned.
cards.flavor: Where did they get this preposterous hypothesis?

cards.name: Springpaw
cards.text: [x]Rush\nBattlecry: Add a 1/1 Lynx\nwith Rush to your hand.
cards.flavor: The terrible thing about lynxes is lynxes are terrible things. Their teeth are made out of biting, their paws are made out of springs!

cards.name: The Beast Within
cards.text: Give a friendly Beast +1/+1, then it attacks a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: Undoes years of obedience school training.

cards.name: Totemic Smash
cards.text: Deal $2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
cards.flavor: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

cards.name: Wartbringer
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played 2_spells this turn, deal 2_damage.
cards.flavor: “Does she cause them with magic, or just…like have a bucket she brings with her?”

cards.name: Auchenai Phantasm
cards.text: Battlecry: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
cards.flavor: “Okay kids did everyone remember to heal before we left?”

cards.name: Belligerent Gnome
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: Maybe don't put this one in your garden.

cards.name: Big Bad Voodoo
cards.text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion that costs (1) more."
cards.flavor: Murlocs practice Small Nice Voodoo.

cards.name: Bloodsail Howler
cards.text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Pirate you control.
cards.flavor:
They saw their fate a closin'
Aboard a pirate ship
On deck: The Howlin' Hozen
About to let one rip.

cards.name: Booty Bay Bookie
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin.
cards.flavor: Also makes a great librarian. She's really good at fixing books!

cards.name: Cheaty Anklebiter
cards.text: Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Deal 1 damage.
cards.flavor: Famed hunter of the deadly Achilliosaur.

cards.name: Dozing Marksman
cards.text: Has +4 Attack while damaged.
cards.flavor: It's the sleeper of the set.

cards.name: Dragon Roar
cards.text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
cards.flavor: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

cards.name: Firetree Witchdoctor
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: If your tree is on fire - stop, drop, and troll.

cards.name: Flash of Light
cards.text: Restore #4 Health.\nDraw a card.
cards.flavor: Hey! No cameras allowed!

cards.name: Headhunter's Hatchet
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you\ncontrol a Beast, gain\n+1 Durability.
cards.flavor: Zul'jin's primary recruiting tool.

cards.name: Immortal Prelate
cards.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
cards.flavor:
She protec.
She attac.
But most importantly,
she come bac.

cards.name: Likkim
cards.text: Has +2 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: "I double frog dare you!"

cards.name: Revenge of the Wild
cards.text: Summon your Beasts that died this turn.
cards.flavor: My roommates only use Revenge of the Passive Aggressive.

cards.name: Savage Striker
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal to your hero's Attack.
cards.flavor: Ruthless at tribal roasts.

cards.name: Scarab Egg
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Scarabs.
cards.flavor: They say you can’t make an omelet without AHHH THEY’RE EATING MY FACE!

cards.name: Seance
cards.text: Choose a minion. Add_a copy of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: “The spirits spoke to me.”\n"What did they say?"\n"You had lethal two turns ago."

cards.name: Serpent Ward
cards.text: At the end of your turn,\ndeal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: When snakes get sick, they get sent to the Serpent Ward.

cards.name: Sharkfin Fan
cards.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate.
cards.flavor: His taste in soup is criminal.

cards.name: Shieldbreaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Silence an enemy minion with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Can also break up fights, relationships, and unions.

cards.name: Soup Vendor
cards.text: Whenever you restore 3 or more Health to your hero, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Fresh from the floor of the arena!

cards.name: Spellzerker
cards.text: Has Spell Damage +2 while damaged.
cards.flavor: But don’t ask her to use it in a sentence.

cards.name: Spirit of the Bat
cards.text: Stealth for 1 turn.\nAfter a friendly minion dies, give a minion in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah

cards.name: Spirit of the Dragonhawk
cards.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour Hero Power also targets\n adjacent minions.
cards.flavor: Dragonhawks aren’t known for their accuracy.

cards.name: Stolen Steel
cards.text: Discover a weapon (from another class).
cards.flavor: Because Thrall wouldn't lend me Doomhammer.

cards.name: Waterboy
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn costs (0).
cards.flavor: 100% organic troll sweat.

cards.name: Banana Buffoon
cards.text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
cards.flavor: You could say he has a certain appeal.

cards.name: Bloodscalp Strategist
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: “Shoot them in the face” is more of a tactic than a strategy.

cards.name: Bog Slosher
cards.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +2/+2.
cards.flavor: It's the bane of freshly mopped floors everywhere.

cards.name: Drakkari Trickster
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give each player a\ncopy of a random card from\ntheir opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: “It’s an illusion, Malacrass!”

cards.name: Haunting Visions
cards.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less. Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: When you're awake at 3 AM and can't stop thinking about that time you called your teacher "mom."

cards.name: High Priest Thekal
cards.text: Battlecry: Convert all but 1_of your Hero's Health into Armor.
cards.flavor: "…and then I beat him with 1 Health!"

cards.name: Masked Contender
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Secret, cast a Secret from_your deck.
cards.flavor: Knew Mysterious Challenger back when he was a Mysterious Squire.

cards.name: Master's Call
cards.text: Discover a minion in your deck.\nIf all 3 are Beasts,\ndraw them all.
cards.flavor: "Hello? Yes, this is Huffer."

cards.name: Ornery Tortoise
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
cards.flavor: "Dude, where's my pizza?!"

cards.name: Overlord's Whip
cards.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
cards.flavor: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

cards.name: Pyromaniac
cards.text: Whenever your Hero Power_kills a minion, draw a card.
cards.flavor: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

cards.name: Raiding Party
cards.text: Draw 2 Pirates from_your deck.\nCombo: And a weapon.
cards.flavor: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

cards.name: Reckless Diretroll
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discard your lowest Cost card.
cards.flavor: "Reck less!? ME WRECK MOAR!"

cards.name: Sand Drudge
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Zombie with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Loves long walks on the beach, raising the dead, and chocolates.

cards.name: Smolderthorn Lancer
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a damaged enemy minion.
cards.flavor: Here comes “The Smolder.”

cards.name: Spirit of the Frog
cards.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you cast a spell, draw a spell from your deck that costs (1) more.
cards.flavor: It is Wednesday, my dudes.

cards.name: Spirit of the Lynx
cards.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nWhenever you summon a \nBeast, give it +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Much of this shrine’s power lies in the can-opener noise it makes.

cards.name: Splitting Image
cards.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

cards.name: Surrender to Madness
cards.text: [x]Destroy 3 of your Mana\nCrystals. Give all minions\nin your deck +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Never give up, always surrender!

cards.name: Time Out!
cards.text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
cards.flavor: Highly effective against 3 year olds.

cards.name: Untamed Beastmaster
cards.text: Whenever you draw a Beast, give it +2/+2.
cards.flavor: All it takes is a tummy rub.

cards.name: Zentimo
cards.text: [x]Whenever you target a\nminion with a spell, cast it\nagain on its neighbors.
cards.flavor: Serenity. Peace. Many frogs.

cards.name: Arena Fanatic
cards.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Her fantasy Rumble league gives double points for dismemberment.

cards.name: Arena Treasure Chest
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: Yeah it's great, but did you see the Arena Treasure Arms?!

cards.name: Griftah
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover two\ncards. Give one to your\nopponent at random.
cards.flavor: With Griftah in your deck, sometimes you start the game with The Coin!

cards.name: Half-Time Scavenger
cards.text: Stealth\nOverkill: Gain 3 Armor.
cards.flavor: One player's trash is another's “Best In Slot”.

cards.name: High Priestess Jeklik
cards.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

cards.name: Ice Cream Peddler
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Frozen minion, gain 8_Armor.
cards.flavor: I scream, you scream, we all scream when we see a Freeze Mage.

cards.name: Mark of the Loa
cards.text: Choose One - Give a minion +2/+4 and Taunt; or Summon two 3/2 Raptors.
cards.flavor: Ah, yes. Mark. The mightiest Loa.

cards.name: Murloc Tastyfin
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw 2 Murlocs\nfrom your deck.
cards.flavor: He was destined for the soup. One way or another…

cards.name: Predatory Instincts
cards.text: [x]Draw a Beast from your\ndeck. Double its Health.
cards.flavor: Somebody’s been eating their funnel cakes.

cards.name: Regeneratin' Thug
cards.text: At the start of your turn, restore #2 Health to this_minion.
cards.flavor: Regenerates any injury except heartbreak.

cards.name: Rumbletusk Shaker
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Rumbletusk Breaker.
cards.flavor:
Rub a dub dub, three trolls in a tub.
And who do you think dey be?
Da Shaker, Da Breaker, and Da Undatakah.
And all of dem comin' for me.

cards.name: Scorch
cards.text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. Costs (1) if you
played an Elemental
last turn.
cards.flavor: The hoof.\nThe hoof.\nThe hoof is on fire.

cards.name: Spirit of the Shark
cards.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn.\nYour minions' Battlecries\n__and Combos trigger twice._
cards.flavor: It has Stealth, but its ominous theme music keeps giving it away.

cards.name: Spirit of the Tiger
cards.text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After you cast a spell, summon a Tiger with stats equal to its Cost.
cards.flavor: Less of a cantrip and more of a cat-nip.

cards.name: Ticket Scalper
cards.text: Overkill: Draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: Takes ten percent off the top.

cards.name: Walk the Plank
cards.text: Destroy an undamaged minion.
cards.flavor: Pirates will fall for anything.

cards.name: War Master Voone
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy all\nDragons in your hand.
cards.flavor: War Master sounds cooler than Dragon Sitter.

cards.name: Zandalari Templar
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've restored\n10 Health this game, gain\n+4/+4 and Taunt.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
cards.flavor: YOU WERE A TEMPLAR, JONDAR!

cards.name: Arena Patron
cards.text: Overkill: Summon another Arena Patron.
cards.flavor: Everybody with a ticket get in here!

cards.name: Baited Arrow
cards.text: Deal $3 damage. Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
cards.flavor: The card is common, but the steak is rare.

cards.name: Blast Wave
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to_all minions.\nOverkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

cards.name: Dragonmaw Scorcher
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: Caution: Contains Flammable Material

cards.name: Emberscale Drake
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
cards.flavor: The third little dragon made his armor out of adamantite.

cards.name: Farraki Battleaxe
cards.text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

cards.name: Former Champ
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5_Hotshot.
cards.flavor: The last time he saw action, Undertaker ruled the meta.

cards.name: Gral, the Shark
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add it to your hand.
cards.flavor: “… We’re gonna need a bigger board.”

cards.name: Halazzi, the Lynx
cards.text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with 1/1 Lynxes that have_Rush.
cards.flavor: Remember, you’re only as strong as your weakest lynx.

cards.name: Mass Hysteria
cards.text: Force each minion to_attack another random minion.
cards.flavor: Black Friday gets worse every year.

cards.name: Mosh'Ogg Announcer
cards.text: [x]Enemies attacking this\nhave a 50% chance to\nattack someone else.
cards.flavor: One's play-by-play. The other is off-color.

cards.name: Sightless Ranger
cards.text: Rush\nOverkill: Summon two 1/1_Bats.
cards.flavor: An eye for sore sights.

cards.name: Snapjaw Shellfighter
cards.text: [x]Whenever an adjacent\nminion takes damage, this\n_minion takes it instead.
cards.flavor: Nonono, the turtle is the Shellfighter.

cards.name: Treespeaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients.
cards.flavor: Honestly, his delivery is a little wooden.

cards.name: Arcanosaur
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, deal_3_damage_to_all other minions.
cards.flavor: Arcane energy… finds a way.

cards.name: Cannon Barrage
cards.text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nrandom enemy. Repeat\nfor each of your Pirates.
cards.flavor: Why fire your cannons strategically when you can fire them all at once?

cards.name: Heavy Metal!
cards.text: [x]Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal\nto your Armor (up to 10).
cards.flavor: This metal is so heavy it will satisfy your iron requirements for the next year.

cards.name: Krag'wa, the Frog
cards.text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

cards.name: Mojomaster Zihi
cards.text: Battlecry: Set each player to 5 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: Sadly, she was still two credits short of her Witch Doctorate.

cards.name: Rain of Toads
cards.text: Summon three 2/4 Toads with Taunt. Overload: (3)
cards.flavor: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

cards.name: Soulwarden
cards.text: Battlecry: Add 3 random cards you discarded this game to your hand.
cards.flavor: Reduce, reuse, resoul.

cards.name: Stampeding Roar
cards.text: Summon a random Beast from your hand and give it Rush.
cards.flavor: [x]The Gurubashi Arena has an\nextremely permissive policy on\npets in the workplace.

cards.name: Sul'thraze
cards.text: Overkill: You may attack again.
cards.flavor: “Griftah here with de Sul’chop. One chop, you get four damage. Two chops, eight damage - you gonna change de way you fight."

cards.name: A New Challenger...
cards.text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: … Arrives? Approaches? TELL US ALREADY!

cards.name: Amani War Bear
cards.text: Rush\nTaunt
cards.flavor: "I used to farm for hours! Now they just come in packs?"

cards.name: Blood Troll Sapper
cards.text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: Main supplier of Blood Troll Syrup to the Intercontinental Hut of Funnel Cakes.

cards.name: Bwonsamdi, the Dead
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1-Cost\nminions from your deck\nuntil your hand is full.
cards.flavor: Everyone's dying to meet him.

cards.name: Crowd Roaster
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 7 damage\nto an enemy minion.
cards.flavor: Every major show has an opening act to warm up the crowd.

cards.name: Gonk, the Raptor
cards.text: After your hero attacks and_kills a minion, it may_attack again.
cards.flavor: There’s a word for Zandalari druids who refuse to pledge loyalty to Gonk: “Delicious.”

cards.name: Gurubashi Hypemon
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a 1/1 copy of a Battlecry minion. It costs (1).
cards.flavor: Throw your hands in the air!\nThey cost (1).

cards.name: Ironhide Direhorn
cards.text: Overkill: Summon a 5/5_Ironhide Runt.
cards.flavor: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

cards.name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
cards.flavor: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

cards.name: Linecracker
cards.text: Overkill: Double this minion's Attack.
cards.flavor: "Tell me if you’ve heard this one!"

cards.name: Rabble Bouncer
cards.text: Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each enemy minion.
cards.flavor: "Shirt? Shoes!? No service!"

cards.name: Akali, the Rhino
cards.text: Rush\nOverkill: Draw a Rush minion from your deck. Give it +5/+5.
cards.flavor: Most trolls only get to “AAAAHHH!” and don’t make it to the “kali” part.

cards.name: Captain Hooktusk
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Pirates from your deck. Give them Rush.
cards.flavor: "You three! Get in the cannon!"

cards.name: Da Undatakah
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle effects of 3 friendly minions that died this game.
cards.flavor: First Deathrattle: Draw a card.\nSecond: Draw 2 cards.\nThird: Throw Mon'kind off a steel cage and plummet sixteen feet through an announcer’s table.

cards.name: Demonbolt
cards.text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
cards.flavor: Or as it’s known in troll, “De bolt, mon.”

cards.name: Hex Lord Malacrass
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a copy of your opening hand to your hand (except this card).
cards.flavor: Extremely awkward cousin of Hex Lord Malaclass.

cards.name: Hir'eek, the Bat
cards.text: Battlecry: Fill your board with copies of this minion.
cards.flavor: REPEL’S EFFECT WORE OFF.

cards.name: Mosh'Ogg Enforcer
cards.text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: Can’t break the rules if you can’t read ‘em.

cards.name: Princess Talanji
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon all minions from your hand that_didn't start in your_deck.
cards.flavor: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

cards.name: Void Contract
cards.text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
cards.flavor: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

cards.name: Oondasta
cards.text: Rush\nOverkill: Summon a Beast from your hand.
cards.flavor: Adorning devilsaurs with armor and feathers is a respected job in troll culture, although it has a high turnover rate.

cards.name: Hakkar, the Soulflayer
cards.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Corrupted Blood into each player's deck.
cards.flavor: ATTENTION: Do not enter any major city while infected with the Corrupted Blood!

cards.name: Grave Horror
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each spell\nyou've cast this game.
cards.flavor: Trolls can regenerate lost limbs, but this is what they do with the leftovers.

cards.name: Shirvallah, the Tiger
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield, Rush, Lifesteal\n Costs (1) less for each Mana\nyou've spent on spells.
cards.flavor: On bended knee Thekal placed his weapon upon Shirvallah’s altar, whereupon she slowly knocked it off with her paw.

cards.name: Forbidden Words
cards.text: [x]Spend all your Mana.\nDestroy a minion with that\nmuch Attack or less.
cards.flavor: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

cards.name: Lazul's Scheme
cards.text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by\n@ until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
cards.flavor: "What's that you're dreaming?\nYou're weak and you're screaming!\nIt must be my scheming..."

cards.name: Mutate
cards.text: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
cards.flavor: You'll get the transformation you want when murlocs fly.

cards.name: Acornbearer
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Squirrels to your hand.
cards.flavor: You’d be nuts to mess with the squirrel squad.

cards.name: Crystal Power
cards.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage to a minion; or_Restore #5 Health.
cards.flavor: Often used as healing crystals, but also good for throwing at people.

cards.name: Daring Escape
cards.text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
cards.flavor: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

cards.name: Desperate Measures
cards.text: Twinspell\nCast a random Paladin Secret.
cards.flavor: Desperate times call for disparate secrets.

cards.name: Improve Morale
cards.text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, add a Lackey to your hand.
cards.flavor: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

cards.name: Magic Trick
cards.text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less.
cards.flavor: The world is not ready for an illusion of this depth and intricacy!

cards.name: Never Surrender!
cards.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2_Health.
cards.flavor: But sometimes concede.

cards.name: Potion Vendor
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
cards.flavor: Everyone gets two because that’s all she can hold.

cards.name: Rapid Fire
cards.text: Twinspell\nDeal $1 damage.
cards.flavor: Pew! Pew!

cards.name: Ray of Frost
cards.text: Twinspell Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, deal $2 damage to it.
cards.flavor: If you have zero chill, this can help.

cards.name: Shimmerfly
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Hunter spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: Plenty of buzz around this card.

cards.name: Sludge Slurper
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: You can't stop slurping this delicious sludge!

cards.name: Togwaggle's Scheme
cards.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle @ |4(copy, copies) of it into your deck.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
cards.flavor: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

cards.name: Toxfin
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
cards.flavor: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

cards.name: Arcane Servant
cards.flavor: "Would sir like me to punch something?"

cards.name: Crystalsong Portal
cards.text: Discover a Druid minion. If your hand has no minions, keep all 3.
cards.flavor: Experience the draw of the wild!

cards.name: Dalaran Librarian
cards.text: Battlecry: Silence\nadjacent minions.
cards.flavor: Don't make her raise her "shush"!

cards.name: Dreamway Guardians
cards.text: Summon two 1/2 Dryads with Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: They're a nightmare to deal with.

cards.name: EVIL Cable Rat
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Gradually driven to darkness by the promise of unobtainable cheese.

cards.name: EVIL Conscripter
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a Lackey to your hand.
cards.flavor: Kobold! There’s a place you can handle\nI said kobold! When you’re short in the candle\nCast a spell with the E! V! I! L!

cards.name: EVIL Genius
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to add 2 random Lackeys_to_your_hand.
cards.flavor: You do not want to be on the business end of this intellect!

cards.name: Hench-Clan Hogsteed
cards.text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc.
cards.flavor: This is CLEARLY their first rodeo.

cards.name: Keeper Stalladris
cards.text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices_to_your_hand.
cards.flavor: Keeps your choices handy.

cards.name: Khadgar
cards.text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice_as_many.
cards.flavor: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

cards.name: Lightforged Blessing
cards.text: Twinspell\nGive a friendly minion Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: Some might call this a lightforgery.

cards.name: Magic Dart Frog
cards.text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

cards.name: Mana Cyclone
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell you've cast this turn, add a random Mage spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

cards.name: Mana Reservoir
cards.text: Spell Damage +1
cards.flavor: If it soaks too long, it becomes a reservoir hog.

cards.name: Mysterious Blade
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a\nSecret, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: It knows every secret you have left.

cards.name: Plot Twist
cards.text: Shuffle your hand\ninto your deck.\nDraw that many cards.
cards.flavor: It’s coming from inside the deck!

cards.name: Shadowy Figure
cards.text: Battlecry: Transform into a_2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
cards.flavor: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

cards.name: Soul of the Murloc
cards.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc."
cards.flavor: Previously thought nonexistent.

cards.name: Spellbook Binder
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, draw a card.
cards.flavor: You're bound to love his work!

cards.name: Sunreaver Spy
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: She's watching. Always watching.

cards.name: Sweeping Strikes
cards.text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
cards.flavor: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

cards.name: Underbelly Angler
cards.text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
cards.flavor: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

cards.name: Underbelly Fence
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na card from another class,\n_gain +1/+1 and Rush.
cards.flavor: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

cards.name: Vicious Scraphound
cards.text: Whenever this minion\ndeals damage, gain that much Armor.
cards.flavor: It begs for scraps.

cards.name: Witch's Brew
cards.text: Restore #4 Health. Repeatable this turn.
cards.flavor: The swill has eyes!

cards.name: Zayle, Shadow Cloak
cards.text: You start the game with one of Zayle's EVIL Decks!
cards.flavor: E.V.I.L. is the new black.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked by owning all The Dalaran Heist chapters.

cards.name: Arcane Watcher
cards.text: Can't attack unless you have Spell Damage.
cards.flavor: Now his watch has ended… until you have Spell Damage.

cards.name: Blessing of the Ancients
cards.text: Twinspell\nGive your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Arguably the cutest blessing.

cards.name: Bronze Herald
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add two 4/4 Dragons to your hand.
cards.flavor: This is why you shouldn’t shoot the messenger.

cards.name: Call to Adventure
cards.text: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck. Give it +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Even the smallest minion can change the outcome of the game.

cards.name: Clockwork Goblin
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
cards.flavor: They always wind up bombing.

cards.name: Commander Rhyssa
cards.text: Your Secrets trigger twice.
cards.flavor: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

cards.name: Conjurer's Calling
cards.text: Twinspell\nDestroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
cards.flavor: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

cards.name: EVIL Miscreant
cards.text: Combo: Add two random Lackeys to your hand.
cards.flavor: Because there are no G.O.O.D. Miscreants.

cards.name: Faceless Rager
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Health.
cards.flavor: When you need to rage anonymously.

cards.name: Flight Master
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Gryphon for each player.
cards.flavor: Your gryphon will be summoned following a brief safety demonstration.

cards.name: Hench-Clan Sneak
cards.text: Stealth
cards.flavor: He’d be a lot sneakier if he wasn’t trailing 300 yards of power cable…

cards.name: Impferno
cards.text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

cards.name: Lifeweaver
cards.text: Whenever you restore Health, add a random Druid spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: Lifeweaving is all well and good until it's time to cut the thread.

cards.name: Madame Lazul
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\ncopy of a card in your\nopponent's hand.
cards.flavor: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

cards.name: Magic Carpet
cards.text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
cards.flavor: Its small yet fierce riders are affectionately known as rug rats.

cards.name: Messenger Raven
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a\nMage minion.
cards.flavor: You can make a collect CAW!

cards.name: Nine Lives
cards.text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Also trigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Beware the night of the living pets!

cards.name: Rafaam's Scheme
cards.text: Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)
cards.flavor: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

cards.name: Spellward Jeweler
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers until your next turn.
cards.flavor: The fanciest possible way of distracting enemies with shiny things.

cards.name: Ursatron
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
cards.flavor: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

cards.name: Arcane Fletcher
cards.text: [x]Whenever you play a\n1-Cost minion, draw a\nspell from your deck.
cards.flavor: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

cards.name: Archmage Vargoth
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn, cast\na spell you've cast this turn\n(targets are random).
cards.flavor: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

cards.name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
cards.text: Gain @ Armor.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
cards.flavor: “We did it! We blew up the vault!”\n“You mean the vault door?”\n“Oh. The doooor…”

cards.name: Eager Underling
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

cards.name: Hecklebot
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
cards.flavor: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

cards.name: Hench-Clan Burglar
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
cards.flavor: She’s more of a rat burglar.

cards.name: Hench-Clan Hag
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
cards.flavor: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

cards.name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
cards.text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: The Hench-Clan has a point.

cards.name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
cards.text: Spell Damage +3\nYour spells cost (1) more.
cards.flavor: The math checks out!

cards.name: Marked Shot
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to_a_minion. Discover_a_spell.
cards.flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

cards.name: Omega Devastator
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, deal 10\ndamage to a minion.
cards.flavor: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

cards.name: Portal Keeper
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
cards.flavor: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

cards.name: Proud Defender
cards.text: Taunt\nHas +2 Attack while you [x]have no other minions.
cards.flavor: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

cards.name: Scargil
cards.text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
cards.flavor: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

cards.name: Soldier of Fortune
cards.text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
cards.flavor: His allies call him invaluable.

cards.name: Traveling Healer
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield\nBattlecry: Restore #3 Health.
cards.flavor: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

cards.name: Unsleeping Soul
cards.text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

cards.name: Vendetta
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
cards.flavor: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

cards.name: Violet Spellsword
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack\nfor each spell in your hand.
cards.flavor: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

cards.name: Waggle Pick
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
cards.flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

cards.name: Wrenchcalibur
cards.text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your [x]opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

cards.name: Azerite Elemental
cards.text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
cards.flavor: This is some bad blood.

cards.name: Barista Lynchen
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions_to_your_hand.
cards.flavor: "Thanks a latte!"

cards.name: Convincing Infiltrator
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

cards.name: Crystal Stag
cards.text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've restored 5 Health this game, summon a copy of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
cards.flavor: Arrives alone, but usually leaves with a friend just like him.

cards.name: Dalaran Crusader
cards.text: Divine Shield
cards.flavor: Stops for nothing—except donuts.

cards.name: Dragon Speaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
cards.flavor: All of his speeches really drag on.

cards.name: Duel!
cards.text: Summon a minion from each player's deck.\nThey fight!
cards.flavor: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

cards.name: Hagatha's Scheme
cards.text: Deal $@ damage\nto all minions.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
cards.flavor: "All shall suffer!"\n"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."\n"I said ALL!!!"

cards.name: Hunting Party
cards.text: Copy all Beasts in your_hand.
cards.flavor: Not sure I’d call it a good party if everyone ends up beside themselves.

cards.name: Muckmorpher
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform into\na 4/4 copy of a different\nminion in your deck.
cards.flavor: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

cards.name: Recurring Villain
cards.text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
cards.flavor: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

cards.name: Sunreaver Warmage
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
cards.flavor: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

cards.name: Aranasi Broodmother
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, restore\n#4 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

cards.name: Darkest Hour
cards.text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

cards.name: Eccentric Scribe
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon\nfour 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
cards.flavor: Them’s fightin’ words!

cards.name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
cards.flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

cards.name: Mad Summoner
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's\nboard with 1/1 Imps.
cards.flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

cards.name: Oblivitron
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nMech from your hand and\ntrigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

cards.name: Portal Overfiend
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
cards.flavor: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

cards.name: Safeguard
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 0/5\nVault Safe with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

cards.name: Unidentified Contract
cards.text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
cards.flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

cards.name: Unleash the Beast
cards.text: Twinspell\nSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
cards.flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

cards.name: Unseen Saboteur
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
cards.flavor: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

cards.name: Violet Warden
cards.text: Taunt\nSpell Damage +1
cards.flavor: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

cards.name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
cards.flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

cards.name: Blastmaster Boom
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nBoom Bots for each Bomb\nin your opponent's deck.
cards.flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

cards.name: Chef Nomi
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire_Elementals.
cards.flavor: His cooking is always very well done.
