cards.text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, deal 2 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE GROUND!

cards.name: Warglaives of Azzinoth
cards.text: After attacking a minion, your hero may attack again.
cards.flavor: The blades glow green from things unseen, dark dreams whirling in the felfire gleam.

cards.name: Waste Warden
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to\na minion and all others of\nthe same minion type.
cards.flavor: Recycle that can, or you get the cuffs!

cards.name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.
cards.flavor: "I will find you, sky!"

cards.name: Fel Summoner
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Demon from your_hand.
cards.flavor: All's well that ends fel when the fel summoner summons well.

cards.name: Hand of Gul'dan
cards.text: When you play\nor discard this,\ndraw 3 cards.
cards.flavor: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

cards.name: Imprisoned Antaen
cards.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: Can I get a pair of size XXXXXL manacles?

cards.name: Keli'dan the Breaker
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
cards.flavor: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

cards.name: Scavenging Shivarra
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among all_other minions.
cards.flavor: Say what you want but finding a matching set of six swords takes commitment.

cards.name: Skull of Gul'dan
cards.text: Draw 3 cards.\nOutcast: Reduce their Cost by (3).
cards.flavor: A fellow of evil possessed, of most devious shadow. He hath turned on his kin a thousand times, and now, how abhorred in all imagination he is!

cards.name: The Lurker Below
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
cards.flavor: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

cards.name: Bloodboil Brute
cards.text: Rush\nCosts (1) less for each damaged minion.
cards.flavor: Call Gurtogg a brute if you like, but no one else cares about the wounded like he does.

cards.name: Bonechewer Vanguard
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nWhenever this minion takes\ndamage, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

cards.name: Cursed Vagrant
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/5 Shadow with Stealth.
cards.flavor: Little did he know… it was really the talbuk leg that was cursed.

cards.name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
cards.text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
cards.flavor: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”
cards.howToGetGold: Earnable through Trial by Felfire Challenges.

cards.name: Lady Liadrin
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
cards.flavor: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

cards.name: Marsh Hydra
cards.text: [x]Rush After this attacks, add a random 8-Cost minion to your hand.
cards.flavor: Three heads of marsh-mashing, bog-bashing, swamp-stomping fury!

cards.name: Priestess of Fury
cards.text: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: Furious that she only has six warglaives. The Sightless Watcher has eight! The fel is always greener on the other side.

cards.name: Skeletal Dragon
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nAt the end of your turn, add\na Dragon to your hand.
cards.flavor: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

cards.name: Soul Mirror
cards.text: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
cards.flavor: It’s a doppelgang-war!

cards.name: Beastmaster Leoroxx
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Beasts from your hand.
cards.flavor: Father of Rexxar, Champion of the Horde, and Flexxar, Champion of the Gym.

cards.name: Coilfang Warlord
cards.text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon a\n 5/9 Warlord with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Prepare for the staunch conch launch!

cards.name: Deep Freeze
cards.text: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
cards.flavor: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

cards.name: Enhanced Dreadlord
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 5/5\nDreadlord with Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

cards.name: Supreme Abyssal
cards.text: Can't attack heroes.
cards.flavor: Yet, you still feel attacked.

cards.name: Libram of Hope
cards.text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

cards.name: Pit Commander
cards.text: Taunt\nAt the end of your turn, summon a Demon from your deck.
cards.flavor: "Pit! Do as I say!"

cards.name: Ysiel Windsinger
cards.text: Your spells cost (1).
cards.flavor: Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. \n*But not less than (1)

cards.name: Nagrand Slam
cards.text: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
cards.flavor: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

cards.name: Scrapyard Colossus
cards.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossus with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Heap on heapin' on.

cards.name: Desk Imp
cards.flavor: "I feel inky!"

cards.name: Lightning Bloom
cards.text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.\nOverload: (2)
cards.flavor: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

cards.name: Raise Dead
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
cards.flavor: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

cards.name: The Coin
cards.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
cards.flavor: We all thought Kel’Thuzad was looking for Mr. Bigglesworth, not increasing tuition!\n\nObtained by owning 135 Scholomance Academy cards.

cards.name: Adorable Infestation
cards.text: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.
cards.flavor: Some cards are strong by sheer power; others draw strength from love.

cards.name: Animated Broomstick
cards.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Give your other minions Rush.
cards.flavor: "Blimey, that's a Stratocumulus 1000!"

cards.name: Athletic Studies
cards.text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: It's a quick read.

cards.name: Brain Freeze
cards.text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal $3 damage to it.
cards.flavor: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

cards.name: Carrion Studies
cards.text: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: A good read but a little too much fluff.

cards.name: Demon Companion
cards.text: Summon a random Demon Companion.
cards.flavor: Owning a pet can be real hell at times.

cards.name: Demonic Studies
cards.text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

cards.name: Devolving Missiles
cards.text:
[x]Shoot three missiles
at random enemy minions
that transform them into
ones that cost (1) less.
cards.flavor: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

cards.name: Double Jump
cards.text: Draw an Outcast card from your deck.
cards.flavor: The key to every speed run.

cards.name: Draconic Studies
cards.text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Your\nnext one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

cards.name: Felosophy
cards.text: [x]Copy the lowest Cost\nDemon in your hand.\nOutcast: Give both +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

cards.name: First Day of School
cards.text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

cards.name: Frazzled Freshman
cards.flavor: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

cards.name: Gibberling
cards.text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
cards.flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

cards.name: Intrepid Initiate
cards.text: Spellburst: Gain +2_Attack.
cards.flavor: How you like them apples?

cards.name: Lab Partner
cards.text: Spell Damage +1
cards.flavor: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

cards.name: Nature Studies
cards.text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

cards.name: Overwhelm
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
cards.flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

cards.name: Partner Assignment
cards.text: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to_your hand.
cards.flavor: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

cards.name: Pen Flinger
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion. Spellburst: Return this to_your hand.
cards.flavor: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

cards.name: Primordial Studies
cards.text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

cards.name: Secret Passage
cards.text: Replace your hand with 4 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
cards.flavor: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

cards.name: Shield of Honor
cards.text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

cards.name: Sphere of Sapience
cards.text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
look at your top card. You
can put it on the bottom
_and lose 1 Durability.
cards.flavor: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

cards.name: Spirit Jailer
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
cards.flavor: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

cards.name: Tour Guide
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
cards.flavor: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

cards.name: Trueaim Crescent
cards.text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
cards.flavor: You could have just pointed.

cards.name: Wand Thief
cards.text: Combo: Discover a Mage_spell.
cards.flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

cards.name: Wave of Apathy
cards.text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
cards.flavor: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

cards.name: Wolpertinger
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
cards.flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

cards.name: Argent Braggart
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack and Health to match the highest in the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

cards.name: Boneweb Egg
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

cards.name: Cram Session
cards.text: Draw $1 |4(card, cards) (improved by Spell Damage).
cards.flavor: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

cards.name: Cult Neophyte
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next_turn.
cards.flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

cards.name: Diligent Notetaker
cards.text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
cards.flavor: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

cards.name: Gibberling
cards.text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
cards.flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

cards.name: In Formation!
cards.text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
cards.flavor: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

cards.name: Manafeeder Panthara
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

cards.name: Plagiarize
cards.text: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
cards.flavor: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

cards.name: Power Word: Feast
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
cards.flavor: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

cards.name: Rune Dagger
cards.text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
cards.flavor: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

cards.name: Sneaky Delinquent
cards.text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
cards.flavor: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

cards.name: Soul Shear
cards.text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nminion. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
cards.flavor: "Just a little off the sides please."

cards.name: Trick Totem
cards.text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
cards.flavor: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

cards.name: Wandmaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to_your hand.
cards.flavor: She creates incredibly affordable wands of all shapes and sizes. But not owls. The owl is all-natural.

cards.name: Ace Hunter Kreen
cards.text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
cards.flavor: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

cards.name: Bloated Python
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Hapless Handler.
cards.flavor: This is why Scholomance engineering students prefer C++.

cards.name: Ceremonial Maul
cards.text: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
cards.flavor: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

cards.name: Coerce
cards.text: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
cards.flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

cards.name: Combustion
cards.text: [x]Deal $4 damage to\na minion. Any excess\ndamages both neighbors.
cards.flavor: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

cards.name: Educated Elekk
cards.text: [x]Whenever a spell is played, this minion remembers it. Deathrattle: Shuffle the spells into your deck.
cards.flavor: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

cards.name: Enchanted Cauldron
cards.text: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
cards.flavor: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

cards.name: Firebrand
cards.text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all_enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

cards.name: Gift of Luminance
cards.text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a_1/1 copy of it.
cards.flavor: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

cards.name: Goody Two-Shields
cards.text: Divine Shield\nSpellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

cards.name: Instructor Fireheart
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
cards.flavor: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

cards.name: Lord Barov
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
cards.flavor: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

cards.name: Magehunter
cards.text: Rush\nWhenever this attacks a minion, Silence it.
cards.flavor: Hates waiting. Abhors chit chat. Fond of the color purple.

cards.name: Mindrender Illucia
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

cards.name: Molten Blast
cards.text: Deal $2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
cards.flavor: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

cards.name: Playmaker
cards.text: [x]After you play a Rush\nminion, summon a copy\n_with 1 Health remaining.
cards.flavor: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

cards.name: Professor Slate
cards.text: Your spells are Poisonous.
cards.flavor: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

cards.name: Robes of Protection
cards.text: Your minions have "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."
cards.flavor: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

cards.name: School Spirits
cards.text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
cards.flavor: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

cards.name: Self-Sharpening Sword
cards.text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: You no longer have to bring a stack of #2 swords to a test!

cards.name: Shadowlight Scholar
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
cards.flavor: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

cards.name: Shan'do Wildclaw
cards.text: [x]Choose One - Give Beasts in your deck +1/+1; or Transform into a copy of a friendly Beast.
cards.flavor: She holds both an academic post and a scratching post.

cards.name: Speaker Gidra
cards.text: [x]Rush, Windfury Spellburst: Gain Attack and Health equal to the spell's Cost.
cards.flavor: If a teacher lectures in a forest, does she even make a sound?

cards.name: Voracious Reader
cards.text: At the end of your turn, draw until you have 3 cards.
cards.flavor: But how much of it is skimming?

cards.name: Vulpera Toxinblade
cards.text: Your weapon has +2_Attack.
cards.flavor: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

cards.name: Brittlebone Destroyer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero's\nHealth changed this turn,\ndestroy a minion.
cards.flavor: Broke many a leg in drama class.

cards.name: Cabal Acolyte
cards.text: [x]Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
cards.flavor: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

cards.name: Crimson Hothead
cards.text: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
cards.flavor: Has a real passion for spelling.

cards.name: Disciplinarian Gandling
cards.text: [x]After you play a minion,\ndestroy it and summon a\n4/4 Failed Student.
cards.flavor: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

cards.name: Divine Rager
cards.text: Divine Shield
cards.flavor: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

cards.name: Fishy Flyer
cards.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a_4/3 Ghost with Rush to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Like a fish out of water.

cards.name: Glide
cards.text: [x]Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards. Outcast: Your opponent does the same.
cards.flavor: "Come with me, and you'll see, a whole new hand of possibly the same cards."

cards.name: Groundskeeper
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, restore 5 Health.
cards.flavor: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

cards.name: Infiltrator Lilian
cards.text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
cards.flavor: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

cards.name: Krolusk Barkstripper
cards.text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
cards.flavor: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

cards.name: Marrowslicer
cards.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
cards.flavor: Perfect for killing the first boss in Icecrown Citadel.

cards.name: Potion of Illusion
cards.text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
cards.flavor: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

cards.name: Reaper's Scythe
cards.text: [x]Spellburst: Also\ndamages adjacent\nminions this turn.
cards.flavor: Die. Die. Die.

cards.name: Shardshatter Mystic
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: Enjoys a good soul-crushing defeat.

cards.name: Shifty Sophomore
cards.text: Stealth\nSpellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
cards.flavor: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

cards.name: Star Student Stelina
cards.text: [x]Outcast: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand. Shuffle one of them into their deck.
cards.flavor: Cheating is just using your resources wisely.

cards.name: Steeldancer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal to\nyour weapon's Attack.
cards.flavor: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

cards.name: Vilefiend Trainer
cards.text: Outcast: Summon two 1/1_Demons.
cards.flavor: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

cards.name: Wretched Tutor
cards.text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

cards.name: Wyrm Weaver
cards.text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/2 Mana Wyrms.
cards.flavor: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

cards.name: Blessing of Authority
cards.text: Give a minion +8/+8. It_can't attack heroes this turn.
cards.flavor: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

cards.name: Blood Herald
cards.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Red Blood, it gives you wings."

cards.name: Cutting Class
cards.text: [x]Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (1) less per Attack\nof your weapon.
cards.flavor: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

cards.name: Doctor Krastinov
cards.text: Rush\nWhenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
cards.flavor: He is not a medical doctor.

cards.name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
cards.text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
cards.flavor: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

cards.name: High Abbess Alura
cards.text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
cards.flavor: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

cards.name: Lake Thresher
cards.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nthis attacks.
cards.flavor: "There’s a monster in the lake?!" \n"That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

cards.name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Reorder your deck\nfrom the highest Cost card\nto the lowest Cost card.
cards.flavor: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

cards.name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
cards.text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
cards.flavor: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

cards.name: Ogremancer
cards.text: [x]Whenever your opponent\ncasts a spell, summon a 2/2\nSkeleton with Taunt.
cards.flavor: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

cards.name: Ras Frostwhisper
cards.text: At the end of your turn,\ndeal $1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
cards.flavor: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

cards.name: Soulshard Lapidary
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: Also known as a soul sequincer.

cards.name: Steward of Scrolls
cards.text: Spell Damage +1\nBattlecry: Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

cards.name: Teacher's Pet
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a\nrandom 3-Cost Beast.
cards.flavor: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

cards.name: Totem Goliath
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems.\nOverload: (1)
cards.flavor: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

cards.name: Twilight Runner
cards.text: Stealth\nWhenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

cards.name: Vectus
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
cards.flavor: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

cards.name: Void Drinker
cards.text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy\na Soul Fragment in your\ndeck to gain +3/+3.
cards.flavor: It has no taste.

cards.name: Devout Pupil
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
cards.flavor: He considers textbooks Light reading.

cards.name: Forest Warden Omu
cards.text: Spellburst: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

cards.name: Initiation
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
cards.flavor: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

cards.name: Jandice Barov
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies _when it takes damage.
cards.flavor: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

cards.name: Judicious Junior
cards.text: Lifesteal
cards.flavor: She's judge, jury, and junior!

cards.name: Onyx Magescribe
cards.text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

cards.name: Runic Carvings
cards.text: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
cards.flavor: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

cards.name: Smug Senior
cards.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a_5/7 Ghost with Taunt to_your hand.
cards.flavor: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

cards.name: Sorcerous Substitute
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
cards.flavor: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

cards.name: Commencement
cards.text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

cards.name: Cycle of Hatred
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon a 3/3 Spirit for every minion killed.
cards.flavor: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

cards.name: Fel Guardians
cards.text: Summon three 1/2 Demons with Taunt. Costs (1) less whenever a_friendly minion dies.
cards.flavor: What happened after the guardians tripped? They Fel.

cards.name: Keymaster Alabaster
cards.text: [x]Whenever your opponent\n_draws a card, add a copy to_\n_your hand that costs (1).
cards.flavor: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

cards.name: Soulciologist Malicia
cards.text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush.@ (@)
cards.flavor: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

cards.name: Archwitch Willow
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
cards.flavor: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

cards.name: Guardian Animals
cards.text: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give_them Rush.
cards.flavor: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

cards.name: Plagued Protodrake
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

cards.name: Tidal Wave
cards.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to\nall minions.
cards.flavor: "Hang Four, mon!"

cards.name: Troublemaker
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
cards.flavor: "Prepare for trouble!"\n"Make it double!"

cards.name: Turalyon, the Tenured
cards.text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks\na minion, set the defender's\nAttack and Health to 3.
cards.flavor: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

cards.name: Ancient Void Hound
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsteal 1 Attack and Health\nfrom all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

cards.name: Rattlegore
cards.text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
cards.flavor: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

cards.name: Flesh Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
cards.flavor: "A BIG mistake."

cards.name: Survival of the Fittest
cards.text: Give +4/+4 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
cards.flavor: Sometimes the fittest is the one smart enough to not start a fight with seven 6/6 Treants.

cards.name: The Coin
cards.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
cards.flavor: Just one of these could buy you sixty whole seconds of Whack-a-Gnoll bliss.\n\nObtained by owning 135 Madness at the Darkmoon Faire cards.

cards.name: Armor Vendor
cards.text: Battlecry: Give 4 Armor to_each hero.
cards.flavor: "You look like the kind of person that would buy three sets of armor. One to wear, a spare, and a spare for the spare."

cards.name: Felscream Blast
cards.text: Lifesteal. Deal $1 damage to a minion and its neighbors.
cards.flavor: All the souls start running when they see the felscream truck.

cards.name: Glacier Racer
cards.text: Spellburst: Deal 3 damage to all Frozen enemies.
cards.flavor: It’s just not the same without a super suit.

cards.name: Guidance
cards.text: Look at two spells. Add one to your hand or Overload: (1) to get both.
cards.flavor: Plainsrunning will result in disqualification.

cards.name: Illidari Studies
cards.text: Discover an Outcast card. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: "Don't read texts and drive."

cards.name: Mystery Winner
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
cards.flavor: Yeah, but the mystery prize could be anything! Even a boat!

cards.name: Oh My Yogg!
cards.text: [x]Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, they instead cast a random one of the same Cost.
cards.flavor: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

cards.name: Prize Plunderer
cards.text: [x]Combo: Deal 1 damage to\na minion for each other card\nyou've played this turn.
cards.flavor: But he'll never be able to plunder the prize of a happy childhood.

cards.name: Resizing Pouch
cards.text: [x]Discover a card with Cost\nequal to your remaining\nMana Crystals.
cards.flavor: Just don't put a Resizing Pouch inside the Resizing Pouch.

cards.name: Revolve
cards.text: Transform all minions into random ones with the same Cost.
cards.flavor: "Please don't ride the carousel for thirty minutes after eating. After the carousel eats, I mean."

cards.name: Safety Inspector
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle the _lowest-Cost card from your hand into your deck. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "All right, you're good. No sign of safety anywhere."

cards.name: Spiked Wheel
cards.text: Has +3 Attack while your hero has Armor.
cards.flavor: Great for driving, terrible for steering.

cards.name: Throw Glaive
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it dies, add a_temporary copy of this to your hand.
cards.flavor: "No, no, I said SHOW me the glaive!"

cards.name: Wand Thief
cards.text: Combo: Discover a Mage_spell.
cards.flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

cards.name: Wicked Whispers
cards.text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Give your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: When the Old Ones whisper, others will scream.

cards.name: Bola Shot
cards.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and $2 damage to its neighbors.
cards.flavor: On second thought, bolas aren't very good against flying worms.

cards.name: Bumper Car
cards.text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Add two 1/1 Riders with Rush to_your hand.
cards.flavor:
Subject: Re: Unsafe Rides?


bump

cards.name: Cagematch Custodian
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
cards.flavor: Cleans up after a dust up.

cards.name: Clever Disguise
cards.text: Add 2 random spells from another class to_your hand.
cards.flavor: "It me! Togwaggle!"

cards.name: Confection Cyclone
cards.text: Battlecry: Add two 1/2 Sugar Elementals to your_hand.
cards.flavor: "Oh, I thought it was a desert elemental?"

cards.name: Conjure Mana Biscuit
cards.text: Add a Biscuit to your hand that refreshes 2 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: So THIS is why she was AFK.

cards.name: Costumed Entertainer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random\nminion in your hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Just remember not to talk. It breaks character.

cards.name: Crabrider
cards.text: [x]Rush\nBattlecry: Gain Windfury\nthis turn only.
cards.flavor: "Now I'm falling asleep and she's calling a crab…"

cards.name: Deathmatch Pavilion
cards.text: Summon a 3/2 Duelist.\nIf your hero attacked this turn, summon another.
cards.flavor: Worth it for the stuffed toy at the end.

cards.name: E.T.C., God of Metal
cards.text: After a friendly Rush minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: There are Old Gods and then there are Rock Gods.

cards.name: Felfire Deadeye
cards.text: Your Hero Power costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: She only shoots people who pet her cat without asking first.

cards.name: Foxy Fraud
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next\nCombo card this turn costs_(2) less.
cards.flavor: His other street con involves a druid. He can't pull it off without a plant.

cards.name: Game Master
cards.text: The first Secret you play each turn costs (1).
cards.flavor: "You hear the mrgrgls of angry murlocs approaching. Roll initiative!"

cards.name: Guess the Weight
cards.text: Draw a card. Guess if your next card costs more or less to draw it.
cards.flavor: "And then at the last second, I'll shapeshift into cat form!"

cards.name: Imprisoned Phoenix
cards.text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nSpell Damage +2
cards.flavor: It's actually pretty easy to escape chains when you can burst into flames.

cards.name: Landslide
cards.text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. If you're Overloaded, deal $1 damage again.
cards.flavor: "And they win it by a landslide! Wait, where did all the other racers go?"

cards.name: Lunar Eclipse
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Your next spell this turn costs (2) less.
cards.flavor: When the Azeroth is between the Sun and the Moon.

cards.name: Midway Maniac
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Faire owners hate him! Learn his secrets with one simple spell!

cards.name: Minefield
cards.text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all minions.
cards.flavor: Dodge bombs like you're playing Tonksweeper!

cards.name: Open the Cages
cards.text: [x]Secret: When your turn starts, if you control two minions, summon an Animal Companion.
cards.flavor: "Coming out of my cage, and I'm dead by turn nine..."

cards.name: Parade Leader
cards.text: After you summon a Rush minion, give it +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: He's always going to reign on his parade.

cards.name: Prize Vendor
cards.text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card.
cards.flavor: He's just making sure they're real. Authentic tickets taste like strawberry.

cards.name: Redeemed Pariah
cards.text: After you play an Outcast card, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Look at this stick. Look at it!"

cards.name: Redscale Dragontamer
cards.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
cards.flavor: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

cards.name: Ringmaster's Baton
cards.text: After your hero attacks, give a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: A mech, a dragon, and a pirate walk into an Old God's gaping maw. The mech was too crunchy, the dragon was too hot, but the pirate was just right.

cards.name: Rock Rager
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Still doesn't understand why he can't beat Paper Rager.

cards.name: Shadow Clone
cards.text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it with_Stealth.
cards.flavor: "You thought you were attacking face, but it was me! You!"

cards.name: Shenanigans
cards.text: Secret: When your opponent draws their second card in a turn, transform it into a Banana.
cards.flavor: It's not personal, it's just monkey business.

cards.name: Showstopper
cards.text: Deathrattle: Silence all_minions.
cards.flavor: This act is killing it!

cards.name: Snack Run
cards.text: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
cards.flavor: "I'll have two monster churros, a combo box of Yogg-Saron, and one of those turkey legs that ate the Silver Hand Recruit."

cards.name: Solar Eclipse
cards.text: Your next spell this turn casts twice.
cards.flavor: When the Moon is between the Sun and the Azeroth.

cards.name: Stage Hand
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random\nminion in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Holds everything himself because people wouldn't stop touching the prop table.

cards.name: Swindle
cards.text: Draw a spell.\nCombo: And a minion.
cards.flavor: You know, it's probably just cheaper to find a place that sells the plushie…

cards.name: Tenwu of the Red Smoke
cards.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (1) this turn.
cards.flavor: Red, the color of subtlety.

cards.name: Wriggling Horror
cards.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Created to scare. Born to wriggle.

cards.name: Acrobatics
cards.text: Draw 2 cards. If you play both this turn, draw 2 more.
cards.flavor: He soars through the air with the greatest of fleas.

cards.name: Backfire
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. Deal $3 damage to your hero.
cards.flavor: "That's the last time I let an imp spit gasoline into my car."

cards.name: Banana Vendor
cards.text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to each player's hand.
cards.flavor: There's always money in the banana stand.

cards.name: Carnival Barker
cards.text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it +1/+2.
cards.flavor: The barking initially confused faire-goers, so he switched to words.

cards.name: Cloak of Shadows
cards.text: Give your hero Stealth for 1 turn.
cards.flavor: Only worthy emperors can see the cloak.

cards.name: Darkmoon Dirigible
cards.text: Divine Shield\nCorrupt: Gain Rush.
cards.flavor: "It's dirigible? I don’t even know what diriging is!"

cards.name: Deathwarden
cards.text: Deathrattles can't trigger.
cards.flavor: Ride or die takes on a new meaning.

cards.name: Dreadlord's Bite
cards.text: [x]Outcast: Deal 1 damage\nto all enemies.
cards.flavor: When it gets too dull, it's more of a nibble.

cards.name: Feat of Strength
cards.text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +5/+5.
cards.flavor: Generally happens right after the airing of grievances.

cards.name: Free Admission
cards.text: Draw 2 minions. If they're both Demons, reduce their Costs by (2).
cards.flavor: "Quick, get in before someone sees you, or worse, someone sees me."

cards.name: Grand Totem Eys'or
cards.text: At the end of your turn,\ngive +1/+1 to all other Totems in your hand, deck and battlefield.
cards.flavor: Some say it can see straight into the soul of any who dare to read its flavor text...

cards.name: Gyreworm
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3_damage.
cards.flavor: This game of ring toss just got really intense.

cards.name: Imprisoned Celestial
cards.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns.\nSpellburst: Give your minions\nDivine Shield.
cards.flavor: "Look at your deck, now back to me, now back at your deck, now back to me. Who am I? None of your—I'm on a horse."

cards.name: Inconspicuous Rider
cards.text: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck.
cards.flavor: Improvise, adapt, overcome.

cards.name: Ironclad
cards.text: Battlecry: If your hero has Armor, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: With one inch of clearance, Ironclad proved ineffective against speedbumps.

cards.name: K'thir Ritualist
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Add a random 4-Cost minion to your opponent's hand.
cards.flavor: Something evil this way comes… and it's bringing friends over!

cards.name: Line Hopper
cards.text: Your Outcast cards cost (1)_less.
cards.flavor: There are two things Demon Hunters know: hopping, and cutting.

cards.name: Magicfin
cards.text: After a friendly Murloc dies, add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
cards.flavor: The best part is when he pulls Deathwing out of a top hat!

cards.name: Man'ari Mosher
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +3 Attack and Lifesteal this turn.
cards.flavor: "E.T.C. is sooo mainstream. Have you heard of Blight Boar?"

cards.name: Nazmani Bloodweaver
cards.text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nreduce the cost of a random\ncard in your hand by (1).
cards.flavor: Her first stage name, Ketchupweaver, failed to excite the audience.

cards.name: Palm Reading
cards.text: Discover a spell. Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
cards.flavor: Actual palms not required.

cards.name: Petting Zoo
cards.text: Summon a 3/3 Strider. Repeat for each Secret you control.
cards.flavor: Welcome to the petting zoo. DO NOT TOUCH THE ANIMALS.

cards.name: Pit Master
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/2_Duelist.\nCorrupt: Summon two.
cards.flavor: If you win your duel, he'll throw in some of his famous Pit Master barbecue.

cards.name: Relentless Pursuit
cards.text: Give your hero +4 Attack and Immune this turn.
cards.flavor: If you steal a Demon Hunter's corn dog, you'll get what's coming.

cards.name: Revenant Rascal
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mana Crystal for each player.
cards.flavor: Turns out his face really did get stuck that way.

cards.name: Rigged Faire Game
cards.text: Secret: If you didn't take any damage during your opponent's turn, draw 3 cards.
cards.flavor: What's faire is fair.

cards.name: Saddlemaster
cards.text: After you play a Beast, add_a random Beast to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Seat covers. Check.\nRacing stripes. Check.\nCupholder. Check.

cards.name: Sparkjoy Cheat
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Secret, cast it and draw a card.
cards.flavor: "These do NOT spark joy!"

cards.name: Stiltstepper
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card. If you\nplay it this turn, give your\nhero +4 Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: Circus school was tough, sometimes you had to step on people to make it to the top.

cards.name: Stormstrike
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: When your phone is at 5%.

cards.name: Ticket Master
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 Tickets into your deck. When drawn, summon a 3/3 Plush Bear.
cards.flavor: You can exchange one ticket for a bear or save up thousands for a tacky light-up paperweight!

cards.name: Whack-A-Gnoll Hammer
cards.text: After your hero attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Hogger's most hated attraction.

cards.name: Auspicious Spirits
cards.text: Summon a random 4-Cost minion. Corrupt: Summon a 7-Cost minion instead.
cards.flavor: "I'm not AWE-spicious, but I am a little spicious."

cards.name: Balloon Merchant
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +1 Attack and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: It's a shiny yellow balloon! But it can be popped with a single point of damage.

cards.name: Barricade
cards.text: Summon a 2/4 Guard with Taunt. If it's_your only minion, summon another.
cards.flavor: The Alliance and Horde join forces to enforce the fire safety capacity.

cards.name: Cascading Disaster
cards.text: [x]Destroy a random enemy\nminion. Corrupt: Destroy 2.\nCorrupt Again: Destroy 3.
cards.flavor: Please keep all hands, arms, feet and legs inside the ride until the monster comes to a complete stop.

cards.name: Circus Amalgam
cards.text: Taunt\nThis has all minion types.
cards.flavor: Who needs a petting zoo when you have all the creatures right here?!

cards.name: Circus Medic
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health. Corrupt: Deal 4 damage instead.
cards.flavor: Just be careful not to mix this with any creepy eyeballs, tentacles, or dark whispers, and you'll be fine in the morning.

cards.name: Deck of Lunacy
cards.text: Transform spells in your deck into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
cards.flavor: Voted "Most Lunacy" in Madness Monthly magazine.

cards.name: Dunk Tank
cards.text: Deal $4 damage.\nCorrupt: Then deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: "When I said bring a tank to the dungeon, this is not what I had in mind!"

cards.name: Fantastic Firebird
cards.text: Windfury
cards.flavor: The original flaming chicken.

cards.name: Felsaber
cards.text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
cards.flavor: Some drivers rev their engines. This one growls all on its own.

cards.name: Fire Breather
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
cards.flavor: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

cards.name: Hysteria
cards.text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nIt attacks random\nminions until it dies.
cards.flavor: "My mount and I share a special connection. Just not a good one."

cards.name: Kiri, Chosen of Elune
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a Solar Eclipse and Lunar Eclipse to your hand.
cards.flavor: Now, when the Sun is between the Moon and the Azeroth... that's when you've got a problem.

cards.name: Knife Vendor
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
cards.flavor: "They're perfectly safe! These gloves totally aren't hiding any bandages."

cards.name: Lightsteed
cards.text: Your healing effects also give affected minions\n+2_Health.
cards.flavor: All the steed, half the calories.

cards.name: Occult Conjurer
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of_this.
cards.flavor: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

cards.name: Rally!
cards.text: Resurrect a friendly\n1-Cost, 2-Cost, and\n3-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: One for the squire, two for the gnome, three for the glory, and GO, GO, GO!

cards.name: Renowned Performer
cards.text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon two\n__1/1 Assistants with Taunt.__
cards.flavor: Cutting the assistant in half is the easy part.

cards.name: Rinling's Rifle
cards.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a Secret and cast it.
cards.flavor: This rifle needs a muzzle for its muzzle.

cards.name: Steeldancer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random\nminion with Cost equal to\nyour weapon's Attack.
cards.flavor: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

cards.name: Sword Eater
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Equip a 3/2_Sword.
cards.flavor: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

cards.name: The Nameless One
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
cards.flavor: Used to be called "             , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

cards.name: Arbor Up
cards.text: Summon two 2/2 Treants. Give your minions +2/+1.
cards.flavor: If you can’t outrun a tree, you really shouldn’t be here anyway.

cards.name: Carousel Gryphon
cards.text: Divine Shield\nCorrupt: Gain +3/+3 and_Taunt.
cards.flavor: "When does this bird land in Stormwind? I've been flying for hours!"

cards.name: Dark Inquisitor Xanesh
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Corrupt and Corrupted cards in your hand and deck by (2).
cards.flavor: Fear is the mind-killer, and also the name of my wurm.

cards.name: Deck of Chaos
cards.text: Swap the Cost and Attack of all minions in_your deck.
cards.flavor: Yeah, it's chaos, but it's organized chaos.

cards.name: Derailed Coaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Rider with Rush for each minion in your hand.
cards.flavor: So long as it doesn’t kill you, it's considered part of the ride "experience."

cards.name: Envoy Rustwix
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 3\nrandom Prime Legendary\nminions into your deck.
cards.flavor: "Time to roll. Rusted Legion, ho!"

cards.name: Fortune Teller
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Gain +1/+1 for\neach spell in your hand.
cards.flavor: "I see a giant piano in your future."

cards.name: Greybough
cards.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon Greybough."
cards.flavor: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is when you lose a minion.

cards.name: Inara Stormcrash
cards.text: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
cards.flavor: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

cards.name: Keywarden Ivory
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Dual Class spell from any class. Spellburst: Get another copy.
cards.flavor: She learned exactly one thing from her old man: copying.

cards.name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you summon a Silver Hand Recruit, give it Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

cards.name: Malevolent Strike
cards.text:
[x]Destroy a minion.
 Costs (1) less for each
_ card in your deck that
_ didn't start there.
cards.flavor: "I don't know how those got in there, but I'm blaming you two."

cards.name: Mistrunner
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3/+3.\nOverload: (1)
cards.flavor: "Get IT off me!!!"

cards.name: Moonfang
cards.text: Can only take 1 damage at_a time.
cards.flavor: Moonforehead just didn't have the same ring to it.

cards.name: Optimistic Ogre
cards.text: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.
cards.flavor: "What if this goes wrong?" "But what if this goes right?"

cards.name: Ringmaster Whatley
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate.
cards.flavor: His main qualification is that he'll work with anyone. Or anything.

cards.name: Tent Trasher
cards.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly minion with a unique minion type.
cards.flavor: "I consider it redecorating."

cards.name: Trampling Rhino
cards.text: Rush. After this attacks\nand kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

cards.name: Zai, the Incredible
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
cards.flavor: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

cards.name: Bladed Lady
cards.text: [x]Rush\nCosts (1) if your hero has\n6 or more Attack.
cards.flavor: While you were busy learning magic, she studied the blade.

cards.name: Claw Machine
cards.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Draw a minion and give it +3/+3.
cards.flavor: "I have been mrglrlglr… chosen!"

cards.name: Grand Empress Shek'zara
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your deck and draw all copies of it.
cards.flavor: So is a Grand Empress an empress that's grand or an empress's empress?

cards.name: Hammer of the Naaru
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
cards.flavor: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

cards.name: Il'gynoth
cards.text: [x]Lifesteal Your Lifesteal damages the enemy hero instead of healing you.
cards.flavor: Well, that just sounds like damage with extra steps.

cards.name: Maxima Blastenheimer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a minion\nfrom your deck. It attacks the\nenemy hero, then dies.
cards.flavor: Believe it or not, this is only the faire's fourth most dangerous game.

cards.name: Ring Matron
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon\ntwo 3/2 Imps.
cards.flavor: But where does she keep them?

cards.name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw @ |4(card, cards). (Upgraded for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game!)
cards.flavor: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

cards.name: Tickatus
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
cards.flavor: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

cards.name: Darkmoon Tonk
cards.text: Deathrattle: Fire four missiles at random enemies that deal 2 damage each.
cards.flavor: "Ready to roll out!"

cards.name: Expendable Performers
cards.text: Summon seven 1/1 Illidari with Rush. If_they all die this turn, summon seven more.
cards.flavor: When someone gets injured, it's considered performance art.

cards.name: Mask of C'Thun
cards.text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: Hide in the mask, but it will wear you. Through its gleaming eye, you shall see true.

cards.name: Silas Darkmoon
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a direction to rotate all minions.
cards.flavor: "You might remember me from such attractions as 'Being Shot out of a Cannon' or 'That Carousel Ate My Friend.'"

cards.name: Strongman
cards.text: Taunt\nCorrupt: This costs (0).
cards.flavor: Sure, it looks impressive until you realize it's a barrel of helium.

cards.name: Umbral Owl
cards.text: [x]Rush\nCosts (1) less for each spell\nyou've cast this game.
cards.flavor: It sleeps with one eye open.

cards.name: Cenarion Ward
cards.text: Gain 8 Armor.\nSummon a random\n8-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: Don't ask about his right hand. He's still growing into it.

cards.name: G'huun the Blood God
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw 2 cards. They cost Health instead of Mana.
cards.flavor: All of the other Old Gods used to laugh and call him names. They never let poor G'huun join in any Old God games.

cards.name: Grand Finale
cards.text: Summon an 8/8 Elemental. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.
cards.flavor: Considering all the other hazards at Darkmoon, overindulgent pyrotechnics seem downright pedestrian.

cards.name: High Exarch Yrel
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, gain Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt, and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: There can be no neutrality in the fight against darkness.

cards.name: Idol of Y'Shaarj
cards.text: Summon a 10/10 copy_of a minion in your deck.
cards.flavor: Without a tongue, it speaks in seven. Without a voice, its echo lingers forever.

cards.name: Jewel of N'Zoth
cards.text: Summon three friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
cards.flavor: This coveted gem calls for you to free it… and unleash an inescapable prison.

cards.name: Blood of G'huun
cards.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a 5/5 copy of a minion in your deck.
cards.flavor: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

cards.name: Fizzy Elemental
cards.text: Rush\nTaunt
cards.flavor: Loved. Hated. Carbonated.

cards.name: N'Zoth, God of the Deep
cards.text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly minion of each minion type.
cards.flavor: It really just wants to cuddle all the creatures of Azeroth.

cards.name: Runaway Blackwing
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\ndeal 9 damage to a\nrandom enemy minion.
cards.flavor: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

cards.name: C'Thun, the Shattered
cards.text: [x]Start of Game: Break into pieces. Battlecry: Deal 30 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: My grandfather's deck has no useless cards!

cards.name: Darkmoon Rabbit
cards.text: Rush, Poisonous\nAlso damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
cards.flavor: That's no ordinary rabbit! That's the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

cards.name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each Corrupted card you've played this game to your hand. They cost (0) this turn.
cards.flavor: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

cards.name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 10 spells this game, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
cards.flavor: Yogg take the wheel!

cards.name: Desperate Prayer
cards.text: Restore #5 Health to each hero.
cards.flavor: Woah, we're halfway there, woah oh...

cards.name: Flurry (Rank 1)
cards.text: Freeze a random enemy minion. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: Flurry, Flurrier, Flurriest.

cards.name: Serpentbloom
cards.text: Give a friendly\nBeast Poisonous.
cards.flavor: "Awww, it's so cute!" —Famous last words

cards.name: Sigil of Silence
cards.text: At the start of your\nnext turn, Silence all\nenemy minions.
cards.flavor: A little heard-of spell.

cards.name: The Coin
cards.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
cards.flavor: The secret to Red Mana is 11 Barrens Herbs and Spices.\n\nEarnable after purchasing the Forged in the Barrens Tavern Pass.

cards.name: Altar of Fire
cards.text: Destroy the top 3 cards of each deck.
cards.flavor: "I now pronounce you, Crispy and Fried."

cards.name: Athletic Studies
cards.text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: It's a quick read.

cards.name: Cleric of An'she
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, Discover a spell from your deck.
cards.flavor: When it's her turn to cook, she'll always go for a Light sear.

cards.name: Devastate
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to a damaged minion.
cards.flavor: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

cards.name: Final Gasp
cards.text:
[x]Deal $1 damage to a
minion. If it dies, summon
a 2/2 Adventurer with a
random bonus effect.
cards.flavor: And with a raspy whisper, he uttered his final words, "rez plz."

cards.name: Fury (Rank 1)
cards.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: Rank 3 is when your mom uses your middle name.

cards.name: Galloping Savior
cards.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 3/4 Steed with Taunt.
cards.flavor: "Look to my coming on the first light of the third card."

cards.name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
cards.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: "What kind of bedtime story is this?"

cards.name: Guidance
cards.text: Look at two spells. Add one to your hand or Overload: (1) to get both.
cards.flavor: Plainsrunning will result in disqualification.

cards.name: Judgment of Justice
cards.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, set its Attack and Health to 1.
cards.flavor: Look, we don't need a jury. We've got a paladin right here!

cards.name: Kindling Elemental
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: The next\n Elemental you play\ncosts (1) less.
cards.flavor: Burn baby burn. Little inferno!

cards.name: Knight of Anointment
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a\nHoly spell.
cards.flavor: "I dub thee... injured."

cards.name: Meeting Stone
cards.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
add a 2/2 Adventurer
with a random bonus effect
to your hand.
cards.flavor: "I'm clicking on it, but nothing's happening."

cards.name: Nature Studies
cards.text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

cards.name: Paralytic Poison
cards.text: [x]Give your weapon +1\nAttack and "Your hero is\nImmune while attacking."
cards.flavor: The hammer is overkill.

cards.name: Savory Deviate Delight
cards.text: [x]Transform a minion in\nboth players' hands into a\nPirate or Stealth minion.
cards.flavor: "Savory" is a creative way to put it.

cards.name: Spawnpool Forager
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Tinyfin.
cards.flavor: Putting food on the table requires persistence, enthusiasm, and the finest murloc Gloves of Foraging.

cards.name: Sunscale Raptor
cards.text: Frenzy: Shuffle a Sunscale Raptor into your deck with permanent +2/+1.
cards.flavor: And they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they—

cards.name: Tuskpiercer
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw a\nDeathrattle minion.
cards.flavor: It's the Barrens, everything has tusks! The Quilboar have tusks, the boars have tusks, the tusks have tusks.

cards.name: Wailing Vapor
cards.text: [x]After you play an Elemental,\ngain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: If you have The Vapors, your Humors might be imbalanced.

cards.name: Warsong Envoy
cards.text: [x]Frenzy: Gain +1 Attack\nfor each damaged\n character.
cards.flavor: "What do you mean we didn’t give the flag to the Druid?"

cards.name: Whetstone Hatchet
cards.text: After your hero attacks, give a minion in your hand +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: A bad hatchet can make a good spear better.

cards.name: Wildfire
cards.text: [x]Increase the damage of\nyour Hero Power by 1.
cards.flavor: The Barrens were a lush jungle. Then this happened.

cards.name: Wound Prey
cards.text: Deal $1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
cards.flavor: You steal the cranberry juice, you pay the price.

cards.name: Yoink!
cards.text: Discover a Hero Power and set its Cost to (0). Swap back after 2 uses.
cards.flavor: Saying the spell’s name makes it work better.

cards.name: Apothecary's Caravan
cards.text: [x]At the start of your turn,\nsummon a 1-Cost minion\nfrom your deck.
cards.flavor: If you won't bring out your dead, we'll bring the dead to you.

cards.name: Blazing Tentacle
cards.text: +2 Fire Spell Damage.
cards.flavor: It's a Mech!

cards.name: Bulk Up
cards.text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +1/+1 and copy it.
cards.flavor: "For breakfast I usually go for a couple of kodo steaks, 5 Plainstrider eggs and an ice-cold milk to wash it down… all raw."

cards.name: Chain Lightning (Rank 1)
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and a random adjacent one. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: Still better than receiving a chain letter.

cards.name: Condemn (Rank 1)
cards.text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: "I wished you no harm, but for your cruelty, by the light, I condemn you all!" Xyrella shouted, unaware that irony was not her strong suit.

cards.name: Conditioning (Rank 1)
cards.text: Give minions in your hand +1/+1. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: Now drop and give me 5 Mana.

cards.name: Conviction (Rank 1)
cards.text: [x]Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: It was the strength of Cariel's faith that emboldened the defenders of Northwatch that day. Although the strength of her giant hammer didn’t exactly hurt either.

cards.name: Earthen Might
cards.text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's an Elemental, add
a random Elemental
to your hand.
cards.flavor: Or it might not.

cards.name: Earthen Tentacle
cards.text: +2 Nature Spell Damage.
cards.flavor: It's a Mech!

cards.name: Efficient Octo-bot
cards.text: Frenzy: Reduce the cost of cards in your hand by (1).
cards.flavor: Pull the lever, Octo-bot... Wrong leverrrrr!

cards.name: Far Watch Post
cards.text: [x]Can't attack. After your\nopponent draws a card, it\n___costs (1) more (up to 10).__
cards.flavor: Dabu, man. Like, far out.

cards.name: Firemancer Flurgl
cards.text: [x]After you play a Murloc,\ndeal 1 damage to\nall enemies.
cards.flavor: Diss tracks spitting straight fire.

cards.name: Frostbitten Tentacle
cards.text: +2 Frost Spell Damage.
cards.flavor: It's a Mech!

cards.name: Hecklefang Hyena
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
cards.flavor: Even their teeth are laughing at you.

cards.name: Imp Swarm (Rank 1)
cards.text: Summon a 3/2 Imp. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: Not a cauldron, or a mischief, or a cackle, but a swarm.

cards.name: Living Seed (Rank 1)
cards.text: Draw a Beast. Reduce its Cost by (1). (Upgrades when you\nhave 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: Every desert needs an oasis. And it's Guff's duty to make it happen.

cards.name: Lushwater Murcenary
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Murloc, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: You can't just switch sides because they have more fish!

cards.name: Lushwater Scout
cards.text: After you summon a Murloc, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
cards.flavor: Only knows how to play "Careless Murgl" and "Mrgl Mrgl Little Star."

cards.name: Man-at-Arms
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Arch nemesis of the Man-at-Legs.

cards.name: Mark of the Spikeshell
cards.text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nIf it has Taunt, add a copy of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: "I'm DEFINITELY turtle-y enough for the turtle club."

cards.name: Mystical Tentacle
cards.text: +2 Arcane Spell Damage.
cards.flavor: It's a Mech!

cards.name: Oasis Thrasher
cards.text: Frenzy: Deal 3 damage to the enemy Hero.
cards.flavor: Didn't get tickets for E.T.C.'s show.

cards.name: Peon
cards.text: [x]Frenzy: Add a random\nspell from your class\nto your hand.
cards.flavor: Joke's on the peon: the job's never done.

cards.name: Perpetual Flame
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to a random enemy minion. If it dies, recast this. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: Flame is perpetual.*\n\n *Perpetual only applies to current turn.

cards.name: Prospector's Caravan
cards.text: At the start of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Prospectors came from all around in the Golden Legendary Rush of '49.

cards.name: Razorboar
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (3) or less from your hand.
cards.flavor: And this little pig built his house out of VENGEANCE.

cards.name: Razormane Battleguard
cards.text: The first Taunt minion you_play each turn costs_(2) less.
cards.flavor: Where there's a quill, there's a way.

cards.name: Runed Orb
cards.text: Deal $2 damage. Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: The most dangerous Winter Veil ornament.

cards.name: Serena Bloodfeather
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Steal Attack and Health from it until this has more.
cards.flavor: She’s really into networking! After all, she’s introduced countless low-level Horde players to the Spirit Healer.

cards.name: Sigil of Flame
cards.text: At the start of your next turn, deal $3 damage\nto all minions.
cards.flavor: "Huh, it reads F-I-R-E. Wonder what that means?"

cards.name: Sigil of Summoning
cards.text: At the start of your next turn, summon two 2/2 Demons with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Look, summoning ain’t exactly a science. Sometimes it takes a turn.

cards.name: Silverleaf Poison
cards.text: [x]Give your weapon\n"After your hero attacks,\ndraw a card."
cards.flavor: Kazakus has taken to a more direct approach in recent times.

cards.name: Soldier's Caravan
cards.text: [x]At the start of your turn,\nsummon two 1/1\nSilver Hand Recruits.
cards.flavor: It’s a clown car… for JUSTICE!

cards.name: Soothsayer's Caravan
cards.text: At the start of your turn, copy a spell from your opponent's deck to your hand.
cards.flavor: With tusks like those, you might call her a "Toothsayer."

cards.name: South Coast Chieftain
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, deal 2_damage.
cards.flavor: It got the conch. You let it speak!

cards.name: Sword of the Fallen
cards.text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ncast a Secret from\nyour deck.
cards.flavor: Hoarding secrets is no fun, so play each and every one.

cards.name: Talented Arcanist
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next spell_this turn has Spell_Damage +2.
cards.flavor: "Ey mon, you don't get this good just on raw talent ... but it helps."

cards.name: Tame Beast (Rank 1)
cards.text: Summon a 2/2 Beast with Rush. (Upgrades when you\nhave 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: "Trust me laddie, I never eat seafood!"

cards.name: Thorngrowth Sentries
cards.text: Summon two 1/2 Turtles with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Maybe we shouldn't drink from this Oasis…

cards.name: Tinyfin's Caravan
cards.text: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.
cards.flavor: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.

cards.name: Toad of the Wilds
cards.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Nature spell, gain +2 Health.
cards.flavor: "Someday we'll find it. The Oasis Connection. The peons, the caravans, and me."

cards.name: Unstable Shadow Blast
cards.text: [x]Deal $6 damage to a\nminion. Excess damage\nhits your hero.
cards.flavor: "Unstable" usually means "awesome!"

cards.name: Wicked Stab (Rank 1)
cards.text: Deal $2 damage. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
cards.flavor: Always go for the glowing weak point.

cards.name: Arcane Luminary
cards.text: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
cards.flavor: They say true value is the cards you find along the way.

cards.name: Archdruid Naralex
cards.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, add a Dream card to your hand __at the end of your turn.
cards.flavor: "Dormant? I think you mean naptime."

cards.name: Arid Stormer
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush and Windfury.
cards.flavor: Some people chase storms, some storms chase elementals.

cards.name: Barrens Trapper
cards.text: Your Deathrattle cards\ncost (1) less.
cards.flavor: Just add a bit of murloc meat for bait. Beasts can’t resist that special seasoning…

cards.name: Blood Shard Bristleback
cards.text: [x]Lifesteal. Battlecry: If your deck contains 10 or fewer cards, deal 6 damage to a minion.
cards.flavor:
I'm bringin' bristle back (Yeah)
Those other minions don't know how to act (Yeah)
I think it's special how these crystals crack (Yeah)
So turn around and I'll give you a smack (Yeah)
(Take 'em to the Barrens)

cards.name: Crossroads Gossiper
cards.text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Not afraid to spill the tea.

cards.name: Death's Head Cultist
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: Nothing can stop death. Except a Taunt. With Healing.

cards.name: Devouring Ectoplasm
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\n2/2 Adventurer with\n_a random bonus effect.
cards.flavor: When it's on keto, it only devours tauren.

cards.name: Devouring Plague
cards.text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal $4 damage\nrandomly split among\nall enemy minions.
cards.flavor: "How’d we miss this one in Uldum?" —Rafaam

cards.name: Devout Dungeoneer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell.\nIf it's a Holy spell,\nreduce its Cost by (2).
cards.flavor: "Please do smaller pulls, this is my first time healing."

cards.name: Fangbound Druid
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (2).
cards.flavor: Bound by the law of the fang, these druid floss their teeth twice a day.

cards.name: Felrattler
cards.text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Deal 1 damage\nto all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: It only rattles when YOU'RE in danger.

cards.name: Field Contact
cards.text: [x]After you play a Battlecry\nor Combo card, draw a card.
cards.flavor: That's not a knife... THIS is a knife!

cards.name: Frostweave Dungeoneer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Frost spell, summon two 1/1 ___Elementals that Freeze.
cards.flavor: It's a woven blanket of ice but surprisingly comforting.

cards.name: Golem Guard
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Rust in peace.

cards.name: Guff Runetotem
cards.text: After you cast a Nature spell, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
cards.flavor: "By the twins above and twins below, our companions will lead us through." —Guff Runetotem

cards.name: Hog Rancher
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a\n2/1 Hog with Rush.
cards.flavor: Suspiciously close to a Quilboar village.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.

cards.name: Horde Operative
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Secrets and put them into play.
cards.flavor: "We all have our secrets. I mean, your secrets."
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.

cards.name: Kabal Outfitter
cards.text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nGive another random\n_friendly minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Don’t ask her for feathers on your necklace though.

cards.name: Kolkar Pack Runner
cards.text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nsummon a 1/1 Hyena\nwith Rush.
cards.flavor: Is he running or galloping?

cards.name: Mankrik
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Help Mankrik find\nhis wife! She was last seen\nsomewhere in your deck.
cards.flavor: Relives his nightmare every day a new Horde player is created.
cards.howToGet: Unlocked when opening a Forged in the Barrens pack.

cards.name: Mor'shan Watch Post
cards.text: [x]Can't attack. After your\nopponent plays a minion,\n_summon a 2/2 Grunt.
cards.flavor: Pushing into Ashenvale made this post uneventful.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.

cards.name: Nofin Can Stop Us
cards.text: [x]Give your minions\n+1/+1. Give your\nMurlocs an extra +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "I'm having a good time! I don't want to stop at all!"

cards.name: Northwatch Commander
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, draw a minion.
cards.flavor: It was all going well until some Horde had the cunning idea of attacking from the south.

cards.name: Oasis Ally
cards.text: [x]Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.
cards.flavor: As gentle as a bellyflop.

cards.name: Pack Kodo
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast, Secret, or weapon.
cards.flavor: He looks simple, but there’s a lot to unpack.

cards.name: Pride of the Frostwolves
cards.text: Gain 5 Armor. Equip a random weapon.
cards.flavor: Orcs don't say farewell.

cards.name: Primal Dungeoneer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell.\nIf it's a Nature spell, also\ndraw an Elemental.
cards.flavor: They wanted a Mature Dungeoneer. Instead they got this.

cards.name: Ratchet Privateer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: There's a fine line between privateering and pirating. It comes down to tax breaks.

cards.name: Razorfen Beastmaster
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less from your hand.
cards.flavor: It's a homebrew variant on my favorite role-playing game.

cards.name: Rimetongue
cards.text: After you cast a Frost spell, summon a 1/1 Elemental that Freezes.
cards.flavor:
Warriors are red,
Frost spells are blue,
If you're being hit by a weapon,
Rimetongue's got you.

cards.name: Rokara
cards.text: [x]Rush After a friendly minion attacks and survives, give it +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Tread carefully, but stand tall, and stand together. For strength and honor!" —Rokara

cards.name: Seedcloud Buckler
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give your\n_minions Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: A shield to some, a frisbee to others (mainly dogs).

cards.name: Shattering Blast
cards.text: Destroy all Frozen minions.
cards.flavor: Let's be honest, they weren't going to unfreeze anyway.

cards.name: Shroud of Concealment
cards.text: Draw 2 minions. Any played this turn gain Stealth for 1 turn.
cards.flavor: This page left intentionally blank.

cards.name: Sunwell Initiate
cards.text: Frenzy: Gain Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: Initiates don’t study pronunciation until level 20.

cards.name: Swinetusk Shank
cards.text: [x]After you play a Poison,\n_gain +1 Durability.
cards.flavor: Comes with a rack of ribs!

cards.name: Tamsin Roame
cards.text:
[x]Whenever you cast a Shadow
spell that costs (1) or more,
add a copy to your hand
that costs (0).
cards.flavor: In life, Tamsin Roame was one of the Alliance's most promising mages; now she is the Horde's most dangerous warlock.

cards.name: Tavish Stormpike
cards.text: After a friendly Beast attacks, summon a Beast from your deck that costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: "Hurry up, laddie, we're getting overrun! Serpents everywhere! They may look cute, but do ye see the fury in their eyes?!" —Tavish Stormpike

cards.name: Venomous Scorpid
cards.text: Poisonous\nBattlecry: Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: Despite what Guff says, he is NOT a "nice little guy."
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.

cards.name: Vile Call
cards.text: Summon two 2/2 Demons with Lifesteal.
cards.flavor: "We're calling to inform you that your vehicle's insurance is about to expire."

cards.name: Water Moccasin
cards.text: [x]Stealth\nHas Poisonous while you\n_have no other minions.
cards.flavor: You need to be specific when you're ordering waterproof shoewear.

cards.name: Apothecary Helbrim
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Poison to your hand.
cards.flavor: The best way to maintain your health is to poison everyone else.

cards.name: Blademaster Samuro
cards.text: [x]Rush Frenzy: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack _to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Artists paint their visions meticulously on canvas. Blademasters paint with, uh, broader strokes.
cards.howToGetDiamond: Unlockable after purchasing the Forged in the Barrens Tavern Pass.

cards.name: Bru'kan
cards.text: Nature Spell Damage +3
cards.flavor: Bru'kan, his body weathered and weary, felt his time nearing its end. Teaching brave champions like Rokara gives him hope for a greater future.
cards.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 25 Forged in the Barrens Legendary cards.

cards.name: Cariel Roame
cards.text: [x]Rush, Divine Shield Whenever this attacks, reduce the Cost of Holy ______spells in your hand by (1).___
cards.flavor: Cariel had pledged her honor to the Alliance, but when someone matching her long-lost sister's description was sighted at the Crossroads, Cariel did the unthinkable: she abandoned her post and set out across the Barrens.

cards.name: Crossroads Watch Post
cards.text: [x]Can't attack. Whenever your\nopponent casts a spell, give\nyour minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: All of Barrens Chat is recorded and kept on thousands of scrolls stored beneath this tower.

cards.name: Darkspear Berserker
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
cards.flavor: "If I die, I'm taking my hero down with me."

cards.name: Earth Revenant
cards.text: [x]Taunt\n Battlecry: Deal 1 damage\nto all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Have you guys seen a pair of rock legs lying around anywhere?

cards.name: Gruntled Patron
cards.text: Frenzy: Summon another Gruntled Patron.
cards.flavor: Gruntled and whelmed.

cards.name: Injured Marauder
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
cards.flavor: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

cards.name: Invigorating Sermon
cards.text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
cards.flavor: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

cards.name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.
cards.flavor: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!

cards.name: Kurtrus Ashfallen
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Attack the left and\nright-most enemy minions.\nOutcast: Immune this turn.
cards.flavor: Kurtrus fled the Black Temple, abandoning Illidan's cause, to seek revenge against the Dreadlord Anetheron.

cards.name: Oil Rig Ambusher
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.\nIf this entered your hand\n_this turn, deal 4 instead.
cards.flavor: Days since last accident: 0

cards.name: Outrider's Axe
cards.text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

cards.name: Piercing Shot
cards.text: Deal $6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.

cards.name: Plaguemaw the Rotting
cards.text: [x]After a friendly minion with\n Taunt dies, summon a new\n_copy of it without Taunt.
cards.flavor: This is why you should brush your teeth three times a day!
