cards.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

cards.name: Hammer of Wrath
cards.text: Deal $3 damage.\nDraw a card.
cards.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

cards.name: Hellfire
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to ALL_characters.
cards.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

cards.name: Houndmaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
cards.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

cards.name: Keeper of the Grove
cards.text: Choose One - Deal_2_damage; or Silence a minion.
cards.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

cards.name: Kor'kron Elite
cards.text: Charge
cards.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

cards.name: Leeroy Jenkins
cards.text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
cards.flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.

cards.name: Lightspawn
cards.text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
cards.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

cards.name: Mass Dispel
cards.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

cards.name: Master of Disguise
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth.
cards.flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

cards.name: Mindgames
cards.text: Put a copy of\na random minion from\nyour opponent's deck into the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

cards.name: Mogu'shan Warden
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

cards.name: Mortal Strike
cards.text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
cards.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

cards.name: Multi-Shot
cards.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
cards.flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

cards.name: Oasis Snapjaw
cards.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

cards.name: Ogre Magi
cards.text: Spell Damage +1
cards.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

cards.name: Old Murk-Eye
cards.text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

cards.name: Pit Lord
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
cards.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

cards.name: Polymorph
cards.text: Transform a minion\ninto a 1/1 Sheep.
cards.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

cards.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

cards.name: Shadow Madness
cards.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
cards.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

cards.name: Shadowflame
cards.text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

cards.name: Silvermoon Guardian
cards.text: Divine Shield
cards.flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

cards.name: Soul of the Forest
cards.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
cards.flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

cards.name: Spellbreaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Silence a_minion.
cards.flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

cards.name: Stormwind Knight
cards.text: Charge
cards.flavor: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

cards.name: Summoning Portal
cards.text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
cards.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

cards.name: Swipe
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
cards.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

cards.name: Truesilver Champion
cards.text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore #2_Health to it.
cards.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

cards.name: Twilight Drake
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
cards.flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

cards.name: Violet Teacher
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
cards.flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

cards.name: Water Elemental
cards.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
cards.flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

cards.name: Windspeaker
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
cards.flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

cards.name: Abomination
cards.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2\ndamage to ALL characters.
cards.flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

cards.name: Arcanite Reaper
cards.flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

cards.name: Assassin's Blade
cards.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

cards.name: Assassinate
cards.text: Destroy an enemy minion.
cards.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

cards.name: Azure Drake
cards.text: Spell Damage +1\nBattlecry: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

cards.name: Bane of Doom
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to_a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
cards.flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

cards.name: Blessed Champion
cards.text: Double a minion's Attack.
cards.flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

cards.name: Bloodlust
cards.text: Give your minions +3_Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

cards.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

cards.name: Brawl
cards.text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
cards.flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

cards.name: Captain Greenskin
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
cards.flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

cards.name: Darkscale Healer
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
cards.flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

cards.name: Doomguard
cards.text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
cards.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

cards.name: Doomhammer
cards.text: Windfury, Overload: (2)
cards.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

cards.name: Earth Elemental
cards.text: Taunt. Overload: (3)
cards.flavor: Nothing beats rock.

cards.name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
cards.text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
cards.flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

cards.name: Explosive Shot
cards.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
cards.flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

cards.name: Faceless Manipulator
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
cards.flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

cards.name: Fen Creeper
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

cards.name: Frostwolf Warlord
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

cards.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
cards.flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

cards.name: Gurubashi Berserker
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3_Attack.
cards.flavor: No Pain, No Gain.

cards.name: Harrison Jones
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
cards.flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

cards.name: Holy Nova
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
cards.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

cards.name: Holy Wrath
cards.text: Draw a card and deal_damage equal to_its Cost.
cards.flavor: C'mon Molten Giant!!

cards.name: Nightblade
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

cards.name: Nourish
cards.text: Choose One - Gain 2_Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
cards.flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

cards.name: Silver Hand Knight
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2_Squire.
cards.flavor: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

cards.name: Spiteful Smith
cards.text: Enrage: Your weapon has +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

cards.name: Stampeding Kodo
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
cards.flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

cards.name: Starfall
cards.text: Choose One -\nDeal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

cards.name: Stormpike Commando
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
cards.flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

cards.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
cards.text: Stealth
cards.flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

cards.name: Tundra Rhino
cards.text: Your Beasts have Charge.
cards.flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

cards.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
cards.text: Your minions cost (3) more.
cards.flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

cards.name: Archmage
cards.text: Spell Damage +1
cards.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

cards.name: Argent Commander
cards.text: Charge\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

cards.name: Avenging Wrath
cards.text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemy characters.
cards.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

cards.name: Blizzard
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
cards.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

cards.name: Boulderfist Ogre
cards.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

cards.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
cards.text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
cards.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

cards.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
cards.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

cards.name: Dread Infernal
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
cards.flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.
cards.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

cards.name: Force of Nature
cards.text: Summon three 2/2 Treants with\nCharge that die at the end of the turn.
cards.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

cards.name: Frost Elemental
cards.text: Battlecry: Freeze a_character.
cards.flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

cards.name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
cards.flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

cards.name: Hogger
cards.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with_Taunt.
cards.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

cards.name: Holy Fire
cards.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

cards.name: Illidan Stormrage
cards.text: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
cards.flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years. Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

cards.name: Kidnapper
cards.text: Combo: Return a minion to_its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

cards.name: Lord of the Arena
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

cards.name: Priestess of Elune
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

cards.name: Reckless Rocketeer
cards.text: Charge
cards.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

cards.name: Savannah Highmane
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
cards.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

cards.name: Siphon Soul
cards.text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to_your hero.
cards.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

cards.name: Starfire
cards.text: Deal $5 damage.\nDraw a card.
cards.flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

cards.name: Sunwalker
cards.text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
cards.flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

cards.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
cards.text: Deathrattle: Take\ncontrol of a random\nenemy minion.
cards.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

cards.name: Temple Enforcer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
cards.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

cards.name: The Beast
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
cards.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

cards.name: The Black Knight
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
cards.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

cards.name: Windfury Harpy
cards.text: Windfury
cards.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

cards.name: Ancient of Lore
cards.text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore #5 Health.
cards.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

cards.name: Ancient of War
cards.text: Choose One -\n+5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
cards.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

cards.name: Archmage Antonidas
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

cards.name: Baron Geddon
cards.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
cards.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

cards.name: Core Hound
cards.flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

cards.name: Flamestrike
cards.text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

cards.name: Gladiator's Longbow
cards.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
cards.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

cards.name: Gorehowl
cards.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
cards.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

cards.name: Guardian of Kings
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

cards.name: Prophet Velen
cards.text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
cards.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

cards.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
cards.text: Stealth
cards.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

cards.name: Sprint
cards.text: Draw 4 cards.
cards.flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

cards.name: Stormwind Champion
cards.text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
cards.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

cards.name: War Golem
cards.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

cards.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
cards.text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
cards.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

cards.name: Grommash Hellscream
cards.text: Charge\nEnrage: +6 Attack
cards.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

cards.name: Gruul
cards.text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
cards.flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

cards.name: Ironbark Protector
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavor: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

cards.name: Lay on Hands
cards.text: Restore #8 Health. Draw_3 cards.
cards.flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

cards.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
cards.text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.
cards.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 36 Classic Legendary cards.

cards.name: Tirion Fordring
cards.text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3_Ashbringer.
cards.flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

cards.name: Twisting Nether
cards.text: Destroy all minions.
cards.flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

cards.name: Alexstrasza
cards.text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
cards.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

cards.name: Cenarius
cards.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

cards.name: King Krush
cards.text: Charge
cards.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

cards.name: Lord Jaraxxus
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
cards.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

cards.name: Malygos
cards.text: Spell Damage +5
cards.flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

cards.name: Nozdormu
cards.text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their_turns.
cards.flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

cards.name: Onyxia
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
cards.flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

cards.name: Ysera
cards.text: At the end of your turn, add_a Dream Card to_your hand.
cards.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

cards.name: Deathwing
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your_hand.
cards.flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

cards.name: Mind Control
cards.text: Take control of an enemy minion.
cards.flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

cards.name: Pyroblast
cards.text: Deal $10 damage.
cards.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

cards.name: Sea Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: See?  Giant.

cards.name: Mountain Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
cards.flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

cards.name: Molten Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
cards.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

cards.name: Devouring Swarm
cards.text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
Your minions attack it,
then return any that die
 to your hand.
cards.flavor: Collect… essence.

cards.name: Hot Streak
cards.text: Your next Fire spell this turn costs (2) less.
cards.flavor: It's easy to catch fire when you're on fire.

cards.name: Provoke
cards.text: [x]Tradeable\nChoose a friendly minion.\nEnemy minions attack it.
cards.flavor: "Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. I will crush you!"

cards.name: The Coin
cards.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
cards.flavor: Heads: We purge the city. Tails: We don't. Obtained by owning 135 United in Stormwind cards.

cards.name: Blessed Goods
cards.text: Discover a Secret, weapon, or Divine Shield minion.
cards.flavor: Guaranteed to contain no haunted dolls, cursed rings, or corrupted runeblades, or your money back.

cards.name: Call of the Grave
cards.text: [x]Discover a Deathrattle minion. If you have enough Mana to play it, trigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: Necromancy is motivational speaking for the dead.

cards.name: Command the Elements
cards.text: [x]Questline: Play 3 cards with Overload. Reward: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
cards.flavor: What, you expected a shaman to have trouble with a place called STORMWIND?

cards.name: Defend the Dwarven District
cards.text: Questline: Deal damage with 2 spells. Reward: Your Hero Power can target minions.
cards.flavor: Don't shoot until you see the purples of their eyes.

cards.name: Elwynn Boar
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: If you had 7 Elwynn Boars die this game, equip a 15/3 Sword of a ___Thousand Truths.@ (@/7)
cards.flavor: Be grateful we lowered the requirement from 65,340,285.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the United in Stormwind Reward Track.

cards.name: Final Showdown
cards.text: Questline: Draw 4 cards in one turn. Reward: Reduce the Cost of the cards drawn by (1).
cards.flavor: Finally. The last Hearthstone card.

cards.name: Find the Imposter
cards.text: Questline: Play 2\nSI:7 cards.\nReward: Add a Spy Gizmo to your hand.
cards.flavor: My money is on the evil advisor to the king.

cards.name: First Flame
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
cards.flavor: You never forget your first love: fire.

cards.name: Investment Opportunity
cards.text: [x]Draw an Overload card.
cards.flavor: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

cards.name: Leatherworking Kit
cards.text:
[x]After three friendly
Beasts die, draw a Beast
and give it +1/+1.
Lose 1 Durability.
cards.flavor: Combining taxidermy and tailoring.

cards.name: Lost in the Park
cards.text: Questline: Gain 4 Attack with your hero. Reward: Gain 5 Armor.
cards.flavor: Mister, have you seen my Archdruid?

cards.name: Metamorfin
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: If you've cast a Fel spell this turn, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Always wanted to be the green ranger.

cards.name: Overdraft
cards.text: [x]Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
cards.flavor: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

cards.name: Peasant
cards.text: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Better pay them, or they'll join the Defias.

cards.name: Prismatic Jewel Kit
cards.text: [x]After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give minions in your hand +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
cards.flavor: The divine trick to jewelcrafting is tumbling your own rocks.

cards.name: Raid the Docks
cards.text: [x]Questline: Play 3 Pirates.\nReward: Draw a weapon.
cards.flavor: Winning the annual Ratchet Regatta really went to their heads.

cards.name: Rise to the Occasion
cards.text: Questline: Play 3 different 1-Cost cards.\nReward: Equip a 1/4 Light's Justice.
cards.flavor: Faith is never lost, only repurposed.

cards.name: Seek Guidance
cards.text: [x]Questline: Play a 2, 3, and 4-Cost card. Reward: Discover a card from your deck.
cards.flavor: Xyrella was looking for spiritual guidance but found deck-building tips instead.

cards.name: Shard of the Naaru
cards.text: Tradeable\nSilence all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: Fell from the sky, huh? I'll give you ten gold.

cards.name: Shiver Their Timbers!
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you control a Pirate, deal $5 instead.
cards.flavor: Who knew there was overlap between pirates and lumberjacks?

cards.name: SI:7 Extortion
cards.text: Tradeable\nDeal $3 damage to an undamaged character.
cards.flavor: "It's a dangerous world out there. It'd be a shame if your protection insurance were to suddenly run out…"

cards.name: Sigil of Alacrity
cards.text: [x]At the start of your next\nturn, draw a card and\n_reduce its Cost by (1).
cards.flavor: Red means stop. Purple means GO REALLY FAST.

cards.name: Sorcerer's Gambit
cards.text: Questline: Cast a Fire, Frost, and Arcane spell. Reward: Draw a spell.
cards.flavor: After "the incident," the Stockades really had to reevaluate their anti-mage protocols.

cards.name: Sow the Soil
cards.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1 Attack; or_ Summon a 2/2 Treant.
cards.flavor: "I'M NOT A TAILOR!"

cards.name: Stockades Guard
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a\nfriendly minion Taunt.
cards.flavor: "You there! Defend this prison with your life. It's my break."

cards.name: The Demon Seed
cards.text: [x]Questline: Take 8 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
cards.flavor: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

cards.name: Touch of the Nathrezim
cards.text: [x]Deal $2 damage to a\nminion. If it dies, restore\n4 Health to your hero.
cards.flavor: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

cards.name: Vibrant Squirrel
cards.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns\ninto your deck. When drawn,\nsummon a 2/1 Squirrel.
cards.flavor: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

cards.name: Voidtouched Attendant
cards.text: Both heroes take one extra damage from all sources.
cards.flavor: Don't TOUCH the Void. You don't know where it's been.

cards.name: Auctioneer Jaxon
cards.text: [x]Whenever you Trade,\nDiscover a card from your\n_deck to draw instead.
cards.flavor: "Who's up for a brand-new wisp? This thing's in perfect condition, folks! Never been played..."

cards.name: Auctionhouse Gavel
cards.text: [x]After your hero attacks, reduce the Cost of a Battlecry minion in your hand by (1).
cards.flavor: "I want to be a judge! Or an auctioneer! Look, all I want is one of those sweet, tiny hammers."

cards.name: Bloodbound Imp
cards.text: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your_hero.
cards.flavor: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

cards.name: Bolner Hammerbeak
cards.text: [x]After you play a Battlecry\nminion, repeat the first\n__Battlecry played this turn._
cards.flavor: Show him how to do something once, and he can do it a thousand times. This turn.

cards.name: Celestial Ink Set
cards.text:
[x]After you spend 5 Mana on
spells, reduce the cost of a
spell in your hand by (5).
Lose 1 Durability.
cards.flavor:
"Dear Mother,
I have a lot of spells and burst in my hand. You should maybe run more armor and healing next time.
Cordially,
Your child"

cards.name: City Tax
cards.text: [x]Tradeable\nLifesteal. Deal $1 damage\nto all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: "Look pal, I don't care what kind of legion you saved the world from, pay up or else."

cards.name: Composting
cards.text: Give your minions\n"Deathrattle: Draw\n__a card."
cards.flavor: The Treants really give their bodies to the cause.

cards.name: Deeprun Engineer
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Mech. It costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: Deeprun Tram instructions: 300,000 pieces, 600,000 steps.

cards.name: Encumbered Pack Mule
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, add a\n_copy of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Now I can pick up EVERY knick-knack."
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the United in Stormwind Reward Track.

cards.name: Fel Barrage
cards.text: [x]Deal $2 damage to\nthe lowest Health\nenemy, twice.
cards.flavor: Kurtrus leapt over a tombstone towards the demonic invaders, yelling "PEW! PEW!" as he shot them down with fel magic.

cards.name: Florist
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nreduce the cost of a Nature\n_spell in your hand by (1).
cards.flavor:
Trade district.
Trade district a shop.
Color Legendary.
Color Legendary golden.
Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose.

cards.name: Garrote
cards.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to the
enemy hero. Shuffle 3
Bleeds into your deck that
deal $2 more when drawn.
cards.flavor: "I don't have money… but what I do have is a particular set of skills."

cards.name: Harbor Scamp
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate.
cards.flavor: Hey, that gnome looks awfully fishy…

cards.name: Ignite
cards.text: Deal $@ damage. Shuffle an Ignite into\nyour deck that deals\none more damage.
cards.flavor: "So there I was in the Deadmines, I had VanCleef by the throat, and I was just about to let him have it when... <sniff> What's that smell?"

cards.name: Maestra of the Masquerade
cards.text: You start the game as a different class until you play a Rogue card.
cards.flavor: She doesn't drop character until after the DVD commentary.

cards.name: Mailbox Dancer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a Coin to your hand. Deathrattle: Give your opponent one.
cards.flavor: He is the reason why we have 7 mailboxes in this district.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the United in Stormwind Reward Track.

cards.name: Noble Mount
cards.text: G[x]ive a minion +1/+1 and Divine Shield. When it dies, summon a Warhorse.
cards.flavor: The Horde rued the day that Cariel was allowed to take her pet to work.

cards.name: Pandaren Importer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\nspell that didn't start\nin your deck.
cards.flavor: She carries everything you didn't want and more!
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the United in Stormwind Reward Track.

cards.name: Prestor's Pyromancer
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next\nFire spell has Spell\nDamage +2.
cards.flavor: Ah, yeah. This guy. Definitely not an evil dragon in disguise either.

cards.name: Shadowcloth Needle
cards.text:
[x]After you cast a Shadow
spell, deal 1 damage
to all enemies.
Lose 1 Durability.
cards.flavor: Makes light of the darkest repair jobs.

cards.name: SI:7 Skulker
cards.text: [x]Stealth\nBattlecry: The next card\n__you draw costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: Burying bones and calling it skullduggery.

cards.name: Stockades Prisoner
cards.text: [x]Starts Dormant.\nAfter you play 3 cards,\nthis awakens.
cards.flavor: She was arrested for lockpicking. Her imprisonment was not well thought out.

cards.name: Twilight Deceptor
cards.text: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
cards.flavor: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

cards.name: Wickerclaw
cards.text: After your hero gains Attack, this minion\ngains +2 Attack.
cards.flavor: They say pets tend to look like their owners.

cards.name: Aimed Shot
cards.text: Deal $3 damage. Your next Hero Power deals 2 more damage.
cards.flavor: Wait, you WEREN'T aiming before?!

cards.name: Alliance Bannerman
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion.\nGive minions in your\nhand +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Back in my day, we had to carry our inspiration uphill both ways to war.

cards.name: Cargo Guard
cards.text: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Armor.
cards.flavor: *Arrrrrmor

cards.name: Catacomb Guard
cards.text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to an enemy minion.
cards.flavor: A little dark down here. So much for "serving the Light."

cards.name: Chaos Leech
cards.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion.\nOutcast: Deal $5 instead.
cards.flavor: Otherwise known as a nematode.

cards.name: Charged Call
cards.text: [x]Discover a @-Cost minion and summon it. (Upgraded for each Overload card you played this game!)
cards.flavor: You have a collect call from "AL'AKIR, LORD OF AIR AND THE FOUR WINDS." Do you accept these charges?

cards.name: Dreaded Mount
cards.text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1.\nWhen it dies, summon\nan endless Dreadsteed.
cards.flavor: This is the summoning that never ends, and it goes on and on my friends...

cards.name: Enthusiastic Banker
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn, store a card from your deck. Deathrattle: Add the stored cards to your hand.
cards.flavor: She offers 0% interest.

cards.name: Entrapped Sorceress
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a\n_Quest, Discover a spell.
cards.flavor: "If you're a city guard, you have to tell me. Otherwise, it's entrapment."
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the United in Stormwind Reward Track.

cards.name: Flightmaster Dungar
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a flightpath and go Dormant. Awaken with a bonus __when you complete it!
cards.flavor: Flight’s a little bumpy, but there’s plenty of legroom.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlockable after purchasing the United in Stormwind Tavern Pass.

cards.name: Heavy Plate
cards.text: Tradeable\nGain 8 Armor.
cards.flavor: "You asked for unbendable, unwavering armor–I don't see why you're upset."

cards.name: Impatient Shopkeep
cards.text: Tradeable\nRush
cards.flavor: "Oi! This ain't a museum, lady."

cards.name: Lightbringer's Hammer
cards.text: Lifesteal\nCan't attack heroes.
cards.flavor: This entire city must be purged. Or at least just the minions.

cards.name: Lion's Frenzy
cards.text: Has Attack equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
cards.flavor: Only as sharp as your draw.

cards.name: Loan Shark
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Give your\nopponent a Coin.\n__Deathrattle: You get two.
cards.flavor: Pay up or you'll be swimming with the fishes.

cards.name: Nobleman
cards.text: Battlecry: Create a Golden copy of a random card in your hand.
cards.flavor: What class are you? 'Upper.'

cards.name: Northshire Farmer
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Shuffle three 3/3 copies_into_your_deck.
cards.flavor: Dual-classed into Farmer/Rancher.

cards.name: Oracle of Elune
cards.text: [x]After you play a minion\nthat costs (2) or less,\nsummon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: Even the moon goddess needs to back up her databases.

cards.name: Package Runner
cards.text: Can only attack if you have at least 8 cards in hand.
cards.flavor: He could go... all... the... way!

cards.name: Psyfiend
cards.text: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage to each hero.
cards.flavor: Listens to a LOT of K-pop.

cards.name: Ramming Mount
cards.text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2 and Immune while attacking. When it dies, summon a Ram.
cards.flavor: Tavish has some road rage issues to work through.

cards.name: Rustrot Viper
cards.text: [x]Tradeable\nBattlecry: Destroy your\nopponent's weapon.
cards.flavor: Poisonous to weapons.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the United in Stormwind Reward Track.

cards.name: SI:7 Operative
cards.text: Rush\nAfter this attacks a minion, gain Stealth.
cards.flavor: What do you mean you're out of ponies?

cards.name: Sketchy Information
cards.text: [x]Draw a Deathrattle card\nthat costs (4) or less.\nTrigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavor: "I trust the Forsaken as far as I can smell them. Which, I guess is actually pretty far."

cards.name: Stormwind Freebooter
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: "Just don't stab the ankles! I want his boots!"

cards.name: Stormwind Piper
cards.text: After this minion attacks,\ngive your Beasts +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Throws crazy parties with the Rat King—except when it's raining.

cards.name: Traveling Merchant
cards.text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly _minion you control.
cards.flavor: Northrend's greatest export: funnel cakes.

cards.name: Two-Faced Investor
cards.text: [x]At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a card in your hand by (1). (50% chance to increase.)
cards.flavor: Should never have opened that joint account...

cards.name: Canal Slogger
cards.text: Rush, Lifesteal\nOverload: (1)
cards.flavor: "Another Monday in the canals huh? What a slog."

cards.name: Cheesemonger
cards.text:
[x]Whenever your opponent
casts a spell, add a random
spell with the same Cost
to your hand.
cards.flavor: Secretly, the Big Cheese of SI:7.

cards.name: Counterfeit Blade
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain a random\nfriendly Deathrattle that\n_triggered this game.
cards.flavor: Don't worry, the blade retracts into the handle!

cards.name: Dark Alley Pact
cards.text: [x]Summon a Fiend\nwith stats equal to\nyour hand size.
cards.flavor: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

cards.name: Demonic Assault
cards.text: [x]Deal $3 damage.\nSummon two 1/3\nVoidwalkers with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Right next to the demonic pepper.

cards.name: Felgorger
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a Fel spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
cards.flavor: The 'everything green' diet.

cards.name: Fire Sale
cards.text: Tradeable\nDeal $3 damage\nto all minions.
cards.flavor: Everything is 50% off now that our warehouse burned down.

cards.name: First Blade of Wrynn
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield\nBattlecry: Gain Rush if this\nhas at least 4 Attack.
cards.flavor: Valedictorian of knight school.

cards.name: Granite Forgeborn
cards.text: Battlecry: Reduce the cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
cards.flavor: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

cards.name: Guild Trader
cards.text: Tradeable\nSpell Damage +2
cards.flavor: Somehow, she manages six different professions.

cards.name: Kodo Mount
cards.text: Give a minion +4/+2 and Rush. When it dies, summon a Kodo.
cards.flavor: No matter how big they are or how many times you tell them no, they STILL won't stay off the couch.

cards.name: Park Panther
cards.text: [x]Rush. Whenever this\nattacks, give your hero\n+3 Attack this turn.
cards.flavor: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

cards.name: Persistent Peddler
cards.text: Tradeable\nDeathrattle: Summon a Persistent Peddler from your deck.
cards.flavor: Loves pyramid schemes and bike rides.

cards.name: Remote-Controlled Golem
cards.text:
[x]After this takes damage,
shuffle two Golem Parts into
your deck. When drawn,
__summon a 2/1 Mech.
cards.flavor: Someone got a little too excited inventing a can opener.

cards.name: Rodent Nest
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Rats.
cards.flavor: Pig sty? No, this is a rat's nest.

cards.name: Royal Librarian
cards.text: [x]Tradeable\nBattlecry: Silence\na minion.
cards.flavor: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

cards.name: Runed Mithril Rod
cards.text:
[x]After you draw 4 cards,
reduce the Cost of cards
in your hand by (1).
Lose 1 Durability.
cards.flavor: "Please, I need these greens to disenchant them." —Every Enchanter Ever

cards.name: SI:7 Informant
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each SI:7 card you've played this game.
cards.flavor: Sitting in a tavern all day and looking scary is hard work, but somebody has to do it.

cards.name: Spice Bread Baker
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore Health to your hero equal to your hand size.
cards.flavor: The secret ingredient is love. And a LOT of butter.
cards.howToGetGold: Unlocked on the United in Stormwind Reward Track.

cards.name: Spirit Alpha
cards.text: [x]After you play a card with\nOverload, summon a 2/3\nSpirit Wolf with Taunt.
cards.flavor: Just like in the natural world, the alpha of the species is bright purple.

cards.name: Stubborn Suspect
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: He keeps saying "I'll never talk," but no one has actually asked him anything.

cards.name: Void Shard
cards.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $4 damage.
cards.flavor: Light's easy. Void's hard.

cards.name: Darkbishop Benedictus
cards.text: Start of Game: If the spells in your deck are all Shadow, enter Shadowform.
cards.flavor: Dark Bishop takes Light Pawn, check.
cards.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 25 United in Stormwind Legendary cards.

cards.name: Imported Tarantula
cards.text: [x]Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders with Poisonous and Rush.
cards.flavor: Which forbidden forest did you get this from?

cards.name: Lion's Guard
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 15\nor less Health, gain\n+2/+4 and Taunt.
cards.flavor: She takes the lion's share of the credit, too.

cards.name: Sanctum Chandler
cards.text: After you cast a Fire spell, draw a spell.
cards.flavor: Has been burning at both ends to keep the place illuminated.

cards.name: Shady Bartender
cards.text: Tradeable\nBattlecry: Give your Demons +2/+2.
cards.flavor: One sin and tonic, coming right up.

cards.name: Stormwind Guard
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
cards.flavor: 1% Guarding, 99% providing directions.

cards.name: The Rat King
cards.text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Go\nDormant. Revive after 5\nfriendly minions die.
cards.flavor: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

cards.name: Anetheron
cards.text: [x]Costs (1) if your hand is full.
cards.flavor: Leads every demonic invasion. Hopefully this one turns out better than the World Tree.

cards.name: Battleground Battlemaster
cards.text: Adjacent minions\nhave Windfury.
cards.flavor: Farm! No wait… Mine! No wait… 3 to Smith—they're taking Farm. Get there now!

cards.name: Best in Shell
cards.text: [x]Tradeable\nSummon two 2/7\n_Turtles with Taunt.
cards.flavor: The agility course takes a while.

cards.name: City Architect
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two\n0/5 Castle Walls\nwith Taunt.
cards.flavor: "Oh, wait, I had this turned the wrong way. This was supposed to be a tower."

cards.name: Cornelius Roame
cards.text: [x]At the start and end\n_of each player's turn,\ndraw a card.
cards.flavor: Raised two perfectly normal daughters. Then one died and brought doom to Stormwind.

cards.name: Cowardly Grunt
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck.
cards.flavor: Cowardice is the wisest part of valor.

cards.name: Entitled Customer
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your hand size to all other minions.
cards.flavor: "Do you have any idea how much mana I've spent at your store? 6."

cards.name: Highlord Fordragon
cards.text: [x]Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give a minion __in your hand +5/+5.
cards.flavor: "Through my faith and my courage, I shall be protected. And through my honor and sacrifice, another will rise in my place."

cards.name: Lady Prestor
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform minions in your deck into random Dragons. (They keep their __original stats and Cost.)
cards.flavor: To her credit, the best bodyguard for the king WOULD be a dragon in disguise.

cards.name: Rats of Extraordinary Size
cards.text:
[x]Summon seven 1/1
Rats. Any that can't fit
on the battlefield go to
your hand with +4/+4.
cards.flavor: They don't care if you believe they exist.

cards.name: Tiny Toys
cards.text: Summon four random 5-Cost minions.\nMake them 2/2.
cards.flavor: Mom, they're action figures!

cards.name: Clumsy Courier
cards.text: Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand.
cards.flavor: Not the nacho cheese!

cards.name: Elekk Mount
cards.text: Give a minion +4/+7 and Taunt. When it dies, summon an Elekk.
cards.flavor: Pink Elekks are on parade!

cards.name: Lothar
cards.text: At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion. If it dies, gain +3/+3.
cards.flavor: Has been around since before there were paladins and those newfangled paladin mechs.

cards.name: SI:7 Assassin
cards.text: [x]Costs (1) less for each SI:7 card you've played this game. Combo: Destroy an enemy minion.
cards.flavor: You can't keep the streets clean if you're afraid to get your hands dirty.

cards.name: Grand Magus Antonidas
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a Fire spell on each of your last three turns, cast 3 Fireballs at ___random enemies.@ (@/3)
cards.flavor: He's really disappointed Jaina became a frost mage.

cards.name: Irebound Brute
cards.text: [x]Taunt\nCosts (1) less for each\ncard drawn this turn.
cards.flavor: "You don't understand… ogres are an untapped market for vengeance and hatred!"

cards.name: Jace Darkweaver
cards.text: Battlecry: Cast all Fel spells you've played this game (targets enemies if possible).
cards.flavor: As a former mage, making the transition from fire to felfire was quite easy.

cards.name: Mo'arg Forgefiend
cards.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Gain 8 Armor.
cards.flavor: Enraged not by fel energies, but by an itchy nose he cannot scratch.

cards.name: Sheldras Moontree
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: The next 3\nspells you draw are\nCast When Drawn.
cards.flavor: Sheldras really went to the park for his pilgrimage.

cards.name: Varian, King of Stormwind
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion to gain Rush. Repeat for Taunt and Divine Shield.
cards.flavor: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.
cards.howToGetDiamond: Unlockable after purchasing the United in Stormwind Tavern Pass.

cards.name: Goldshire Gnoll
cards.text: [x]Rush\nCosts (1) less for each\n__other card in your hand.
cards.flavor: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.
